author: {'steamid': '76561199179937415', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 52, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1711954530}
review:
線の書いてあるブロックを交換したりスライドしたり回したりして繋げていくゲーム。
シンプルなデザインですが色合い含めてとてもかわいいです。

BGMはヒーリング系でSEも安っぽくなくてかわいいです。
音量調整はできません。

ステージは50個程でしょうか。難易度は低めで感覚でプレイできる感じです。
40分ぐらいで終わってしまったのでもっとステージが沢山あったら良かったなと思いました。
スライドパズル系のゲームが好きな方にはおすすめできると思います。

author: {'steamid': '76561198084418582', 'num_games_owned': 161, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 197, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 196, 'last_played': 1710124780}
review:
São desafios interessantes. Com dinâmicas variadas. Mas é sempre em estilo quebra-cabeça clássico.

O desenvolvedor poderia ter nos dado uma palavra de agradecimento pelo menos quando o jogo acabasse, mas nem isso fez. Dps do último nível vc vai pro primeiro desafio novamente e continua pro segundo, terceiro, ou seja é um loop.

Mas eu ainda recomendo o jogo, achei mais difícil que delete.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036538203', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 176, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1709449352}
review:
An impressively simple puzzle game with a cohesive premise. There are lines that need to be completed on some blocks, causing them to light up, and when all the pieces are lit up, you've won the puzzle and loft off to the next one.

It gets more complex as the game goes forward. Soon you're introduced to '3-D' shapes, and then black tiles that must be made non-contiguous to any other black tiles in order to become dots of light, a likewise condition for ongoing to the next puzzle.

The presentation brings what would be bearable, into the fun. The colors are simple yet clear, soft yet bold; the lighting effects have a satisfying bloom to them, and when you solve a puzzle, a bloom softer comes over the screen and a slow camera zoom asserts your success.

This game's proof that sometimes you don't need a hard-hitting, complex game with a big story or power fantasy to have fun. Sometimes a good puzzle with great presentation is what hits the spot. Recommend, especially for the price; if you're conscientious, wait for a sale for about $1.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119598326', 'num_games_owned': 475, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1708969001}
review:
[b][h1]klocki[/h1][/b]klocki is a short, casual, minimalist puzzle game about arranging lines and shapes by switching tiles. It's really straightforward with simple mechanics and can be completed in under an hour, great for a quick session if you have an itch for a puzzle game.

[b][h2]Gameplay[/h2][/b]The game is split into levels, with the simple premise of each being to arrange the lines, dots and shapes into the correct patterns. You learn by trial and error but it isn't very difficult to figure out the solution and so it ends up being a fairly relaxing experience. The final level is quite a cute way to end the whole thing.

[b][h2]Achievement (1/1)[/h2][/b]There is a single achievement for completing all the levels.

[b][h2]Music/sound[/h2][/b]Relaxing music.

[b][h2]Settings/Accessibility/Misc[/h2][/b]Runs well on low-end hardware. Level select available.

[quote][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/39729435-JHG-Reviews/?appid=2218750]Check out my Curator page[/url][/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198175493990', 'num_games_owned': 2383, 'num_reviews': 236, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 293, 'last_played': 1706112560}
review:
[b]klocki[/b] é um dos puzzles minimalistas mais bonitos e divertidos que já tive o prazer de jogar. A visão isométrica (clássica de muitos jogos) é clean e bonita. Os efeitos sonoros são muito bem feitos também.
Senti falta de um menu de configuração, por mais simples que seja, pois isso é útil em alguns casos.

Um ponto muito interessante é a diversidade de mecânicas. Há uns 5 ou 6 tipos diferentes de mecânicas para resolver os quebra cabeças e, em vários momentos, você fará uso de múltiplas formas ao mesmo tempo.

author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1705775656}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031606412', 'num_games_owned': 998, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1673861224}

author: {'steamid': '76561198167958424', 'num_games_owned': 1193, 'num_reviews': 527, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1704041688}
review:
Прикольная логическая игра, которая развивает твоё воображение и логику. Последние несколько уровней пришлось подумать побольше. 
В игре очень интересное взаимодействие с головоломкой, какие то детали крутятся, какие то переставляются, какие то зафиксированы. Уровни так же разнообразные, приятная цветовая гамма. :)
ps. Честно говоря, у меня после захода в игру сложилось тревожное состояние, т.к. не понятно сколько уровней в игре. но после поиска в гугле, я обнаружила что их 82 всего. Слава Богу не 500. :D

author: {'steamid': '76561199000064982', 'num_games_owned': 755, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1700075239}
review:
[b]Tl;dr:[/b] Klocki does not feel like a puzzle game but a toy.

I understand the casual relaxing nature of the game, but [b]the puzzle experience, I'm afraid, is not there.[/b] Maybe it is just that the pacing is not right, but I think I have played enough levels to see if there is something intriguing about the game puzzle-wise.

The game feels like an interactive digital app where you click on the screen to see things forming a fancy structure where there isn't much thinking needed. [b]Most of the "solutions" are too easy to figure out[/b] in the game, and they simply don't make you feel like you are solving a puzzle at all.

If you would like to click on the screen and see things become fancy, you can get Klocki; but, [b]if you are someone who favors logical puzzles over relaxing scenery[/b] in your minimalist puzzle games, [b]this game does not offer that.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198076521369', 'num_games_owned': 250, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1696884212}
review:
very fun game, sad to be leaving a downvote. played it on kongregate, a fantastic demo for a game that i gladly shelled out 2 bucks for. the promise of course was more levels of the game- the added slide mechanic or weird egg shapey puzzles were cool, but, for example, only 2 puzzles used the four way egg peice. it ended in maybe 10 minutes more than the free version, and nowhere was it depicted how many levels or play time.

i highly recommend this game, just make sure you know youll get a little under an hour for it, which i didn't.

author: {'steamid': '76561199043766833', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1696781250}
review:

review: Maciej Targoni gets me again with another one of these great little puzzlers. My brain hates how much I enjoy your games, if you're reading this. As usual Klocki is a minimalist puzzler with a ton of colorful and legible brain teasers. Incredibly easy at first to get a hang of the ropes and the true challenges coming near the last few. The only thing I would say is the number of different puzzle elements was a bit overwhelming in this particular title, but it was a good time nonetheless. Recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561198371364639', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 101, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 101, 'last_played': 1688786408}
review:
不推荐，但并不是游戏玩法的问题。其实游戏本身很好玩，有交换、旋转、华容道等等，组合在一起也能设计出很烧脑的关卡。
但是！！！它把我成就吞了！！！本来总共就一个成就！！！还给我吞了！！！我这一个小时是白忙活了吗！！！
那你说这七块钱为什么不去雪王买一杯咖啡椰椰呢？
交互做得太抠脚了，按ESC直接退出一刚？？？不是，你连个初始页面都没有吗？
也对，毕竟是个连关卡序号都没有的游戏，过了最后一关又会回到第一关，反正咱也不知道在第几关，你将体验到“我通关了吗”和“我好像通关了吧”两种感受的动态平衡。
极简风格我很爱，所以麻烦设计者出来给美工磕三个响头。

author: {'steamid': '76561198143406978', 'num_games_owned': 1979, 'num_reviews': 321, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1688013789}

나만 그런지는 모르겠지만 씨리즈 중에 제일 쉽게 느껴졌고

author: {'steamid': '76561198030707783', 'num_games_owned': 703, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1687856176}
review:
A very cute, little, minimalistic puzzle game. The mechanics are varied and introduced at a good pace and combine interestingly enough without any one puzzle being too taxing. A little short, ending just as the puzzles are starting to get challenging, but that's hardly a complaint when you can pick it for a buck on sale.

There are a few technical issues, like the uncapped framerate and other defaults that the game gives you no way of adjusting in-game, but again these are minor when you consider the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064923796', 'num_games_owned': 359, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1686072346}
review:
It's a decent minimalist puzzler for a low price. The difficulty curve is reasonable, but most puzzles can be more or less brute forced without any real strategy.  Alright graphics, but the sound effects of moving pieces and completing lines is pretty unpleasant. Unfortunately, this, combined with lack of any sort QoL features like reset or undo buttons, or a level screen push this into "not worth it" territory for me.

4/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198101950038', 'num_games_owned': 2371, 'num_reviews': 324, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1685830232}
review: klocki is a short and smart puzzle game where you combine pieces of puzzles together. The game is simple and  gets relatively challenging towards the end, but nothing too tough. I love that it trains your mind and it was really satisfying to complete too. However, the game abruptly looped once it ended and I continued going on, not knowing the game was done, so just take note. Still a great puzzle game. Definitely recommended!

author: {'steamid': '76561199140783298', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1684384862}
review:
[h1] ｷｭｲﾝｷｭｲﾝ　\ﾌﾞｩｳｳｳｳﾝ/[/h1]
PVみたまんまのパズルゲーム。パズルの説明は一切ないが、感覚に従って動かしていくうちに法則が分かり解けるようになる。
この辺はHOOKと同じ感じ。ただHOOKと違ってメニューや問題数の表示がないのでどこまで進んだか分かりにくい。
実際、全クリした際にシームレスにレベル1に戻ったせいで少し進んでからそのことに気づいた。
全クリ後に実績が解除されなかったが、他の方も言及しているように、一度アンインストールして再度起動したら解決した。

クリアの音がなぜか癖になるゲームである。\ﾌﾞｩｳｳｳｳﾝ/

author: {'steamid': '76561198428719634', 'num_games_owned': 516, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 98, 'last_played': 1683958272}

author: {'steamid': '76561198106137796', 'num_games_owned': 363, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1701816765}

author: {'steamid': '76561198021573543', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 152, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1682867506}
review:
難易度低めのパズルとして面白いのだけど、その面白い期間はすごく短い。

序盤の簡単過ぎてつまらない状態と終盤の手数が多すぎて面倒な状態が殆どで、面白いと感じる難易度の部分はすごく少ない。それでも序盤終盤もそこまでストレスになる程の、簡単さ/面倒さ、でも無いので全体としては面白かったという感想にはなる。でも実際に面白いと感じてプレイできた時間は本当に短い。
このゲームで何が一番楽しかったかと改めて考えると、短時間であっさりクリアーできた開放感が一番楽しかったかもしれない、それくらいの感じで「おすすめ」。

author: {'steamid': '76561198044161322', 'num_games_owned': 325, 'num_reviews': 248, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1682380361}
review:
Another excellent minimalistic puzzle game by the same creator as Hook. The rules for the various puzzle elements are not explained to you and must be figured out, which is mostly easy going. I enjoyed almost all of the game except for the tile moving segments, which felt more of a chore because the solution was almost always obvious, it was the execution which was fiddly and time-consuming.

Nevertheless, at this low price I can say the game is definitely worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198027047516', 'num_games_owned': 2313, 'num_reviews': 240, 'playtime_forever': 88, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1682259340}
review:
This review is specially made for those who like to get all the achievements in games.
Minor spoilers ahead.

[b]Description:[/b]
Klocki is an easy minimalist puzzle game. The puzzles are 3D objects that have different tiles on them that need to be manipulated. Each chapter adds different mechanics and types of puzzles, but most are about pattern making/recognition. The last levels mix several of these mechanics and puzzle types making the levels slightly harder.

The presentation is simple, with 3D objects placed over a plain colored background, and has some similarities with Hook, another game created by the same Dev.
There is no interface or chapter select, so the levels need to be completed in their order. The [b][u][url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AVwxL_y_SQo] soundtrack[/url][/u][/b] is surprisingly good for a cheap game and provides a relaxing environment that doesn’t interfere with the thinking process. 

The gameplay relies on the mouse only: you need to click on the tiles to create paths, patterns and/or shapes to complete the levels. Most only took me a few seconds but others are not so obvious and take a bit more.


[b]Achievements:[/b]  
[b]How many:[/b] 1 Achievement.
[b]How much time:[/b] Around 1,5 hours, without any help.
[b]Game difficulty:[/b] Very Easy, with a few slightly harder levels.
[b]Achievements’ Difficulty:[/b] Very Easy, just complete all the levels.


[b]Overall opinion:[/b]  
Klocki is a short and easy minimalist puzzle game. The presentation is simple, the soundtrack is good and the puzzles are varied and well designed but most don’t require much effort to complete. 


[b]Join and follow my group [u][url=store.steampowered.com/curator/42556190-Ribbon-Hunters/] Ribbon Hunters[/url][/u] for more suggestions and reviews of easy indie games to get all the achievements.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561197970565583', 'num_games_owned': 1345, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1682140070}
review: Very short and minimalist puzzle game that teaches new mechanisms with every level and gets increasingly complex. At first I thought there wasn't much challenge to the game as the introductory levels feel like busy work but this is just to get you to understand the controls and what is possible within these rules. Then the game starts to add new mechanics without telling you how they work; you have to just play and experiment and see how the pieces interact and finding out what the win condition is. Excellent visuals and great puzzle design. I bought this in a pack of minimalist puzzle games and it was well worth it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198814250534', 'num_games_owned': 773, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1682012009}

author: {'steamid': '76561199025924280', 'num_games_owned': 2722, 'num_reviews': 362, 'playtime_forever': 361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 36, 'last_played': 1682420099}
review:
评分：3/5
评测：这是一个偏向视觉艺术形式的益智游戏，通过将方块进行“交换”、“旋转”、“平移”等方式将方块们相互连接在一起，游戏共80多关，方块的操作方法有好几种，方块的种类也有好几种，除了将本平面的方块结合外，不同平面内的方块也可以通过形状相互连接，还是挺有意思的，值得尝试

author: {'steamid': '76561197992158143', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 1015, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 952, 'last_played': 1681833653}
review: Supposedly there are 82 levels, I am at almost 100 and no achievement pop.  It looks like it has started to repeat levels, but since there is no menu to see what levels you have one, I can;t be sure.  Well, it finally popped, so I am updating my review.  Other than the lack of a menu, the puzzles are nice, a spread of easy ones with some difficult ones.

author: {'steamid': '76561198155780151', 'num_games_owned': 3378, 'num_reviews': 227, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1684847051}
review:
รีวิว klocki

เกมทำลายสมองจากผู้สร้าง Hook และ Naboki (ไอ้เกมหลังนี่โคตรส้นตีนมาก เคยเล่นในมือถือ) หน้าที่ของเราก็คือ การสลับตำแหน่งบล็อกเพื่อเชื่อมเส้นและรูปภาพให้เข้ากัน เพื่อผ่านด่านต่อไปเรื่อยๆ เพื่อที่จะเข้าสู่ลูกเล่นใหม่ๆ ความยากใหม่ๆ โดยรวมก็ถือว่าประเทืองหัวพอๆกับหลายๆเกมในค่าย และก็คิดว่าถึงไอเดียหมด ก็น่าจะหากินกับภาคต่อไปได้อีกยาว ผู้ผลิตสมควรที่จะได้รับรางวัลอะไรซักอย่าง อย่างเช่น เกมสร้างสรรค์ยอดเยี่ยม อะไรทำนองนี้ สรุปได้ไปแล้วรึยังวะ?

review: Del mismo creador que Hook, prefiero este último a klocki. review: Relaxing and colorful minimalistic puzzle game, where your goal is to arrange tiles and connect (not just) lines to make an uninterrupted flow of light, on two- and three-dimensional layouts. There are total 60 levels, of which 2/3 are absurdly easy and their purpose is to teach the logic of the puzzles, and the remaining third is more challenging. But overall the game is not too difficult, and with the subdued background music makes for a nice relaxing experience that will train your mind a little as well.

author: {'steamid': '76561198155193221', 'num_games_owned': 85, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1675322385}
review:
シンプルでお手軽なパズルゲーム。
問題数が少ないながらもマンネリ感を感じさせないとばかりにドンドン新ルールを追加するテンポ感は結構いいと思います。
ただ、最初の方がパズル感が無く最早ただの作業なのが勿体ないなという印象を持ちました。
それでも値段分は十分に遊べるゲームだと思います。
全問クリアした後に実績が貰えないみたいですが自分は再起動で貰えました。

author: {'steamid': '76561198834031758', 'num_games_owned': 39, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1674986876}

author: {'steamid': '76561198049036335', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 106, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 106, 'last_played': 1674896579}
review:
Very good game at a very low price. There are quite a lot minimalistic puzzle games, but this one really blew my mind because of the ideas and mechanisms in it. Whenever you think you mastered one of the mechanisms, the next level introduces something new for your mind to twist around. The levels get quite tricky at times, but they're not hard in a logical sense rather than in a creative sense. You simply have to see and figure out how everything matches together.

I found the game very entertaining, yet still challenging. There are a few things you should know though:
- The game is VERY simplicistic. There barely are any settings and it totally lacks any explanations. You have to figure out everything on your own, including controls. However, since the left mouse button is everything you need, it's rather intuitive after a short time.
- There are only 84 levels and the game silently repeats from the beginning after completing the final level. I did not notice otherwise than suddenly wondering about the easy levels coming up. ;) However, it also triggers the only available achievement in this game, which I simply didn't notice. It's still good for several days of fun if you don't rush the levels.
- For me, the game had problems with tabbing out to the desktop (alt+tab) when running in fullscreen mode. No crashes though, but it always shuffeled my windows around. I solved this by playing in window mode and using the Borderless Gaming tool to turn it into a maximized borderless window, thus looking like fullscreen.
- Unfortunately, there's no fps cap in this game. Hence it renders at >2000 fps, maxing out your GPU and unnecessarily wasting energy and producing heat. I solved this by forcing vertical synchronization on, using the NVIDIA control panel and managing the 3D settings for klocki. It ran nice and smoothly afterwards.

So all in all: Fantastic game, highly recommended! It has some technical flaws, but all of them can be handled easily.

author: {'steamid': '76561198866832077', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1674554677}

author: {'steamid': '76561198049002538', 'num_games_owned': 710, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1575977243}
review:
[h1]Eine Herausforderung für Konzentration und räumliches Denkvermögen[/h1]

Klocki ist ein unglaublich fesselndes Puzzle-Spiel, das die Aufmerksamkeit und die Fähigkeiten der Spieler auf die Probe stellt. Das Spielprinzip ist einfach: Man muss kleine Bausteine in eine vorgegebene Form zusammensetzen, um das Level zu meistern.

Das Spiel bietet eine Vielzahl von Herausforderungen, die immer schwieriger werden, je weiter man kommt. Man muß Konzentration und räumliches Denkvermögen einsetzen, um die Bausteine an der richtigen Stelle zu platzieren und so das Puzzle zu lösen.

Insgesamt ist Klocki ein großartiges Spiel für alle, die Puzzles mögen und ihre Fähigkeiten im räumlichen Denken verbessern möchten. Es ist ein perfektes Spiel für eine kurze Pause zwischendurch oder für längere Spielperioden. Ich kann es nur empfehlen. Gerade auch weil es auch meist zu einem extrem günstigen Preis angeboten wird.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054476162', 'num_games_owned': 272, 'num_reviews': 982, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1672147579}
review:
[h1]ギミックありのパイプパズル[/h1]
終端同士をパイプでつなぐタイプのパズルゲームの一種。作者のパズルゲームに共通で、相変わらず言葉での操作説明は一切ない。しかし、触ってみると「なるほどね」となる作りはさすが。

最初はぽんぽんと深いことを考えなくても進んでいくお手軽さだが、徐々にギミックが増えていき少しは考えないと解けなくなっていく。とはいえ、数手先まで読まないと無理ということはなく、何となくでも解けるのは個人的に好き。

オールクリアしても実績が解除されない場合があるが、コミュニティハブにある通りにクリア後アンインストールを試したら行けた。クリアしたのに実績解除出来なかった人は試してみると良いと思う。

author: {'steamid': '76561198157328031', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1668877090}
review:
Reviewing a 2 dollar puzzle game poorly is probably overkill but I decided this is a thing I'm going to do. See, I used to feel anxious and overwhelmed at bigger games and I liked in the abstract the idea of abstract puzzle games, so I bought a lot of these.

So, klocki starts out good and interesting. The visuals and controls, its sense of minimalism and calm are nice and satisfying and there isn't too much grind. The visual arrangement after completing one feels nice. The mechanics are nice and interesting when introduced, and the idea of how they incorporate is interesting.

But, it never seems to know how to mesh its ideas. See, it runs into the trap of throwing in more mechanics but not really doing much with them. The 'peak' of each mechanic is fairly simple. It keeps you thinking 'oh, thats interesting, I wonder where it goes next' and throws in another thing... and another... but, apart from the rotating board, never really providing any real context, depth, or zen to them. It starts off the impression that way, but it fades in later half. Its a game that you feel supposed to zone in to but you don't. Lots of filler where if you just find where the corners are, can juts click click click and done.

And then... it is suddenly over. So you come in enjoying it, but has a lifeline cut so short that makes it feel empty.

It also has the issue that... to put it one way, the fact there *is* a solution basically necessitates by just connecting stuff you arrive at that solution rather than feeling a genuine pathway to a solution. You can also just say 'hey, I know this needs to go that way' and the mere existence of a solution will just easily lead you that way. 

Now, I get this is a casual game and I probably ought to be a hardcore puzzler-but I can appreciate a zen game, it just needs to convey that zen. LYNE, Achromatic, Knights, even Hook by same creator I think accomplish that better. Also, I don't think 'zen' should be opposite to 'interesting'. A good zen puzzle game zones you in. A certain thoughtful, mindful state that focuses you in on your task-but in a blissful way. I didn't get that here. Its probably worth trying it out on sale, but for 2 dollars (though often sale) when other 1 dollar games feel more complete, feels incomplete.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068024465', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1667583664}

[h1] 감각적이고 아름다운 퍼즐 [/h1]

[h1] Sensuous and beautiful puzzle [/h1]

Puzzle recommended if you've been hurt by your head and mind due to a tiring and hard day.
With sensuous and beautiful background music, you can get out of reality for a while and relax your mind.
It's not that difficult, and if you don't get all the stage challenges, you can delete the game, reinstall it, and access it right away :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198067888927', 'num_games_owned': 1632, 'num_reviews': 302, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 166, 'last_played': 1660878135}
review: I've played a lot of puzzle games and I appreciate the simplistic aesthetic to an extent... but I just want to know how much progress I've made in these games as I go. Let's face it, puzzle games are just about appeasing our monkey brains with a reward system that makes us feel accomplished. For me, part of the "carrot on a stick" that keeps me chasing the conclusion is knowing that I'm meeting milestones. Klocki gives you no sense of how close you are to achieving that ultimate goal and I lost my motivation for that reason.

author: {'steamid': '76561198338994084', 'num_games_owned': 107, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1660748943}
review:
Klocki is a peaceful puzzle game with beautiful, calming audio and visuals that complement each other well. The absence of timer and move limit creates an environment without pressure. I appreciated the "show; don't tell" approach. The game has no text, and the player learns new mechanics in simple levels that increase in difficulty before beginning to reincorporate previous mechanics. After 82 levels in about one hour, klocki ends while it is still interesting. 

The minimalism might go too far by not providing a menu to navigate through the levels faster, though players will likely play each level once without desire to go back to a particular one anyway. When the game ends, it loops back to the first level. I thought it would have been nice to include something special here to acknowledge completion of all levels.

I encountered a bug at the end. I closed the game and noticed I had not yet earned the completion achievement, so I opened it again. I had to jump forwards through all the levels and finish the last one again. It looped back to the first level again, but this time I could click back to go straight to the last level, and I had earned the achievement.

author: {'steamid': '76561198217318681', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1730, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1654004569}
review:
Ein puzzle spiel für zwischendurch.
ich empfehle es.
82 level´s, einige sind ziemlich schwer zu lösen.
in diesem spiel ist viel nachdenken gefordert.
musik ist in ordnung.
leider kein options menü.
der preiß für dieses spiel ist im angebot gut.
die eine errungenschaft im spiel funktioniert, könnte aber etwas fehlerhaft sein, sollte die errungenschaft nach dem 82 level nicht kommen schließe einfach das spiel und lade das spiel neu, so hat es bei mir geklappt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198105042729', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 51, 'last_played': 1653656371}
review: I'm a fan of minimalist games like Islanders and shapez.io, but this game doesn't cut it. I paid $2 for it and I didn't get anywhere near $2 worth of fun.  The most puzzling aspect of the game is figuring out what the object of the current puzzle is.  Once you understand it, it's trivial to solve it.  But then you have to go through a dozen exactly like it to get to the next "level".  I'm not sure how far I got through the game, but it's simply too tedious to continue.  If I could fast forward through the levels, I might be more interested.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072580497', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 174, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1652220293}
review:
This deserves all the praise it gets. It helped my mind relax while fooling it in thinking that it is smart :)

In case your completion achievement bugs out and is not awarded when you finish the game, just uninstall and reinstall the game, and reboot it. The achievement will be automatically granted.

My only criticism is that there is no frame rate cap and my GPU was running the game at one billion frames per second. It is not even winter (at the time of my playthrough), so I actually had to grab ice packs and staff them under my armpits to avoid heatstroke from my active-volcano PC tower.

review:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2801570109

Un concept très simple mais habilement mis en œuvre, puisqu'il parvient à se renouveler au fil des niveaux en corsant plus ou moins la difficulté du jeu.
1h de réflexion environ, rien de trop intense, de la détente avant tout.

[b][i]klocki[/i] est un jeu de casse-tête minimaliste qui remplit son rôle : réflexion et détente sont au rendez-vous.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198410604507', 'num_games_owned': 119, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 247, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1652815328}
review:
[h1]Качественная головоломка[/h1]

Мне понравились "klocki". Это качественная головоломка за низкую цену. Да, короткая, но я считаю это даже плюсом, ведь со временем идеи иссекают, а небольшая продолжительность позволяет наполнить игру наиболее интересными загадками. 
 Загадки не сказать чтобы особо гениальны, но держат планку интригующих. На протяжении всей игры тип головоломок меняться и даже комбинируется, что заставляет осваивать новые механики. Я считаю это довольно сильным плюсом, как для головолоки.
 Визуал - приятный. Конечно немного абстрактный и даже футуристичный, но ничего выдающегося. Приятный, не режащий глаз, фон.
 Игра приятная и дала мне именно то, чего я ожидал - набор головоломок разной степени тяжести. Эта игра заслуживает прохождения. Да, возможно не совершенна, но она играется приятно и без каких-либо проблем.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063825413', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 804, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1649615864}
review:
Ein einfaches Rätselspiel. Wie fand ich es?

[b]Gameplay[/b]

Bei den vielleicht 100 Leveln muss man Plättchen mit augezeichneten Linien so vertauschen, dass diese Linien zusammenhängen. Dieser Rätseltyp wird dann verschiedentlich variiert, z.B. Flächen statt Linien, oder man kann die Plätchen auch drehen, oder 3D statt 2D, etc.

Die Rätsel waren nicht sonderlich schwierig, aber mir lag das Rätseldesign auch. So hatte ich nur bei manchen Rätseln etwas zu tüfteln. Durch logische Annahmen und etwas probieren ging es aber immer zügig voran. Ganz offensichtlich, dass man mit diesem Rätselprinzip schwere Rätsel machen hätte können, wollte man aber nicht.

[b]Technik[/b]

Das Spiel präsentiert sich eher minimalistisch. Fast kein Menü, keine Erklärung (war auch unnötig), kein sonstwas. Angenehme Hintergrundmusik gab es immerhin dazu. Bedienung mit der Maus problemlos. Dass man das Spiel diesmal mit Esc beendet, hätte nicht sein müssen.

[b]Sonstiges[/b]

In 1,5h war ich durch und hatte damit die einizge Errungenschaft freigeschaltet.

[code][b]In Zahlen für mich persönlich ein Unterhaltungswert von 7/10.[/b][/code]

Ein einfaches Puzzlespiel etwas anderer Art. Zum entspannten Zeitvertreib geeignet.

[hr][/hr]
[i]Dies ist mein subjektiver Spieleindruck. Für meine Wertung zählt, wie gut es mich unterhalten hat. Entsprechend der Daumen nach oben oder unten, abhängig davon, ob ich es einem ähnlich gesinnten Spieler weiterempfehle. Der Spieleindruck eines anderen Spielers kann aber durchaus stark davon abweichen.[/i]

Eine andere Sicht auf das Spiel findet man beispielsweise [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/VeryImpressed/recommended/499440/]hier[/url].

PS: Screenshots werden nur scheinbar gemacht, aber irgendwie nicht richtig verarbeitet.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025016532', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 274, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1643914096}
review:
This is a short, but sweet puzzle game, featuring mostly intuitive puzzle design with a minimalist approach to graphics and puzzles.

The music and sound effects are just fine (nothing extraordinary, but who needs them for a game like this?!?), the graphics are more than sufficient, and there is a wide variety of puzzles to solve, with the basic fundamentals changing every 10 or 15 levels or so.

I do have one serious caveat, and that is that the point of the puzzle is rather opaque from time to time, i.e. what you have to do to solve it, vis a vis the actual game mechanics required to achieve a win-state, and sometimes what that win-state will even look like are not always broadcast clearly to the player (if you look at a playthrough or Steam guide, it will usually become apparent what it is you were supposed to be working towards to "solve" the puzzle, but it is truly not always clear at all without outside help).

All in all, despite the occasional bafflingly arcane puzzle, this was a mellow little puzzle game that was a joy to play through.

Recommended.

review:
・パズルゲームが好き
・少し変わったパズルをしたい
・サクッとプレイできるゲームが欲しい
・低価格で満足できるゲームを探している

そんなあなたにお勧めしたい！
なんの説明もなくゲームは始まり、パネルを回したり入れ替えたりしながら形を作っていく。
ただそれだけなのにギミックに引き込まれ、特にゲームの好みもなく適当にゲームしているだけの私にはハマりました。
なにより、完成した時の達成感がすごい！！！！

リラックスしたいときや何も考えたくない、そんなときにぜひどうぞ。




Steamキュレーターしています！
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/42775020/]紅茶とスコーンとPCゲーム[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198025089345', 'num_games_owned': 2174, 'num_reviews': 2934, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 224, 'last_played': 1643353000}
review:
~非常不错的抽象解谜游戏~
一共82关卡，指南里有解谜成功的截图！
目标是把线连接起来或者将圈圈显示出来！
~从一开始的替换方块到旋转方块最后到拖动方块~
~从一开始的线段到圆圈到最后的不规则拼图~
最后那种拖动方块的方式需要稍微费点脑子~就像小时候玩的那种拼图小玩具~
[h1]~虽然听说游戏有不同的解法，但是我就不想费脑子~
~1小时完成82个关卡解锁成就~全成就撒花~[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198045898829', 'num_games_owned': 280, 'num_reviews': 122, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 143, 'last_played': 1643129027}
review: Klocki is a simple puzzle game about connecting shapes and symbols together to form one complete, unbroken figure. It has echoes of the Witness, removing the world and boiling the experience down to a pure puzzle form. You can complete the whole thing in about an hour and it's worth it to play it either all in one shot, or a few levels at a time as a quick distraction. Simple fun!

review:
Выскакивает The END - орешь NOOOOOO!!! Несколько видов головоломок в одной - складываем фигуры, соединяем линии, передвигаем и поворачиваем плитки, находим правильную раскладку уровней... Очень приятно, на пару часов. Прекрасная музыка, "блокбастерные" звуки при победе. Эпилептикам играть осторожно, яркий свет, яркие цвета.
Немного других уровней (и даже одна новая игровая механика) на https://www.kongregate.com/games/targaciej/klocki

review: Gra jest co prawda krótka, ale naprawdę pomysłowa, a przy tym tania, więc nie widzę powodu, byś jej nie kupił i zrelaksował się przy niej przez następną godzinę. Bo tak, choć zagadki z samej definicji mogą nie wydawać się relaksujące, to w tej grze są miłe dla umysłu i nie naciskają, żeby ciągle myśleć. Jeśli poczujesz się zmęczony, po prostu odejdź od komputera i wróć za chwilę. Gwarantuję, że jej oprawa graficzna i prostota mechanik w niej zawartych nie pozwolą ci się długo gniewać.

author: {'steamid': '76561199182106707', 'num_games_owned': 93, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 935, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1637288133}
review:
这游戏很便宜，但质量可以说是非常不错了。
       [b]在谜题设计方面[/b]，游戏的目的可以说是十分简单——所有关卡都围绕着连线/拼接展开，但开发者在表现形式的设计上下足了功夫——包括从平面谜题到立体结构的高低维度变换；从直接对换线段到旋转再到华容道式移动线段。
       而在这些谜题模式的编排上，每种模式的数量都恰到好处，让人感觉摸到门道却又不至于感到腻歪。在每种模式过了几关后，作者会安排一个综合前面几种模式的关卡，有一种总结与呼应的味道；这些总结关初看有点难度，但思考过后往往能快速解出。
       游戏的难度设计比较合理。整个游戏大多数关卡都不难，而且在仅有的几个难题后面，作者会紧跟着安排一个简单谜题让你舒缓你刚经历大量思考的脑壳，这一点与一般解谜游戏越来越难不同，可能这与作者紧紧扣住的休闲游戏定位离不开关系。同时难度曲线较为平滑，每种模式的开头一两关难度比较低，让你摸索规律，不至于像某些整蛊游戏“你已经知道1+1=2了，现在计算几个积分”。
       [b]游戏的UI和美术[/b]走的是简洁风，配色的运用和谐、不刺眼，看着非常清爽；配合线段格子移动时简短流畅的动画，给整个游戏带来了一种轻盈灵动的游戏体验，非常舒服。
       当然[b]缺点[/b]还是有，第一个是谜题难度不够（确信）；第二个是UI缺失一些必要功能，比如关卡间的移动，只能通过画面下方左右按钮一个一个切换，如果日后还想再次游玩某一关会非常麻烦。

author: {'steamid': '76561198139079932', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 89, 'playtime_forever': 248, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 241, 'last_played': 1637202083}
review:
# Gra polega na układaniu łamigłówek złożonych z klocków. Jest to gra logiczna. Pomysł na grę oraz wykonanie techniczne są bardzo dobre. Zwraca uwagę dopracowanie szczegółów. Graficzny minimalizm był tu najlepszym wyborem, ponieważ nie rozpraszamy naszej uwagi na oglądanie grafiki, która w tego typu układance niczego nie wnosi. 
# Gra ma jednak wadę. W grze o tak wysokim poziomie trudności powinna znajdować się wmontowana opcja pomocy polegającej na podpowiedzi dla gracza, która byłaby możliwa do opcjonalnego uruchomienia podczas rozgrywki. Gra posiada bardzo wysoki poziom trudności, w szczególności w bardziej zaawansowanych układankach, w końcowych etapach gry. Osobiście musiałem podglądać poradniki Steam, i na pewno nie ukończyłbym gry bez użycia poradnika. Podejrzewam też, że bardzo wiele osób nie jest w stanie ukończyć gry własnymi siłami czyli bez poradników. Dla jakiego procenta graczy jest to w ogóle możliwe? Moim zdaniem raczej dla mniejszości. 
# Podsumowując: jest to bardzo udana układanka logiczna, ale moim zdaniem trudna i koniecznie potrzebny jest opcjonalny poradnik wmontowany do gry.
# Grę POLECAM !

author: {'steamid': '76561198976470367', 'num_games_owned': 220, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1637034508}
review:
Começando pelo preço excelente, pelo tempo que demora para completar. Achei bem dinâmico, a cada período novas mecânicas, que encaixam perfeitamente para a categoria e que não se usam a mesma mecânica e apenas dificulta no jogo todo, e começou com níveis fáceis e dificultou aos poucos, isso é bom.
<Péssimo: 0; Ruim: 0,5; Bom; 1,0; Ótimo: 1,5; Perfeito: 2,0>

Dificuldade: perfeito (fácil-mediano)
Preço: ótimo (2 pila)
Dinâmica: perfeito (achei criativo)
Mecânica: perfeito 
Qntd. Fases (em relação a dificuldade): ótimo

9/10: a dificuldade aumenta, mas nem tanto e isso faz um jogo, nessa dificuldade, se tornar algo "rápido" de zerar. Então por mais que tenha 50+ fases, a dificuldade não ajuda. Algo que possa ajudar seria mais fases ou dificultar mais. E o preço é porque 2 pila é desmerecer o jogo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198293765626', 'num_games_owned': 347, 'num_reviews': 456, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1632733528}
review:
정가 1,100원 짜리 퍼즐게임

상당히 재밌게 플레이했다.

구매후 추후에 안 사실이었지만 

이 게임을 만든 제작사의 또다른게임 HOOK도 꽤나 재밌게 플레이했었다.

------

같은 방식의 퍼즐이 계속 나오는것이 아닌 스테이지 진행에따라

여러가지방식의 퍼즐이 나온다 

그렇다고 아주어려운 난이도는 아니며, 총 클리어까지는 작성자 기분 딱 1시간,

다만 스팀 트레이딩카드를 얻기위해선 약간의 시간이 더 필요한듯하다

1시간에 딱맞춰끝내니 총 3개중 2개만 얻더라..

가격대비 아주 괜찮은 퍼즐게임이었다

추천

author: {'steamid': '76561197995075774', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1632604969}
review: Klocki to śmiesznie tania, wciągająca i zadziwiająco dobra gra logiczna. Rozwiązywanie coraz trudniejszych zagadek umila relaksująca muzyka. Grafika jest może minimalistyczna, ale zarazem bardzo ładna i co najważniejsze przejrzysta. Kolejne mechaniki są wprowadzane stopniowo i powoli mieszane z poprzednimi. Z czasem robi się coraz trudniej. Polecam, bo naprawdę nie ma się tu do czego przyczepić.

review: This game looks super simple, but extremely fun. The soundtrack, aesthetic, is absolutely perfect for people who love games with a good soundtrack and aesthetic. I give a 9.5/10 -0.5 because of the steam achievements. There should be a couple more achievements at least. Having only 1 achievement is great, but could be better.

author: {'steamid': '76561199096168620', 'num_games_owned': 288, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1626706434}
review: 如果你玩久了大作，想放松清醒一下头脑，那买它准没错了，推荐直接打折直接入Relaxing Puzzle Box捆绑包的9个游戏，都是非常棒的休闲解谜游戏，流程在1小时到4小时不等，无论是音效还是画面都让人放松，这才是纯粹的解谜游戏。玩法上也不用担心，每过几关就会有新规则出来，让你保持新鲜感。这系列的游戏基本通关就能全成就，只有Art Of Gravity要看一下，不过也很简单，就是为了让你专注于游戏本身的乐趣。

author: {'steamid': '76561198293242374', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1627578959}
review: I got lost in this game for only a short hour, i am only a few away from beating this game but I have already thought of my review. klocki is one of those games that are worth the small price, if you like a short pleasing puzzle game that isnt that hard to learn i would recommend picking this game up. The puzzles arent the hardest thing if you use your brain and when you think it through but when done correctly can make for a very rewarding experience. I would recommend this game to anyone who likes to sit down and have a calm and relaxing time but at the same time keeping your mind busy. 8/10 a little short and almost perfect.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078646492', 'num_games_owned': 371, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1625942734}
review:
Really charming little game. The mechanics were not explained but didn't need to be, they were intuitive enough and there was enough variety in them that the game never got grindy, every level had something going for them...
For a seasoned puzzle gamer it never gets that difficult and while it is a bit short (yes, playable through in one hour) it's a fun hour.

author: {'steamid': '76561198402830281', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1625753943}
review:
I rarely write reviews on Steam because most of the times I feel like I have nothing to add that wasn't already said. However, with klocki I just couldn't fight the temptation! The game is actually one of the best, if not the best, puzzle games I've ever played. And although I haven't played many, it still really stands out for me.

klocki takes a minimalistic approach to puzzle games with it simple art and... lack of any sort of menu. The latter is the only issue I really have with this game – it is closed by pressing the "Escape" button, and while it may be a quick and simple way to close a game, many players will press the button expecting it will open a menu, where they could switch the game from full-screen to windowed, for example (turns out that it [i] is [/i] possible to do somehow, but I couldn't figure out how anyway). Levels in klocki are also not numbered, so if you want to replay a specific level you'll have to find it manually by going back one level at a time. The game has one single achievement, and I really appreciate it.

Everything else in klocki I loved. Its puzzles aren't repetitive thanks to several different mechanics presented to a player, and they complement each other well in many levels. I felt myself engaged in completing all the levels and it was very satisfying! The game is easy enough to be fun and relaxing for a casual player like me, but not too easy that there's no challenge at all. I mean, I'm not good at puzzles, and klocki was the first puzzle game that I didn't cheat in by looking up guides for some of the harder levels. And that not only because it's isn't that difficult, but really more because I was intrigued and excited and wanted to do them on my own. Colors and design of klocki deserve their own praise – they're very simple but so pleasing to the eye!

I completed the game in around 90 minutes, which is an appropriate game length, especially for such a low price.

If you haven't already played klocki I can definitely recommend it. Even if you're not that into puzzle games, this one is just pretty, short, and cheap, and it can be a nice introduction to the genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056980805', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1528241494}
review: Fun puzzles. Variety of difficulties. Pleasant graphics.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172456318', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1684995277}
review:
Klocki is a delightful relaxed minimalist puzzle game. 

The game has great pacing and introduces simple and easy to understand mechanics slowly so that when it gets more complicated you are fully prepared for it. 

Another positive is that its levels are short and snappy and really respect your free time and allow you to dip in and out with just one push of the escape button which is really respectful of those of us with little free time.

If you're looking for a gentle puzzle game and are short on time this game is for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198389378707', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1642514031}
review: 完结留名 难度合理 音效还行 总体不错 可惜就是不能自己选关

author: {'steamid': '76561199183785297', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1625165590}
review: Klocki is satisfying. I find with minimalist puzzles, sometimes it's easy to zone out and keep trying things until you stumble on the right answer, but something about Kocki's mechanics kept me engaged and feeling like I was really working the puzzles out rather than fumbling through them. Very cool. Very short, but it's cheap!

author: {'steamid': '76561198263629390', 'num_games_owned': 654, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 340, 'last_played': 1625132235}
review:
早期买的挂卡小游戏，先挂的卡，实际流程一个小时左右即可通关
难度属于简单的，毕竟被放在了Relaxing Puzzle Box里，
放松是真放松，没有进度显示又是循环关卡，又回到第一关才会意识到通关了
推荐买给小孩子玩，我是认真的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198959371325', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 364, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1624855564}
review:
[h1]단순함과 다양함의 조합[/h1]

'Hook' 의 성공적인 출시이후에 개발사가 다시 출시한 퍼즐게임.

컨셉은 다르지만 저에게 다른 흥미를 느끼게 해준 게임이였습니다. 
전체적으로는 깔끔한 디자인에서 알수 있듯이 심플한 퍼즐게임이지만 
사실 그 안에는 다양함이 존재합니다. 
한가지 컨셉으로만 퍼즐을 푸는 것이 아닌 
여러가지 방식을 혼합하여 퍼즐을 풀어나가는 게임입니다.

난이도를 'Hook'과 비교하긴 어렵지만 저의 경험으로는 
가볍게 퍼즐을 풀면서 즐기기 좋은 난이도라고 생각합니다.


[b][In English] - Translation to help my foreign friends understand.[/b]

[h1]Combination of simplicity and variety[/h1]

It is a puzzle game that the developer re-released after the successful release of 'Hook'.

Although the concept was different, it was a game that made me feel different interests. 
Overall, as you can see from the clean design, it is a simple puzzle game, but in fact there is variety. 
It is a game that solves puzzles by mixing various methods rather than solving puzzles with only one concept.

It is difficult to compare the difficulty with 'Hook', 
but I think it is a good difficulty level to enjoy while solving puzzles lightly.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004883087', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 55, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1623134067}
review:
Once again I'd love to have a neutral opinion button here. If you want a simplistic puzzle game go check out Scalak. It has a better value for your money. 

The game is okay, but stays a bit too simplistic for it's worth. The game ended just when the complexity started to challenge for the first time. I wish there would've been twice the content we have here with the difficulty ramping up for the rest of the levels. I'd be willing to pay multiple times the current price (1€) for that. Alas, that's not the case here. The music is very simplistic though I didn't manage to burn out on it in the hour I played the game. The sound effects were a bit jarring, especially the swiveling sound. I was about to mute the whole game when it ended just for that hollow drum sound.

author: {'steamid': '76561197997740965', 'num_games_owned': 8003, 'num_reviews': 2015, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 123, 'last_played': 1617288056}
review:
[h1] Порция спокойствия... [/h1]

[code] Заканчиваю обозревать головоломки от задорного Maciej Targoni, ибо прошел всю коллекцию доступных игр с наслаждением и даже фанатизмом! Разработчик невероятным образом угодил всем любителям качественных головоломок, но все же этого показалось слишком мало. Хочу добавку, жду новых игр! [/code]

Доброго времени суток! Вот и подходит к концу мой забег по играм от Maciej Targoni. Я бесконечно влюблен в стилистику и механики, что всплывали в играх от этого разработчика, так что голубые пальцы на обзорах к его играм не просто стоят, а сверкают синевой во все стороны! Предлагаю и вам примкнуть к скромной базе фанатов, а попутно размять извилины под забористую мелодию из щелчков и звуков шестеренок.

klocki - казуальная головоломка, которую можно осилить за час, ибо она оказалась наиболее простенькой среди всех своих собратьев по разработчику. Вас ждет смесь атипичной мозаики с элементами упрощенных пятнашек. И пусть все это звучит довольно уныло, но на деле вы будете щелкать уровни, радуясь каждой победе. Компьютерные игры должны развлекать аудиторию, а klocki именно этим и занимается, но даже не думайте встретить чего-нибудь действительно сложное в этой игре.

[h1] Рисуем цепь, гадаем по черным пятнам. [/h1]
klocki крайне разносторонняя игра, но это присуще всем головоломкам обозреваемого разработчика. Игрок привыкает к какой-нибудь определённой механики, а спустя пару уровней встречает совершенно иные условия для победы, что привносит массу удовольствия и разнообразия в игровой процесс. После освоения нескольких подвидов игры, друзья мои, нас закидывают в тандем из всего материала, что мы умудрились пройти, а это уже и сложнее, и веселее одновременно.

Игрок будет соединять элементы в общую картину, замыкать лабиринты, повторяя принцип водопроводчика, расставлять по периметру элементы, дабы сохранить баланс свободного пространства между ними, метаться между 2D и 3D плоскостями, крутить-вертеть все грани по отдельности, а после использовать все это дело на общих уровнях, взрывая себе мозг обилием объединённых механик. Игра действительно удивляет своими трюками, но я ждал несколько иного уровня сложности, ибо закадычному любителю жанра будет излишне просто.

[list]
[*] Рабочие достижения.
[*] Сладкая цена!
[*] Время прохождения ~час\полтора.
[/list]

[h1] Красками по холсту. [/h1]
В очередной раз нас ждет приятный минимализм, разбавленный мягкой палитрой цветов, которая так нежно обнимает глаза, что я хотел просто проглотить все кубики, фоны и остальную мишуру! Плавные анимации и потрясающие звуки тоже радуют нервную систему, призывая поскорее пройти какой-нибудь уровень, дабы услышать сладострастный звук батутных прыжков. Музыкальное оформление  никак не успевает надоесть, да и  в целом гармонирует с происходящем на экране. Да, друзья, именно гармония и предельная медитативность отличает klocki от более колких конкурентов, которые так и не нашли своей аудитории. 

Разработчик трезво смотрит на свое детище, так что людей желающий может пощупать игру, откинув пару десятков рублей в сторону автора. На скидках игру вообще отдают за копейки, что должно подтолкнуть к покупке даже самых привередливых из вас. Наличие коллекционных карточек и достижений идут приятным бонусом в общую копилку плюсов игры.

В итоге перед вами достойная головоломка, которую не стыдно посоветовать всем друзьям и случайным прохожим. Игра красивая, мелодичная, в меру сложная и откровенно дешевая. Если вы любите качественные головоломки, то обязательно пополните свою коллекцию копией klocki! Лично мне очень понравилось, почему, друзья, желаю вам приятной игры, до связи! 

Хочу поблагодарить всех за отдачу и лайки, берегите нервы и избегайте шлака в магазине.
Если понравился обзор, то приглашаю в свою новую группу:
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/39102887-Sad-Jelien/

author: {'steamid': '76561198021442265', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 224, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1617923635}
review:
A short, casual puzzler that revolves around moving and reorienting shapes and lines. You'll get about an hour of it, but that's certainly worth a dollar, especially since it can be replayed after some time passes.

The first twenty or so puzzles are incredibly easy, but keep going since the mechanics ramp up a bit afterwards.

There's no actual interface or puzzle numbering - you're done when you get the only achievement.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115820587', 'num_games_owned': 3074, 'num_reviews': 351, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1486902751}
review:
Puzzle game. Puisqu'une petite vidéo vaut mieux qu'un long discours et qu'expliquer le fonctionnement de ce jeu est un exercice en soit, je laisse les curieux aller mater le "trailer" du jeu de la page Steam en cliquant sur l'image. Mais en gros, il y a des cases, on les bouges, on les tourne, les intervertis, afin de créer un chemin de lignes.

Bon, graphiquement, c'est pas la joie. Et l'unique musique, quoique pas désagréable, se contente d'une boucle de 10 secondes environ, mais là n'est pas l’intérêt du jeu. Plusieurs mécaniques viennent les unes après les autres au travers des 80 niveaux, histoire de renouveler un peu l'expérience. Le jeu n'est pas trop difficile, quelques niveaux vont demander au joueur de tâtonner un peu, mais même les niveaux "taquin", chose que je déteste, ne m'ont pas parus compliqués.

1€ pour 1h de jeu, pas de menu, pas d'option, pas de carte Steam à farmer, pas de succès, ce qui donne un jeu sympa pour combler une dent creuse mais trop peu ambitieux.

author: {'steamid': '76561198994480610', 'num_games_owned': 245, 'num_reviews': 73, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1616226725}
review:
游戏还算比较很简单，花了半个小时左右就通关了（剩下的时间主要是给用来回味），但是立体的解密模式加上不错的配乐使其成为了一款不错的解密游戏，轻松的配乐很适合放松的时候玩。总的来说值回票价。准备以后给孩子分享（老单身汉吃桃中）
最让我觉得不错的地方是最后一关全是爱心，这一点设计很不错。

author: {'steamid': '76561198169101977', 'num_games_owned': 564, 'num_reviews': 198, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1613525777}
review:
Головоломка на механике паззла.

Каждый уровень — это обычно трёхмерное поле. Мы можем менять местами пару плиток в пределах одной плоскости. Цель — восстановить линию или фигуру.

Игра постепенно обрастает механиками: если сначала мы действуем в одной плоскости, то потом попадаются более сложные фигуры; круглые плитки можно вращать, а чёрные плитки любят одиночество. Есть и другие механики.

Мне показалось, что игра не до конца раскрывает свой потенциал: часть механик не взаимодействуют между собой и разделены условными главами.

У игры нету настроек экрана, приходится сидеть в полноэкранном режиме.

В целом же игра оставляет приятные впечатления, стараясь держать средне-лёгкий уровень задач все 45 минут.

[i]Куплено как часть набора [b]Relaxing Puzzle Box[/b].[/i]

review:
Relaxing little game. It has several different concepts for you to toy around, but it never becomes difficult. The simple sound effects make solving the puzzles satisfying.

I completed it in an hour. It has several limitations that prevent it from being stretched beyond that; for example, levels are not numbered, and the "level selection" is clunky. Has no level editor. And it does not work full-screen on Linux.

But it is good value for a dollar :)

review:
The game starts out easy (as in, "what the hell is going on here" kind of easy), then increases in complexity until some of the puzzles are quite challenging. I absolutely loved it. Pretty, relaxing, absorbing. It will only take an hour to an hour an a half, but it's worth the pennies it costs.
Two bugbears: you can't play it windowed, so I kept having to close it to check my notifications, and there is no level counter.

author: {'steamid': '76561197965984178', 'num_games_owned': 593, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 298, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 298, 'last_played': 1608936289}
review:
TL:DR. Not a too complicated nor boring puzzle game with elements of connecting things and mosaic mechanics.

This game is like the ease breeze of spring.
Light colours, mood and mechanics makes for simple and refreshing experience.
The developers have especially truly found the sweet spot of introducing a new element, letting the players experience the mechanic in easy mode, then feeling comfortable with it on a medium difficulty before throwing one into the more mindbuggling puzzles. But never did I experience any levels being too hard nor frustrating :
And new elements kept coming up which prevailed the boredom

[h1]The cube of greatness[/h1]
- Easy shapes and colours for the eyes (though I do not know if there is any mode for the colourblind!)
- A fine stepping curve
- Fair for the price! 
- Quite wellmade for its asking price!
- Suitable for playing on tablet

[h1]The voids of cons[/h1]
- The game was cleared in like 3 hours time (which is maybe a turnoff for some people)
- The rinse and repeat model of: Few levels of introduction to a new mechanic, few medium levels and then 1-2 "hard" ones with the mechanic.... became maybe a bit too predictable (not that it really matters)
- I hate... mosaic puzzles.... but luckily it was somewhat only introduced as a secondary element (but I was close to ragequitting the first time!)
- Maybe too brightful?
- Somewhat maybe too mobile ish of a game (if one hates those kind of games) BUT NO MICROTRANSACTIONS! NOR WAITING TIME

For such a low asking price especially in a bundle with sales. Oh boy, that is value for the buck! Also great for playing on a tablet (I did it through a shadowbox, but I think it should work fine in the steams app... Which means this is an overly wellmade "mobile" game, a heck better than most smartphone/tablet games!

author: {'steamid': '76561198053371429', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1609591756}
review: Minimalist puzzle game with several different mechanics that are gradually added when you progress through all 82 levels. It is easy, but not completely trivial, can be done in an hour without any guides. Fun to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071468141', 'num_games_owned': 4221, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1609548178}
review:
[h1]7/10[/h1]
玩起来很惬意的小游戏，难度适中。
不断加入的新元素让关卡不会无聊，一小时出头即可通关。
点开始游戏有时会闪退，最后还是靠sam触发成就。

author: {'steamid': '76561198027429573', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1609518029}
review:
Ein schönes Spiel. Viele Varianten machen das Puzzeln abwechslungsreich. Es ist ein faires Spiel, das sich nach und nach selbst erklärt. Es ist nicht allzu schwierig, ab und zu musste ich schon etwas grübeln bzw. lässt es sich mit ausprobieren lösen. Zumeist gehen die Rätsel zügig und bieten kurzweilige ruhige Unterhaltung. Laut Steam habe ich 1,4 Stunden gebraucht. 
Die Hintergrundmusik ist vielleicht eine Spur zu mystisch, doch das geht in Ordnung, lässt sich bei Bedarf abschalten.

Ich kann das Spiel 100% empfehlen und empfehle es gerne weiter!

author: {'steamid': '76561198843482136', 'num_games_owned': 1908, 'num_reviews': 366, 'playtime_forever': 158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 158, 'last_played': 1607929327}
review:
一个小时通关不至于，我差不多一个半小时通关（手动滑稽）

比较失败，到70多关才真正发现诀窍，前面看了两关的攻略，后面就开始平推了。

没有什么引导，通关基本要求就是图案边界不能有线或者图像，整幅图案比较规律（支离破碎肯定不能算成功啦）

一个诀窍就是，永远有一部分只有一个（或两个？）选择，按照穷举法挺简单的。

仅仅一个小品级的解谜游戏，质量尚可。难度3/5

author: {'steamid': '76561198041972321', 'num_games_owned': 352, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1606996694}
review:
A quite simple and short game. Don't go into this because you expect tons of content or really difficult puzzles. At its core, this is a way to relax by sliding some blocks around and solving puzzles of a relatively low complexity while listening to soothing sounds. Most levels introduce a tiny new little twist, where existing mechanics are combined in different ways, or new mechanics are introduced. As such, it never gets old.

Its biggest flaw is the lack of a clear indicator on how many levels you have left to go. The minimal interface made me unsure if closing it would save things, so I felt compelled to complete it all at once. But with a total length of 1-2 hours, it isn't the worst shortcoming.

author: {'steamid': '76561199101199002', 'num_games_owned': 369, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1607039274}
review: A terrific little game, simple and not very long but worth every minute. Klocki has a groovy vibe and a medium difficulty level that can be finished in under two hours, and you might want to return to it in bits to solve a puzzle every now and again like I did. Completely worth it for a few dollars spent.

review:
This is a "puzzle" game in the same sense as a "jigsaw puzzle".  You find "edge pieces" and then look through all the pieces to find more pieces that fit your edge pieces. There is only minimal problem solving, so I would not recommend if you find jigsaw puzzles boring.  

It's also very short,  I completed all the levels in less than 40 minutes.

author: {'steamid': '76561199083077840', 'num_games_owned': 76, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 179, 'last_played': 1605280313}
review:
Klocki (was übrigens "KLOZKI" ausgesprochen wird, und nicht "KLOKI") ist eines der schönsten puzzle Games das es meiner Meinung nach auf der Spieleplattform Steam gibt. Für einen Euro bekommt man hier ein super laufendes spiel mit einem schönen Soundtrack , und nach drei stunden spielen kann ich sagen das das Geld sich echt lohnt. ich habe es nach drei Stunden geschafft alle Level zu beenden mann kann es aber auch schneller schaffen. Der echt gute Soundtrack sorgt während dem spielen für eine echt gute und entspannte Stimmung.
Das Spiel ist zwar schwer/knifflig aber es macht echt Spaß! die Level werden bis zum ende immer schwieriger aber, man lernt sehr schnell wie man alles in den Level bedient. Außerdem wird das spiel nie langweilig und echt jeder kann es spielen.
ich empfehle das spiel jedem der nebenbei Gerne knifflige Puzzle spiele spielt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030516476', 'num_games_owned': 5534, 'num_reviews': 465, 'playtime_forever': 510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 510, 'last_played': 1531407838}
review:
Klocki est un jeu de casse-tête minimaliste, vendu pour une poignée de centimes, il vous occupera le temps d'une pause café.

Il vous fera réfléchir mais sans jamais vous frustrer, la musique y est agréable, son gameplay est original et très amusant.
Certains puzzles sont plus difficiles que d'autres mais rien de bien sorcier non plus.

Du même développeur vous pourriez aimer aussi [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/kamikaze62260/recommended/367580/]HOOK[/url].



[code][h1][b]Si vous avez apprécié cette évaluation et souhaitez en lire d'autres venez suivre ma [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/39072619/]page de curation[/url].[/b][/h1][/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198349310770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1604127215}
review:
46分でクリアしてきました
盤面で模様を合わせていくパズルゲームです
思ったよりも感覚的に解くことができました
段階的に新しい要素が増えたり難易度が上がっていきましたが突然難しくなったりなどということは感じなかったのでいい具合に遊べると思います

ハロウィンセールで買いましたが定価でも価格以上には楽しめると思います、おやつ感覚でパズルをやってみたいなという方におすすめです
ギフトで誰かに送るのもいいかもしれませんね

改善点を上げようと思えば、クリア後に特定のステージをやりたいとなると今のステージの前後のステージへ移動を繰り返さないといけないところが面倒かとは思いましたが、私としては満足感があったので問題ないと思います

review:
재밋는 퍼즐게임. 

처음엔 기본 원리를 이해하는데 중점을 둔 쉬운 문제 중심.
중후반엔 기본 원리에 여러 변칙적 원리를 적용한 난도 있는 문제 중심.

도전과제는 1개, 올클리어시 달성하는거 뿐이지만 이 게임 정말 달달하다구~!!

강력추천임~!

author: {'steamid': '76561197973072467', 'num_games_owned': 316, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1602348060}
review:
klocki is a short and stylish puzzle game. The puzzles gradually increase in complexity. Unfortunately, I found my enjoyment of it to be waning the further I progressed. The core pieces of the puzzles got more annoying to interact with and the puzzles more and more tedious to complete. You go from simple clicking to tapping to swiping to turning and then need to do all of it in the same puzzle. Eventually, I just wanted to be done with it and move on. I didn't feel that the puzzles got any more challenging; the way they are designed you can solve them quite easily with trial-and-error alone never really needing to think. Instead, puzzles simply became more laborious.

Verdict: Not too bad for 99c, but maybe save those for something more engaging.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003896212', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1602197991}

author: {'steamid': '76561198121112670', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 278, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1601865976}
review:
Klocki is a simplistic puzzle game where you complete and connect shapes and wires by moving squares around on multiple cubes.  Played using a mouse, beat it in 1.1 hours.  Difficulty is easy to moderate in parts.

Pros

- The concept and how to play are both easy to grasp.  It starts out baby-grade easy and introduces new concepts after every few levels.  

- The whole game is therapeutic.  The music is chill, too.  If your'e stressed out, this is the game for you.

- There's a certain level of fulfillment you'll feel when completing the harder puzzles.  

- There is 1 full achievement to gain.  

- It's one penny less than a Dollar.  $


Cons

- There's no menu and the only way to exit the game (That I've found) is ESC - which takes you straight out the game without any preamble.  Thankfully the game will remember what level you're on when you come back.

- Like the last con, with no menu there's no way to select levels individually.  If you want to play again, you start from the beginning.

- The game is unforgivingly colorful and bright.  It flashes brighter when you match pieces and select tiles, and flashes white when you beat a level.  There's no way to tone it down any.  For light-sensitive people, it'd give you a headache.   The light doesn't blink on and off repeatedly in quick succession or anything.



In the end, Klocki is a simple, super cheap puzzle game that will keep you entertained until you're out of levels.  It feels a little short and I wish there were more levels and a way to tone down the colors, but for the whole 99 cent price tag you'll definitely get what you pay for and then some.  Recommended for the puzzle lovers out there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088539629', 'num_games_owned': 1226, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1601702219}
review:
klocki is a fun little puzzle game that leaves you wanting more.

In klocki, your goal is to rearrange the squares in the puzzle so that all the lines either connect up in a loop or end in a proper terminal. It starts off simple, but as you progress further through the game, more mechanics are added on, such as squares that can't be moved but can be rotated, squares that slide around instead of swapping or the ability to move sections of the puzzle around.

The game never gets truly mind-bendingly difficult, but ramps up to a quite fun level, and solving some of the later puzzles is very satisfactory. Unfortunately, the game is also fairly short, and would definitely benefit from having more levels to it. Still highly recommended if you want to kill an hour going through the puzzles though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198114798255', 'num_games_owned': 865, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1601746019}
review:
Como bien reza la descripción del título, nos encontramos ante un sencillo juego de puzles de carácter minimalista. Tanto es así que ni siquiera dispone de un menú de inicio, sino que literalmente nos lanzará al ruedo nada más arrancarlo. Sin embargo, pese a su simpleza, lo cierto es que logra crear unos desafíos bastante interesantes y estimulantes. Nunca imposibles, ni de broma, pero sí lo suficientemente complejos como para que no perdamos el interés durante la hora u hora y media, según lo mucho o poco que os atasquéis, que puede llegar a durar.

Así pues, si lo que buscáis es un juego de puzles sencillo, pero con mecánicas bien pensadas y ejecutadas, que os invite a relajaros gracias a un bonito, agradable y relajante trabajo audiovisual, esta es una más que digna alternativa.

review:
第一阶段：这是智商检测器吗，智商有个60都能做了吧。
第二阶段：哇，这谜题设计的，巧夺天工又不失美感。

author: {'steamid': '76561198154411534', 'num_games_owned': 79, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1601168379}
review: A simple, minimalist puzzle game that is offered at a cheap price. There's no menu, no instructions, the escape key closes the game (I found out about this by accident when I was trying to bring up a pause menu). In my personal opinion, this game is perfect when you want to take a quick break from whatever you're doing, because you don't have to play until the next checkpoint so you can stop at any time, the puzzles are fairly intuitive so your mind won't go back to this game when it's time to focus on your task at hand (i.e., work or an online class), and its simplicity allows you to relax for a bit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198873581241', 'num_games_owned': 86, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1601049492}
review:
Um excelente jogo.
Klocki conta com diversas mecânicas diferentes para resolução dos problemas. 
Além disso, em inúmeras ocasiões, o jogo une essas várias mecânicas de resolução na mesma fase.
Ademais, para aumentar o desafio, o jogo trás a tridimensionalidade, tornando as fases mais complexas.
Apesar disso, klocki não é extremamente difícil. O jogador não passará horas tentando resolver uma única fase.
Portanto, klocki é divertido e inteligente ao mesmo tempo. 
Recomendo fortemente esse jogo.

Ps. A arte do jogo é linda!

review:
Congratulations, Maciej Targoni, to another wonderful small but never little puzzle game with an enjoyable lot of interesting ingame puzzle mechanics. Never becomes boring while it lasts. 

Could have been a little longer, but as all of Targonis are below € 1.00 (just as e.g. "Hook"), you will have a lot of fun a small investment.

9.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198061022649', 'num_games_owned': 197, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 489, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1603697626}
review:
A simple puzzle game with nice ambient music. Some levels take a bit more time to solve, but nothing to complain. Pricing? Well, I've seen more expensive ad-free upgrades in Android games, where you spend half the time watching ads.

PS. "klocki" means "blocks" in Polish.

author: {'steamid': '76561198037492679', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1596405979}
review:
A relaxing minimalist puzzle progression. Slowly introduces a progression of tile swapping, sliding, and rotating mechanics, alone and then in combination, on 2D and then 3D surfaces.

The goal is always to create one or more complete / closed shapes with no open ends terminating on the edges of tiles. While most levels are simply a gentle twist on what game immediately before, the goal is occasionally ambiguous, or elements (such as turning handles) can be mistaken for being part of the intended track when they are not. A very few of the puzzles are quite challenging, and the penultimate level is a satisfying kind of "boss-fight" puzzle that presents a Frankensteinian combination of all major rearrangement mechanics and shape styles seen throughout the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198421399626', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 264, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1595668217}
review:
(Disclaimer: this game can be finished in less than 2 hours. My playtime is longer than that, because I want to earn Steam trading cards to sell them.)
This 'puzzle' game features more than 80 easy puzzles. It's fine for young kids, but for other people, especially puzzle game fans, they're unchallenging and unsatisfying. Even the hardest ones are insults to people's intelligence.
Conclusion: if you are looking for challenge when buying this game, you will be disappointed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198798143635', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1595606719}
review:
【どういうゲーム？】
[h1] 直感でできるシンプルなパズルゲーム [/h1]

【言語】言語が出てこないため必要なし

【難易度】簡単
【実績解除難易度】超簡単(実績は１つだけなので)

【プレイ時間】1.3時間



【総評】
すごく頭がスッキリしました！
他の方が書かれている通り、ギミックに飽きが来る前に新しいギミックが登場して、
最後まで全然だらけなかった！
パズルはちょうどいい難しさで、最初は簡単でしたが徐々に難しくなっていき、
ラストあたりはすこし悩みました。
解けたときほんと気持ちいいです…！

このお値段で全82問、そしてこのクオリティ…
制作者さんすごすぎでは…？(語彙力0)

100/100点

author: {'steamid': '76561198077161308', 'num_games_owned': 1297, 'num_reviews': 203, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1594496719}
review:
OIC.

An ultra short simple puzzler that probably doesn't have a steep enough climb and then plateaus when the difficulty does show up. That's not to say you aren't going to get stuck on at least one puzzle. But the first half breezes by in the blink of an eye as the solutions are obvious. Then when the challenge shows up it never ramps up much higher even though new mechanics and twists are added. I think this is due to some mechanics leaving obvious orientation clues. Sure, you go from just swapping tiles on a plane to rotating entire sections of tiles on a side of a three dimensional shape. It seems like your brain should be melting but it holds form. Some of these more complex mechanics have the aforementioned obvious orientation clues though, and as long as you make those moves before sliding, rotating and swapping individual tiles; Well, you're set! You've already reduced the complexity back down to a previous set of rules. Or something like that. Maybe I'm just the dumb monkey who happened to type up Shakespeare. It all just made way too quick of sense to me. Either way, minimalist aesthetic, pretty colors, calm ambient music and an hour killed giving the brain a little wrinkle. All for pennies! Recommended.
