author: {'steamid': '76561198055915711', 'num_games_owned': 1034, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1532915340}
review:
[h1]Игра – как медитация.[/h1]

[code]Казалось бы, головоломки нужны нам для того, чтобы подпитывать наш мозг мыслительным упражнением, так же, как физическим мы следим за состоянием мышц. Бывают сложные, бывают простые - разноплановые в общем-то говоря. Но в обоих случаях им переодически нужно отдыхать.[/code]

[i][b]klocki [/b]может показаться ужасно простой, отчего назреет вопрос: «Что-то здесь  не так?» Почему? Потому что это правда, признайте это и всё. Юлить незачем, вы сами это осознаете, когда пройдёте все уровни до конца, а кто-то признает это уже походу игры. Меня лично это расстроило, потому что я ожидал большего. Это моя ошибка, никто в этом не виноват.

Многие признают, что смена игровых механик, их комплексное смешивание - идёт игре на пользу, иначе становится скучно. В подобных играх это усложняет процесс, застав игрока врасплох. Интуитивно проходить становится тяжелее, приходится быть внимательным и вникать в процесс. Как только ты привыкнешь к одной механике - сразу же появится другая.

Меняются они довольно часто, приятно разбавляя рутинный, на первый взгляд, процесс. Правда сложности от этого не прибавится, думать придётся крайне редко. Всё это похоже на зарядку для глаз. Почти на каждом уровне визуально ясно, как и что должно выглядеть в итоге. Нам же нужно только всё соединить, а здесь это дело плевое. Грустно, честно говоря. Да, нечего ждать за такие деньги, но от других достойных головоломок, стоящих наравне по цене - я получил гораздо больше удовольствия. 

Красочная палитра цветов - радость для глаз. Здесь идеально выполнена работа. Никакого раздражающего эффекта и полное погружение в процесс. Музыкальное сопровождение, конечно же,  тоже не оставит вас в печали. Здесь, как и в визуальном плане, постарались. 

За klocki я сел раздраженный, повязший в болоте мыслей и чувств посреди ночи, с головной болью. У меня было навязчивое состояние - пройти всё не останавливаясь, будто бы мне от этого станет легче. И правда. Глаза мои расслабились, уши отдохнули, да  на душе стало полегче.

[b]  К чему это я? Учитесь отдыхать, Друзья. В первую очередь от самих себя. Эти головоломки идеально для этого подходят.	[/b][/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198290567982', 'num_games_owned': 1710, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 688, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 688, 'last_played': 1532959065}

review:
It's pretty relaxing to play and I had a good time with it! And though parts of it are challenging, it slowly builds up to that. With no time or turn limit (at least, that I know of) it's pretty fun to tinker with even when it takes a while to complete the levels!

The graphics are also very clean and appealing!

author: {'steamid': '76561198008059406', 'num_games_owned': 4581, 'num_reviews': 426, 'playtime_forever': 14, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1531241028}
review:
양산형 퍼즐게임

싼게 비지떡이라고
진짜 비지떡임

싸서 그렇다 치자라는 말을 빼면
재미가없다.

미니멀리즘을 추구한다고하는데
그렇다고 그래픽 외적 요소까지 미니멀리즘으로 갈 필요는 없다고봄
퍼즐이 너무 단순하고 쉬워서 푸는맛보다는 일하는 맛이 난다.

이건 도전과제 양산형게임들이랑 그 느낌이 비슷한데
zup 초기 시리즈 보면
의미없는 클릭
의미없는 도전과제
이런데

요 게임이 딱 고느낌이 남

너무 쉬워서 한 라운드당 푸는 속도가 30초 내외이고
이것때문에 아이큐 테스트 문제랑 아무차이가 없어지는것같다.
게임하는 느낌이 아닌 일하는 느낌이 점점 드는 이유임

author: {'steamid': '76561198307103084', 'num_games_owned': 519, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1531193776}

author: {'steamid': '76561198126809623', 'num_games_owned': 542, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1530992307}
review: It's one of a few well made minimalist puzzle games. There's a free Flash version online that has some of the the mechanics, so you can play that for a bit to decide whether this is the kind of game for you. I got through all 82 levels in about 45 minutes (played longer to get the trading cards), and the last few combine every mechanic in the game to provide some very challenging puzzles, but not so challenging that novices will be turned off from them. Give this one a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198114697595', 'num_games_owned': 324, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1530981674}
review: 以前没玩过接水管类游戏，刚开始觉得挑战性上来了就结束了，用时74分钟。给好评是因为“全”成就太容易了，而且难度设置比较适当，每当新的拼凑办法介入的时候关卡都会有从易到难的过渡，基本没有挫败感。

author: {'steamid': '76561197991477148', 'num_games_owned': 621, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1530978106}
review: klocki is a fun little puzzle game, perfect for using your brain but not being frustratingly difficult. It starts off relatively simple and then gets increasingly complex as the different concepts you pick up along the way start to be combined in each puzzle. Definitely worth it for 99 cents.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047804426', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1530810274}
review:
Ein kleiner Puzzle-Snack für nen kurzen Abend.
Man klickt, dreht und verschiebt, bis sich alle offenen Linien verbinden.
Für Puzzle-Anfänger gerade richtig und für kleinen Preis ein guter Einstieg in die Puzzle-Welt.

Schlichte Grafik und ein bischen Sound sorgen eher für volle Aufmerksamkeit an den Puzzles.
Das Spiel hätte zwar gerne länger sein können, aber dann hätte es mehrere Puzzle-Variationen geben müssen.
So lieber ein gute Stunde gut unterhalten, als öde & nimmerendende Klickerei.

Gut, aber halt auch nicht mehr.

Meine persönliche Bewertung:

review: klocki is a short but sweet puzzle game. It starts off deceptively simple, but gradually introduces three-dimensional thinking and a ton of different mechanics. It is also very aesthetically and aurally pleasing — particularly the levers that you can jiggle rapidly to make funny bouncy noises. Recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198401112269', 'num_games_owned': 669, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 145, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 145, 'last_played': 1530254120}
review:
[b]Um título que é exemplo de design.[/b]

[i]klocki[/i] é um jogo que traz puzzles minimalistas, com sonoplastia gostosa e níveis bem pensados. As mecânicas são introduzidas gradualmente e é normal atravessar os níveis quase que por intuição, sem ficar batendo a cabeça na parede. Na verdade, a ideia do jogo é justamente contrária ao estresse, porque a trilha sonora e os barulhinhos são relaxantes e satisfatórios.

O jogo é curto mas muito bem feito, o preço é baixo, as cartas são relativamente caras e o 100% dele é de apenas completar. Por tudo isso, recomendo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198196781194', 'num_games_owned': 857, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 335, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1584984663}
review: One of the many great original minimalist puzzle games on Steam. It can take up to three hours to reach the end and it has a lot of replay value because it will be a long time before you memorize the solution to each puzzle. It starts out easy, but gets harder and it changes up the mechanics every few levels or so, this prevents the game from ever getting stale. It teaches you how to play the game without tutorials or instructions. Simple to understand, yet challenging to beat. This game is smart and it makes gamers feel smart too.  For only $1, it's definitely worth having in your collection.

author: {'steamid': '76561198331411221', 'num_games_owned': 5285, 'num_reviews': 178, 'playtime_forever': 806, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 806, 'last_played': 1516828078}

author: {'steamid': '76561198254980549', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1530458753}
review: Tolles Game für zwischendurch und wenn man 1€ Steam-Guthaben übrig hat und nicht weiß was man damit machen soll!

author: {'steamid': '76561198220081212', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 89, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1530463949}
review:
Simplistic mechanics but interesting game. Bought for 20% off in the sale, would happily have paid full price.

Despite there being no text/instructions, the mechanics are very easy to pick up and are introduced gradually, and then slowly combined to make for a decent learning curve. I enjoyed this a lot - some moments to make you think once multiple mechanics are involved in the same level but nothing that took much more than a minute or two's thought. Hour and a half playtime includes full completion, messing around trying to see if any menu options, and wandering off to make/eat a sandwich halfway through.

Pros:
Simple, easily understood mechanics.
No text, so perfect for any language.
Suitable for wide ranges of ages.
Background music/sound effects unobtrusive but clearly indicate success (and can be turned off).
Simple but pleasing graphics/colours.
Decent learning curve.
Doesn't feel repetitive.


Cons
There's no level reset as far as I can see, but I don't think you can actually get to a point where you're irretrievably stuck.
Not really sure about replay value, perhaps after a couple of months have passed?
No level select - once you've completed all levels you can click through them in sequence, but you can't go directly to the one you want.
More levels would be nice. (No idea how many there actually were - felt a little on the short side, but not too bad given the price point).

review:
Play time is the time I took to beat it +~20 minutes.
It's a short game with rather light difficulty but it introduces new concepts constantly so the puzzles don't really get stale. 
At this price it's really hard to complain about the lenght. A puzzle game that overstays its welcome leaves you with a bad taste. I felt this one explored its mechanics to completion and ended right there, as it should.
5/5.

author: {'steamid': '76561198176034347', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1543409187}
review: A short game. The small price seems fair, since it's possible to play the game as flash for free, just with a bit worse visiuals. One thing I like, that may not appeal to some people is the minimalistic menu. At least for me it was easy to figure out. This game has the potential for community levels, which i doubt will be added, since the dev would have to make an intuitive level maker. Still, it woild be nice to see something like that.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024434868', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 159, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1529501633}
review:
This is one of those puzzle games which makes you think out of the box by gradually increasing the difficulty by showing you new mechanics which you later have to coperate to find and make patterns. 

Pros :

- Relaxing and smooth gameplay
- Easy to 100% 
- Easy but not THAT easy either. Some puzzles were tough.
- Cheap

Cons :

- Only bad point that I have is the fact that to change the resolution you need to hold down the "Shift"-key while launching the game. This should be added as a feature in game when you press the ESC button. Nothing major but still quite annoying when it launched in fullscreen mode.

Overall :

A short and sweet puzzlegame which I find is worth the pricetag. It's also an easy game to complete for achievementhunters so yes, I recommend this game fully! //VincentMusic

author: {'steamid': '76561198101454711', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 81, 'last_played': 1529266099}
review:
[h1]About the game :[/h1]

klocki is a small size small price puzzle game.

[h1]What I like :[/h1]

Gameplay - Simple and challenging gameplay by arranging tiles to make lines or dots at first. Then in the later levels, the game add the element of spinning the tiles and sliding puzzle.

Steam Trading Cards - The game drops cards.

Soundtrack - The music is relaxed. It perfectly fits with the gameplay and visual styles.

Pricing - The price is reasonable.

[h1]What I dislike :[/h1]

User Interface - It is not friendly to user. It does not display how many levels are.

[h1]Conclusion :[/h1]

The game is like a small exercise for thinking and solving puzzles.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11208, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1528989229}
review:
Klocki is a simple, minimalist, casual puzzle game.    Arranging tiles like dominoes to makelines or dots.  In later levels, the tiles spin instead of being dragged and dropped.

As far as puzzle games go, it's one of the better ones, but the entire game could easily be done in Flash in a web browser.

As common sense guidelines tell us, if it can be done in a web browser, it doesn't belong on Steam.

review:
1小时通关（后面的时间在挂卡），与其说是解谜游戏，不如说是拼图游戏，只要不停试错就行了（“错”还不多，试几次就能找到）。
不过游戏质量还是不错的，游戏的配色、音乐都很舒服，值得一玩。

author: {'steamid': '76561198367894395', 'num_games_owned': 1164, 'num_reviews': 713, 'playtime_forever': 232, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1568767694}
review:
모바일로 해도 다소 아쉬운 분량일 수 있지만, 플레이 경험이 아주 긍정적이어서 개발자의 다른 게임도 해 보고 싶어진다. 머리를 비우고 스트레스 받지 않으며 풀 수 있는 난이도라, 도전 정신의 고양보단 힐링에 목적을 둔 퍼즐이라고 할 수 있겠다. 초초강점은 화면의 사이즈를 매우 작게 줄일 수도 있다는 점. 종료도 너무 쉬운 ESC. 빠르게 닫힙니다. 무엇을 위한 팁일까요.

review:
That. was. awesome.

Here's a short, but very well crafted puzzle game.  

It starts off easy and ramps up with lots of variables added in as you go along.

author: {'steamid': '76561198171352013', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 118, 'last_played': 1527568721}
review: 总体来说挺有趣的一款小游戏，通关时间大概在一个半小时以内，画面颜色清新配合BGM让人玩起来很舒服。游戏难度循序渐进，几个谜题综合起来以后也很有意思，在6块钱的这个价格里算得上是一款比较棒的作品了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198076721797', 'num_games_owned': 915, 'num_reviews': 778, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1606078897}
review: Short and simple but it gets at least decently interesting by the time the game ends - which took me under 40 minutes front to back, but, it was enganging enough at the very least. I feel like the game could've done more to combine its different elements in interesting ways - the game introduces mechanics in waves and then only ever unites them for a small few number of puzzles near the end, I would've preferred a more gradual buildup of ideas instead of the way the game presents them all separately without uniting them, though this is a trend I've noticed with the developer's games in general, though their latest seems to have resolved that to some extent at the very least. But yeah, short but satisfying little puzzle game, not a ton else to say.

author: {'steamid': '76561197988141088', 'num_games_owned': 148, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1527543720}
review:
Résumé :
Klocki, c'est un un petit puzzle game original qui vous occupera environ 1h-1h30. 

(-) Les moins :
Je regrette le fait que les niveaux ne soient pas numérotés et donc qu'on ne sait pas où on se situe dans le jeu.
Le fait de se baser sur les lignes est facile à comprendre, mais vers la fin on a des formes biscornues dont les couleurs se confondent avec le décor et je ne trouve pas ça très agréable.

(+) Les plus :
On comprend vite le principe, c'est orginial, le petit son de fin de niveau donne une agréable sensation d'accomplissement ^_^

Conclusion :
Pour son originalité et son prix (inférieur à 1€), il vaut définitivement le coup.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128901897', 'num_games_owned': 269, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 197, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1672075231}
review:
Composto por 82 níveis, klocki é um divertido e desafiador jogo de puzzle. Sim, o jogo é curto, mas considerando o baixo preço cobrado, vale o investimento, principalmente se você o adquirir em promoções. Com um visual bonito, boas mecânicas e um grau de dificuldade moderado, trata-se de um ótimo game de puzzle para relaxar, passar o tempo e treinar seu raciocínio lógico.

[url=https://www.portale7.com.br/2018/01/analise-do-jogo-klocki.html]Análise completa[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198008543369', 'num_games_owned': 895, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1558977813}
review:
I'm obviously in the minority with my review, and honestly I would give klocki a neutral rating. But since it's not an option, I give it a thumbs down just as a warning for hardcore puzzle fans.

At it's very basis, kocki is a good puzzle game: it builds the puzzles smartly, you have to figure out the rules, which are introduced gradually. But ultimately it fails to live up to expectations: it's way too simple, the puzzles are straightforward, there are no dead ends, you never ask yourself what to do next.
It's a relaxing, simple put-the-pieces-in-their-desired-place game, not a real headcracker - if you're looking for the former, then give it a shot, otherwise avoid.

author: {'steamid': '76561198424345861', 'num_games_owned': 62, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1525451294}
review:
[h1]ピースを移動させて絵柄がそろうように繋げていくパズルゲーム[/h1]

極限までシンプルなUIと、常に流れている落ちついたBGMで目の前のパズルに集中できる。パズルを解き終わった際に流れるブゥゥゥゥゥゥン…という効果音が癖になる。

価格に対してボリュームがかなりあるように感じる。しかし、絵柄や解き方のパターンがいくつも用意されプレイヤーを飽きさせない。後半になると複合パターンが出てくるので一筋縄ではいかないところも面白い。

行き詰ったら時間を空けて再度挑戦してみるとあっさりクリアできることもあるので、焦らずにプレイできれば面白いと思う。

author: {'steamid': '76561198063633680', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 197, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1500206619}
review:
Played a few levels every morning at the crack of dawn with my coffee, until I beat it in a few days.

Has to be one of the most soothing puzzle games I've tried, and I have quite a few on my account. I finished it a bit sooner than expected and would love some sequels. :)

11/10, most chill and enjoyable puzzle game I've ever played.

author: {'steamid': '76561198825367832', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1523883502}
review: One of my favourite puzzle games, ever. Without explanation, it eases you in with the simplest imaginable problem: swap two pieces by clicking on them. As you progress through the puzzles, more and more elements are revealed: tiles that change colour and shape depending on whether they're touching or not, levers that rotate parts of the game board, tiles that can only be swapped, that can only be slid, that can only be rotated. Eventually you're confronted with problems that use four or five elements in ways that are truly confounding. It's never cruelly difficult, and sometimes if you're baffled you can chance upon a solution unexpectedly just by plugging away at it. It's a lovely, relaxing mental workout.

author: {'steamid': '76561198400842130', 'num_games_owned': 19, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 512, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1640490476}

review: I was distinctly impressed by the excellence of both the aesthetics and execution of this game - especially for the price. The music and vivacious art style was minimalist and perfectly themed for an enjoying experience :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198025478065', 'num_games_owned': 736, 'num_reviews': 355, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1527292938}
review:
Klocki, c'est un peu la même sensation que celle que l'on éprouve quand on fait éclater du papier bulle.
Le jeu a une esthétique plaisante, les sons sont agréables et la musique ambiance yoga est relaxante.
Je ne sais pas si on peut qualifier Klocki de puzzle game parce que les énigmes sont vraiment simplistes mais avec un prix aussi bas, il n'y a pas vraiment à hésiter.
Cependant, Klocki a l'air plus adapté aux smartphones ou tablettes, dommage aussi pour l'absence de compatibilité manettes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198132996949', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 111, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1506634634}
review:
放鬆+自信提升用 (?)

很適合普羅大眾的輕度解謎，不像有些曲高和寡的純粹高端解謎除了艱澀還是艱澀
縱使沒有故事性，但光看彩度適中、圖形圓潤的風格，就能讓人感受到這是一個放鬆、輕度遊玩，比政論節目或是連續劇更適合用來放鬆的小品
雖然邏輯沒有到非常多元，但也有洽當的拿捏好難度和關卡的設計，不會老梗用到底讓人覺得有一半的關卡是用來拖台前，硬要增加遊玩時間
總之整體非常推薦，而且超級便宜WWW

author: {'steamid': '76561198291065376', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1523402089}

author: {'steamid': '76561198077262425', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 276, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1644598855}
review:
Die Optik ist bunt und chique, der Sound ist gemütlich atmosphärisch und zugleich fast etwas etisch.
Die Puzzles sind genau richtig herausfordernd, so dass man nicht verzweifelt, aber trotzdem am Ende den lohnenden "Aaaah, cool"-Moment hat und sich gut fühlt.

Sehr liebevolles Ding, schade, dass es nun vorbei ist :-(

author: {'steamid': '76561198000797503', 'num_games_owned': 150, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1551110710}
review:
Es un juego de concepción y ejecución muy simple: puzzles de conectar líneas.
No tiene ningún tutorial y tal vez hiciera falta para entender algún mecanismo, aunque experimentando un poco se puede llegar a entender el funcionamiento todo sin problema.
El número de niveles es algo escaso y la dificultad, aunque va en lógico aumento, no es muy elevada. Yo lo he terminado en menos de hora y media, contando con que lo he dejado abierto mientras hablaba un ratito por el móvil.
Intenta ser un juego para desconectar de los estudios o del trabajo, hacer unos niveles escuchando música y vuelta a la rutina. En ese sentido, y viendo que no vale ni 1€ (yo lo pillé por menos todavía con oferta) no está nada mal.

author: {'steamid': '76561198441475383', 'num_games_owned': 596, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 240, 'last_played': 1522957117}
review: Very good chill-out , zen-spirited puzzle game.  There's a fair amount of different puzzles with new mechanics and patterns. 잘만든 퍼즐게임. 엔딩이 어딘지는 모르겠으나, 다 깨면 아쉬울듯 ㅠ,ㅠ

author: {'steamid': '76561198002945013', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 129, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1522120291}
review:
Finished in an hour, enjoyable game for the price. (MYR2.55)
Puzzles are not too difficult nor too simple. I think it hits the 'just right' spot where you feel satisifed finding the solution and yet do not feel frustrated cranking your brain for the solution.

author: {'steamid': '76561198331555490', 'num_games_owned': 1519, 'num_reviews': 900, 'playtime_forever': 251, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 251, 'last_played': 1558921092}
review:
Hook 제작자가 만든 단순한 퍼즐겜으로, 선과 도형들을 모두 연결하면서 퍼즐들을 해결하면 되는 간단한 방식으로 게임이 진행된다.

플레이 시간은 짧은 편이지만 간단한 룰과 편안한 디자인으로 퍼즐겜을 잘 못하는 사람들도 즐길 수 있는 게임이며, 가격도 저렴하니 한번 해보는 걸 추천한다.


여담) 개인적으로는 HOOK 보다는 난이도가 올라갔지만, 그래도 게임 자체가 다른 퍼즐 게임들과 비교하였을 때 그렇게 어렵지는 않은 정도이다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198102979483', 'num_games_owned': 677, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 89, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1521223791}
review: Un excellent jeu à acheter dans un bundle pour un prix encore plus faible pour le double de fun! klocki est un jeu de puzzle incroyable, avec une superbe B.O. et des niveaux qui peuvent nous prendre la tête pendant plusieurs minutes! Les dynamiques de gameplay changent au fur et à mesure de l'avancée dans le jeu et finissent par s'additionner les unes aux autres

author: {'steamid': '76561198796099842', 'num_games_owned': 34, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 77, 'last_played': 1520693379}
review:
Bardzo fajna gra logiczna! 
Plusy:
- minimalistyczna oprawa graficzna która jest (według mnie) wystarczająca
- niska cena (ja kupiłem za niecałe trzy złote) 
- po przejściu każdego poziomu słyszymy niesamowity dźwięk pochodzący prawdopodobnie z wioski aborygenów w Australii który dodaje nam otuchy do przechodzenia następnych poziomów xd

Minusy:
- gra jest (moim zdaniem) za krótka

Ogólnie polecam ją każdemu kto lubi gry logiczne i każdemu kto szuka alternatyw dla innych gier (na przykład gdy twoje rodzeństwo nie chce grać z tobą w warcaby bo uważa że są nudne xd) 

Ocena: 8/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198313432047', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 167, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1527187748}
review:
令人惊喜的好玩，当然到后面也是令人惊喜的难。在这里引用一句对解密游戏最好的评断：解谜游戏应该是在玩家突破了最后一点点之后，得到答案时候，心里想着“草，老子真他妈牛逼”，而不是“草，老子终于他妈过关了”。这款游戏，一定是前者。尤其是多种多样的解谜玩法，但又始终遵循着冥冥中的平移变换，散而不乱，气脉中观，刻画了一个美观有趣的变换解谜世界，也同时能看出程序的判断的优秀结构。

+清丽的色彩
+丰富的解谜内容
+恰到好处的难度和长度
+轻快的音乐和音效
-没有目前所在关卡提示

（4/5）非常棒的解谜游戏，请购买并尝试着去取下成就吧！

author: {'steamid': '76561198181814875', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1520736933}
review:
82关的一个解谜游戏，感觉还不错。通篇没有文字提示，都是采用放一个简单关卡告诉你接下来这一组关应该是怎样的规则。大体的规则是连成连续的图案，线不能断线，图案要圆滑。关闭音效以外的设置统统没有（或许是我没找到？），平时我打这类休闲游戏的时候都是窗口化，同时干点别的，貌似这个只有全屏。
[8/10]

author: {'steamid': '76561198096742168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 208, 'playtime_forever': 449, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1590404651}
review: Puzzles puzzles everywhere. This one kept me busy. I like those little old slider puzzles where you re-arrange the tiles to fit the picturte. This reminds me of those for sure. It even loosely reminds me of Pipe Dream, one of my all time favorite games that I haven't played in many years. If you want some new puzzles and have some spare change this game is as good as any. I tend to scoop games like these up on sale at least once a month to keep the puzzles fresh.

author: {'steamid': '76561198215987504', 'num_games_owned': 133, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1519233305}
review:
接水管进阶版，风格宜人，动效顺滑，给第一次玩的小朋友提个醒，中期出现的【圆形手柄】是按住可以旋转，只点击是没有用的，这游戏也不给个说明，第一次遇到的时候一脸懵逼。
不能选关，全程一个小时到一个半小时左右。
极简解谜游戏包里买的，推荐。

author: {'steamid': '76561198085786159', 'num_games_owned': 238, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1519197800}
review:
Klocki is a small but fun and interesting puzzle game.
It only took me a bit over an hour to completely finish (not enough to get all the cards, even), but despite this it's pretty well worth the money, mostly because its not that expensive.
It also introduces new mechanics at a fairly steady pace, which is always good.
The music, GUI, and graphics also aren't very intrusive, leaving the primary focus on the puzzles themselves.
If you like fun puzzle games with simple mechanics but hard puzzles then you'll like this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980164371', 'num_games_owned': 769, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1527295437}

author: {'steamid': '76561198028010905', 'num_games_owned': 2184, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1518836015}
review:
[h1]게임 특징[/h1]

Klocki 는 플레이어에게 아무 것도 가르쳐주지 않습니다. 게임에 새로운 요소가 들어가는가 싶으면 그때만 난이도를 살짝 쉽게 보여주는 듯한 퍼즐 게임이죠. 하지만 이것이 이 작품의 최대의 백미입니다.

플레이어는 아무것도 모른채 우선 화면에 보이는 것을 이것저것 조작해보기 시작하죠. 그러면 알게 됩니다. 보이는 각 블록간의 구성들이 '막연하게 뭔가 짜임새 있게만 보이면' 스테이지가 클리어 된다는 것을 말이에요. 나머지는 다양한 퍼즐 요소가 등장하며 끝까지 짜임새 있어 보이는 모습을 만들어주기만 하면 끝나는 아주 간단한 작품입니다. 전반적으로 몽환적 분위기를 띄기 위해 그래픽을 단색처리로 표현하려는 경향이 강하며, BGM 연출도 비슷하게 흘러갑니다. 


[h1]게임 평가[/h1]

이 작품은 가지고 있는 점이 단 하나밖에 없을지도 모릅니다. 바로 '규칙' 이죠. 그래픽에 크게 무언가를 투자한 것도 아니고 특별한 인터페이스나 시스템 요소도 보이지 않고 무엇보다 게임에 대한 텍스트가 단 한자도 보이지 않습니다. 그런 점에서 이 작품은 사용자가 스스로 호기심을 갖고 게임의 규칙을 알 수 있도록 한 '튜토리얼' 부분 연출방식에 아주 높은 점수를 줄 수 있었습니다. 이 작품만큼 퍼즐게임 그 본연에 충실한 작품을 보는 것도 쉽지 않겠지요. 대신 그만큼 게임의 전반적인 난이도는 낮은 편이며, 콘텐츠 소비속도가 매우 빠르게 흘러가는 점이 있습니다.

특별한 인터페이스나 텍스트의 안내 역시 전무하기에 이 작품이 총 몇개의 스테이지를 지원하는지 육안으로 식별하기는 힘드나 필자가 알아보기론 약 80개 정도가 있습니다. 일반 유저 기준으로 약 1~2시간의 플레이 시간이면 게임의 끝을 볼 수 있다고 보시면 되겠습니다. (필자는 47 분 걸렸습니다.) 그만큼 게임이 짧고 간결합니다. 특별한 엔딩도 없이 그저 마지막 스테이지는 엔딩을 암시하는 듯한 퍼즐이 등장하는 정도입니다.

가격 1000원, 플레이 시간 1시간. 아주 가볍게 게임 한판 하고 가신다면 꽤나 재밌게 즐기고 갈 수 있는 볼륨의 퍼즐게임 중 하나가 되지 않을까 생각됩니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561197984315222', 'num_games_owned': 433, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1518259911}
review:
[h1]A great puzzler.[/h1]

[b]Review[/b]
[h1]Design:[/h1]
The colors are beautifully picked and the different themes are well done. I can see this being a mobile game more than a computer game, but that's no bummer, we need more beautifully designed games like this. [b]10/10[/b]

[h1]Music & Audio:[/h1]
Solid. Very solid. The backgroundmusic and audio is cute and reasonable. It gets a bit boring after a while tho, even if you play this game in one bite. More diversity. [b]8/10[/b]

[h1]Gameplay & Addiction:[/h1]
A great game with different approaches slowly rolling in feature after feature. I like this very much. There is no better tutorial than actually playing the game and introducing new features time after time. Sadly this game is way to short. [b]7/10[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561197975413392', 'num_games_owned': 7384, 'num_reviews': 108, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1559008732}
review:
Wow, another great game from Maciej Targoni and Wojciech Wasiak!

I am a big fan of another of their games, called Hook. I discovered it about a year or so ago. Since I like to support indie developers and love a good puzzle game, it seemed like a small risk at 99 cents to try that game out due to the positive reviews.

I was, ahem, [i]hooked[/i] immediately. The game features simple, clear graphics combined with interesting (and yet still simple) mechanics, introducing new concepts along the way and then later combining concepts to create more elaborate puzzles.

Klocki follows in this tradition, but with all new mechanics. It begins with needing to switch tiles around to match up patterns and complete what resemble circuits. Honestly, at first I thought, "man, this is a little too simple. If I'm just switching tiles the whole time, this is going to get old quickly." Fortunately, right when you feel like you've mastered the puzzle, a new mechanic of rotating tiles in place is introduced. This is still nothing earth-shattering, but then the two mechanics are combined to create a more interesting puzzle.

This continues where more new mechanics keep getting introduced: rotating large sections of tiles with a "handle," broadening the solution surface from a flat space to a 3D shape (where the solution requires you to connect pieces across the surface), separating black squares to leave white dots which cannot be next to one another, sliding tiles, and a variety of "blob" shapes (for lack of a better term) which have to be assembled in such a way that the resulting shape has all smooth edges.

That's a lot of different things, right? Yep, and when all of these get combined toward the end, the last few puzzles get pretty fiendish, although you should still be able to solve even these in a matter of a few minutes. That's another thing that makes this game work: the puzzles are challenging, feel fair, are satisfying when you solve them, but never turn into such frustrating head-scratchers that you want to rage quit. It's evidence of excellent balance in a puzzle game.

It's entirely possible that you'll solve the whole thing in one sitting like I did, and that this will take less than an hour. Hey, the game's only a dollar, and you pay more per minute to go see some mediocre movie. In the end, your entertainment value here is much higher. 

I'm impressed enough with the two games I've played from these developers that I've purchased the other games they've made and look forward to trying these out as well in the near future.

TLDR: this is a must-buy for anyone who enjoys original puzzle games and likes to support indie developers. At only a buck, you should just stop reading, buy this game now, and spend the next hour playing it instead of reading reviews.  :D

author: {'steamid': '76561198262252294', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 168, 'playtime_forever': 388, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 388, 'last_played': 1517475056}
review:
画面清新的接水管小游戏。一共有八十关，我的流程在一个半小时左右。
本质上是接水管，但是作者很用心的添加了，3D啦，图案啦，旋转啦，相斥啦这些有趣的要素，让整个小游戏的趣味性和难度提升了一些。
我确实感觉到，这个开发商非常擅长制作这种益智小游戏，流程和难度都拿捏得十分到位，BGM听起来也十分舒适。
不过画面虽然清新简洁，单是某些关卡的颜色实在有些刺眼了，建议大家长时间玩耍的话，亮度还是调低点吧=。=

总结，非常有趣，流程不长，有一点难度，有零钱可以考虑买这个游戏耍耍

目前此开发商兼发行商的四个游戏已经有三个进过包了，性价比非常高，在大多数滥竽充数的包货里可以说是算的上一股清流了。
祝发行商越做越好 o(*￣▽￣*)ブ

author: {'steamid': '76561198054458823', 'num_games_owned': 194, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1517140176}
review:
Gra za 3,59 pln z ocenami przytłaczająco pozytywne. To powinno wystarczyć jako zacheta do zakupu. Dla mnie to + fakt że to gra logiczna wystarczyło i nie zawiodłem się.  Wciąga, ale nie zabardzo. Nie za trudna, nie za łatwa ot takie proste łamigłowki do rozwiązania. Szukających mega wyzwań z pewnoscią zwiedzie. Nie znajdziecie tu raczej poziomów na których ugrzeźniecie i które będziecie rozkminiać przez długi czas. Jako gra dla szybkiego relaksu w sam raz. Czy kupiłym jeszcze raz wiedząc to co wiem o tej grze? Oczywiście. 
Gra ukończona w  2.3h.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007688772', 'num_games_owned': 1263, 'num_reviews': 649, 'playtime_forever': 88, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1517005894}

author: {'steamid': '76561198059425204', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1586252412}
review: Simple and fun great. Another excellent example of how the simple games are often as good - if not better - than some of the flashy tripple A games. The puzzles are smart and innovative. Really enjoyed playing this game. excellent use of $0.99.

author: {'steamid': '76561198390657295', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 466, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 466, 'last_played': 1516982099}
review:
以這價錢來說很不錯
剛開始遊玩時還想說這這解謎方式能有多難的關卡..
結果當然是以更多樣的解謎方式呈現
初期的畫面很美，紫色滑動方塊出現後畫面就開始有點醜了
遊戲整體難度不高，摸索一下都可以過關
就這一點來說很對我胃口
不過還是要列幾個小缺點
1.沒有註明關卡數
這樣對想找解答的人來說很不方便
2.結尾有點潦草
不是說劇情的那種(畢竟也沒有劇情)
而是關卡都還沒結束成就就已經解鎖了..
3.過關時的特效有點醜
雖然以發亮/放大做為過關的提醒很有效
但對於遊戲本身的美感卻沒有加分的感覺
什麼都不動反而更適合F12

以上都只是小缺點
[b]整體來說還是非常推薦入手:3

author: {'steamid': '76561198163198787', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 157, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 75, 'last_played': 1582504784}
review:

解密方式很有趣的小游戏

author: {'steamid': '76561198323189732', 'num_games_owned': 245, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 149, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 149, 'last_played': 1516644746}
review:
Hook'un yapımcılarının elinden çıkmış yine bir bulmaca oyunu. Kafamızı kullanmadığımız sadece tuşlara basıp boş boş ekrana baktığımız oyunlardan sıkılıp ara verip birazcık bu oyunla düşünmenizi öneririm. Benim açımdan güzel bir deneyim oldu.

Bu sefer daha renkli, farklı bulmacalar bizi karşılıyor. Oyun başına oturunca kendine bağlayan cinsten. Çeşitli şekil ve çizgiler arasında bağlantı kurmaya çalışıp bir bütün elde ettiğimiz bir oyun. Bölümler seviye ilerledikçe zorlaşıyor. Bazı bölümlerde gerçekten beynim yandı. Fakat oyun 2-3 saat içinde bitebilecek kısalıkta. Keşke biraz daha uzun bir oynanışa sahip olsaydı.

Hem beyne antreman yaptırıp hem de kafayı dinlemek için renkli yapısı ve zorlayıcı bulmacaları ile indirimde 1 TL'ye alınabilecek güzel bir oyun. Tavsiye ediyorum.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025388508', 'num_games_owned': 628, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 114, 'last_played': 1515852009}
review:
just finished it, and it was a nice journey
not too hard, but not too easy either
several different mechanics that mix together make it really dinamic
would enjoy a sequel or expansion someday~

down sides: (developers, have this in mind if you plan an update or sequel)
- not much replayability, as expected, which could be solved with community made puzzles
- no extra challenges like a move counter to try doing it in as few moves as possible
- no main menu to choose levels individually, only scrolling forwards or backwards

TL;DR a slightly challenging and otherwise relaxing puzzle, limited but fair for the price

review: 色调非常软萌护眼，前期非常简单，中后期部分关卡略麻烦，图形拼贴云里雾里，六块钱可以玩到头，还是比较划算的，可以参考配色；关卡没提示略坑，要有关卡提示和进度条就更完美了！

author: {'steamid': '76561198052933734', 'num_games_owned': 4633, 'num_reviews': 571, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1494677908}
review:
パネルを入れ替えたり並べ替えたりして
正しい形に仕上げていくパズルゲーム｡

説明らしい説明はなく､次に何をすべきかが直感的に分かる系の
シンプルなパズルでありながら､ちょうどいいタイミングで
ギミックが変わっていくので飽きが来づらい｡
全82問とボリュームもそこそこあり
一問一問が簡単なのでサクサク遊べる｡

トレカ・実績・日本語対応（日本語なんて出てこないけど）｡
価格は激安｡全実績解除まで1時間｡
ボケーッとしながらだらだらやる分にはちょうど良い感じ｡

author: {'steamid': '76561198208104060', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 93, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1495994708}
review: lubie klocki

author: {'steamid': '76561198395828822', 'num_games_owned': 19, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1515129242}
review:
不到一个小时就通关了。
表示根本不够玩啊！！
就像花5块钱买了瓶饮料那样意犹未尽。

首先是游戏内容方面，通过旋转、平移等拼接插头，构成富有美感的闭合图形。
非常新颖的解谜方式，花样也层出不穷。
不足的是很多关卡都属于教程关卡（裸题），综合关卡（综合题）太少，也就导致整体的解谜难度不会太难。
不过这一定程度上也为喜爱解谜的玩家们保持了解谜的乐趣。
（关于关卡难度方面，某些关卡看似困难，实际上关卡内处处都有提示，从提示入手就很容易解出）

还有一点让我感觉买这款游戏不亏的是，游戏的画面带给人的舒适感。
游戏的画面极其简洁，甚至连开始界面都没有，全程都要靠玩家自己摸索。
加之游戏本身玩法的休闲性，完全可以作为工作或学习之余放松的一款游戏。
游戏的休闲性……也算是一种个人喜好吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561197993502256', 'num_games_owned': 2488, 'num_reviews': 232, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1515209125}
review:
Um die Ecke gedacht.

klocki ist ein kleines Denk-Spiel, wo man Felder austauscht, dreht, und durch die Gegend schiebt. Dabei ist man immer drauf bedacht, gewisse Regeln einzuhalten, die einem nach und nach beigebracht werden. Dabei ist die Vielfalt und die Verbindungen, wie man die Welt manipulieren kann umfangreich und mit steigendem Schwierigkeitsgrad eingesetzt.

Grafisch und soundtechnisch ist das Spiel eher minimalistisch, aber vollkommen ausreichend. Eine Story gibt es nicht. Hier geht es ganz allein um die Rätsel, die man lösen soll.

Wer also ein recht einfaches, aber schön gemachtes Denkspiel haben möchte, der kann sich klocki gern mal ansehen. Wer denkt, dass Denken nicht sein Spezialgebiet ist, der sollte darüber nachdenken, von diesem Denkspiel die Finger zu lassen ... denke ich.

author: {'steamid': '76561198080718027', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1651180955}
review: Awesome little game. Took me 45 minutes to play through. The learning curve is nice, the difficulty is so that you can solve all levels in one go but still feel quite challenged at times. Like Hook, part of the fun is figuring out how the parts work but since there are more different mechanics present here in the later levels the added complexity of having to find out how the different parts work together in this particular level adds a whole lot of fun and complexity. A definite must for puzzle fans looking for something fun, challenging for one evening.

author: {'steamid': '76561198428518240', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 83, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1514736792}
review:
A logic-based puzzle game completely devoid of any and all instruction, the first challenge of klocki is to deduce your controls. Following that, the game progressively introduces new mechanics which must be experimented with in order to discover how they work before you can actually solve the puzzles they're included in.

The game is short, with myself (one who typically completes games very slowly) completing the game in under 1.5 hours, but I would not count this against the game given its low price. And of course, your experience with vary depending on how much you enjoy logic puzzles and how quickly you can teach yourself new mechanics as they appear.

Overall, I would definitely recommend klocki to lovers of logic-puzzles. Avoid if dislike figuring out things for yourself.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006944005', 'num_games_owned': 3404, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1558947895}
review:
*Русский внизу

(Developer gifted me the game when I contacted him after purchasing the Android port of this game via Humble Bundle to find out whether or not there are any differenses between PC and mobile versions. He suggested that I see for myself and sent me a Steam key for free which was pretty nice of him. The game has no achievements on Android but seemed to be easier to control via touch)

Honestly at first I had thought that I was not going to recommend this game but after completing it (which takes between an hour and two if you're as bad as I am) I decided that it is definitely worth playing. It's a puzzle game where you have to turn, twist, switch places of planes of different types to make the picture composition flow. The game did not have any options menu so I could not change the resolution to make the game run smoothly on my weak ultrabook which is why the game's framerate was a bit low. I could not keep the sound effects but switch off the music because it got a tiny bit repetitive. The menu to chose the level wasn't designed well making me go through all the levels between the one that I wanted to play and the one that I was currently on. NEVERTHELESS the whole experience just got to a point that it made me adjust to its' meditative wave which made it enjoyable. The gameplay itself is quite nice with levels starting very easy and getting a bit harder level by level while introducing new mechanics where the game becomes a bit easy again so there is this nice wave of difficulty which doesn't make you feel stupid and frustrated even if you are as bad as I am with puzzle games but it remains challenging enough throughout the whole game. Also the pictures you create with the planes and the music complement the overall wavy and meditative feel of the game. The achievements are perfect to my taste. It was fun. Might be a bit too easy for veteran puzzle enthusiasts.
___________________________________

(Игру мне подарил разработчик. Я спросил его есть ли разница между версией на Андроид и версией на ПК в Стиме после покупки её в Хамбл Бандл, а он в свою очередь посоветовал мне проверить самому и отправил ключ для Стима. Разработчик очень мил, а разница между версиями в том, что на Андроид нет достижений, но управлять игрой удобнее касанием, нежели мышью, на мой взгляд)

По началу я не собирался рекоммендовать эту игру, но после полного прохождения (что займёт между одним и двумя часами, если у Вас всё также плохо с головоломками как и у меня) я решил, что в неё стоит поиграть. В этой игре Вам предстоит вращать, крутить, менять местами плоскости разных типов, чтобы в конце концов сделать из них визуально красивую композицию. К сожалению, в игре нет меню насторек, поэтому я не мог изменить разрешение, из-за чего на моём слабом ультрабуке частота кадров в секунду была довольно низкой. Также я не мог выключить музыку, но при этом оставить звуковые эффекты, потому как она стала немного надоедать своей однообразностью. Меню для выбора уровня было неудобным, потому как для того чтобы добраться до нужного уровня, приходилось пролистывать все уровни между тем, на котором я находился и тем, на который я хотел попасть. ТЕМ НЕ МЕНЕЕ, процесс моей игры дошёл до того, что я настроился на правильную медитативную волну и осознал, что мне этот процесс нравится. Он был построен подобающе, так как начальные уровни были очень лёгкими, но в процессе становились сложнее уровень за уровнем, добавляя больше разнообразия в механику игры и в эти моменты игра становилась снова лёгкой, таким образом прослеживалась прятная волна уровня сложности, которая не позволяла мне почувствовать себя глупым и фрустрированным даже учитывая насколько я плох с головоломками, но при этом игра оставалась приятно сложной на всём протяжении. Также картинки, которые Вы создаёте, и музыка отлично дополняют так называемую волнообразность и медитативность игры. Достижения в игре подобраны идеально. Мне понравилось. Но для опытных энтузиастов головоломов игра может показаться черезмерно лёгкой.

author: {'steamid': '76561198006889794', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 40, 'last_played': 1527479841}
review:
(Disclosure: I recieved this game as a free steam gift from a friend.)

Despite there not being a single word anywhere in the game, I never had confusion on what to do, sign of excellent tutorial levels.
Gradual ramp up in difficulty, culminating in levels that are very daunting, but solvable through gradual chipping away at their pieces.
Took me a bit under an hour to beat, with me playing as fast as I can, but I enjoyed every second. Sounds and movement of each variety of puzzle piece is distinct and reactive to your mouse speed, which makes the game satisfying even just to interact with and listen to.

The game also gave me some almost primal satisfaction in the act of finding order and patterns in a chaotic mess, in a way that's kinda hard to articulate. The same sort of feeling completing a jigsaw puzzle gives you.

Overall this game is Just. Plain. Satisfying.

author: {'steamid': '76561198366866825', 'num_games_owned': 6782, 'num_reviews': 123, 'playtime_forever': 488, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 461, 'last_played': 1513776270}
review:
2021/12/19 评分7.0/10.0 纯puzzle的游戏，除非玩法特别出众，否则还是差了点心意。

摸鱼两个小时通关全成就。作为小游戏，质量不错还不像某游戏卖成就还无限炒冷饭，这点就应该给好评。
游戏难度逐渐提升，最后几关是不同规则的综合应用，本来应该是最难的最后一关却是最简单的拼个爱心。[spoiler]就好像严厉的班主任在高考前突然暖心[/spoiler]
犯规啊！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198324633396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 84, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1513720908}
review:
Klocki é um jogo de puzzle minimalista que vai direto ao ponto e com gameplay intuitivo. Meu segundo jogo do 
Maciej Targoni e gosto muito do estilo baseado em movimentar quadros e peças. Levei pouco mais de uma hora para completar, mas o jogo está um bagata então valeu a pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016728868', 'num_games_owned': 241, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1513680330}
review:
Reeeally slow difficulty ramp up and the game doesn't change much. You just move the stones differently, but you are not required to think differently about the solution itself, which is the key in this kind of game.
Should have utilized more [spoiler]of the invisible feeling when you are solving shapes of the same color as background. And the rotation mechanic where you actually move whole plane to different location [/spoiler]
And giving option [spoiler] to rotate cells to change pieces [/spoiler] just breaks the game for me. There's too much freedom with that feature.
But loved the visual art changes with colors, mechanic color differentiation and that smooth feel for the whole game.
+1 for mute option, still no cross to close though :).

Hook was more enjoyable by the solution finding side, this one is visually more attractive.

[h1] Genre [/H1] Ein Nettes Kleines Puzzle Spiel

[h1] Gameplay [/h1] Ziel ist es in jedem Level die Striche und/oder Muster richtig zu verbinden. Dabei werden die Rätsel bzw. Level immer schwieriger

[h1] Pro/Contra [/h1]
+ 1 Leichtes Achievement
+ Sammelkarten
+ Günstig

[h1] Fazit [/h1] Ein "Must Have" für Fans von Puzzle Spielen. Eindeutig sehr zu Empfehlen

author: {'steamid': '76561198056223771', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1511757259}
review:
klocki is a fairly easy puzzle game where you are moving, flipping and turning puzzle pieces to get the solution patterns, which you learn as you go along.  The difficulty does increase a bit as the game progresses.  

I played through this game in one sitting and it was both relaxing and enjoyable.  I was going to stop at puzzle 69, as there is no indicator to tell you how much of the game is left.  But I managed to glean my puzzle level from looking at online solutions, not that I needed help with any of them.  You get an achievement for solving all 72.

author: {'steamid': '76561198310708865', 'num_games_owned': 73, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1513098133}
review:
Klocki to prosta (pod względem grafiki) gra logiczna kosztująca jakieś niecałe 3.60 Oczywiście warto kupić, i zaraz wymienię wam dla czego:

Plusy;
+ Ładna oprawa
+ Pasująca do klimatu muzyka
+ Pomysłowe łamigłówki
+ Brak nudy (gra ciągle wprowadza jakieś nowe rozwiązania)
+ Duża satysfakcja gdy przejdziemy jakiś poziom
+ Gra nie prowadzi nas za rączkę, nie ma tutaj nawet samouczka, wszystkiego musisz domyśleć się sam
+ Niska cena

Minusy:
- Im dalej w grę tym trudniejsze zagadki (mam grę od wakacji a nadal jej nie przeszedłem)
- Brak jakiegokolwiek menu

author: {'steamid': '76561198116193767', 'num_games_owned': 466, 'num_reviews': 99, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1512086007}
review:
[h1] Klocki - o jogo sensacional de mover pedras [/h1]

Eu comprei porque estava muito barato. 
Comprei porque tinham sobrado uns troquinhos da Summer Sale.
Peguei esse jogo porque sim... não esperava nada!

[h1] Pontos Positivos: [/h1]
[list]

[*] O desafio! Confesso que nunca imaginei que o desafio seria tão interessante

[*] A forma como o jogo reinventa sua própria mecânica e te desafia no próprio desafio. Você começa movendo pedras para formar as figuras. Depois você move as pedras e gira blocos. Eventualmente você move três tipos distintos de pedras com comportamentos diferentes, além de mover blocos inteiros e outras coisas mais

[*] O teste de paciência e atenção que os desafios vão propondo à medida que você avança nos estágios próximo ao fim

[*] Pode parecer negativo para muitos, mas existir apenas UMA conquista (a de finalizar todos os desafios) foi pra mim um "gás a mais".
[/list]

[h1] Pontos Negativos: [/h1]

[*] A trilha sonora enche "os pacovás" depois de um curto tempo (eu mesmo mutei o jogo e fiquei ouvindo minha playlist)

[*] Apesar de bastante desafiador, não posso negar que me surpreendi com a rapidez com a qual terminei o jogo (1 hora e 1/2)

[*] Alguma coisa (talvez no design, trilha ou algo mais) fez com que eu, apesar da diversão, me sentisse cansado com o jogo e nunca de fato fisgado.
[/list]
 Creio que para um jogo casual de puzzle este jogo entrega o que promete e pelo preço acredito que mereça a sua atenção:
[h1] 8 [/h1]

Faltou alguma coisa para aquele "jogo excelente" - mas é um jogo muito bom. Gosta de puzzles e desafios? Pode experimentar este game sem medo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032632811', 'num_games_owned': 888, 'num_reviews': 758, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 71, 'last_played': 1511848704}
review:
Klocki is a great of example of silently guiding functionality of mechanics through geometry and the player’s own intuition and exploration.

Despite being a short game, it all feels well-paced. New types of tiles and spaces come up very often and really make the hour fly by. You never feel like you didn’t get enough time with any ideas either.

Every time a new piece was placed, it feels great to move it around for the first time, discovering its simple function. From here you begin to see how a piece moves with other groups of itself and what patterns emerge from there. Klocki then progressively becomes more and more rewarding as you see your skills with each type of piece combine until you’ve created rules and patterns that you apply on a final gauntlet of bigger puzzles

Meanwhile, an ambient soundtrack keeps your mind clear and the occasion lower tone played after finishing a puzzle provides a nice boost of endorphin.

Klocki is inexpensive and a great brief yet complete game worth picking up for an hour of meditative tinkering. It’s also got trading cards and an easy 100% if you’re into gridding up your steam profile.
I’m found to be really enjoying the games from Steam’s [i] Relaxing Puzzle Box Bundle [/i] featuring other games from Maciej Targoni and Wojciech Wasiak. On sale it’s a first-rate deal!

review: 플레이 타임 47분... 도전과제는 엔딩 보기 하나 뿐이라 퍼즐에 조금 익숙해 지면 빠른 속도로 클리어가 가능하다. 퍼즐 자체는 창의적이고 독창적이지만 런 타임이 너무 짧고 횟수 제한이라던가 무언가 도전 욕구를 자극하는 것이 없어 반복 해서 플레이 할 이유를 찾지 못하겠다. 최소한 도전과제를 뭔가 늘려서라도 런 타임을 늘릴 필요가 있었다고 생각한다. 가격이 싼 것을 감안 하더라도 너무 짧다. 점수는 5/10? 애매하다.

review:
A nice collection of easy puzzles that appeals to my tidying-up instincts. I wish it got more difficult, but it's fine for what it is.

The sliding-square-blocks parts were kind of annoying; I tend to feel those types of puzzles are more tedious than fun, but this game gives lots of free spaces, so it's only a little tedious, and adding rotations into the mix kept it interesting.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040192124', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 502, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 326, 'last_played': 1566127272}
review: Игрушка отличная. Сложность и обучение нарастают с каждым шагом. Инструкция не требуется. Помните как раньше "ну еще уровень и пойду поссу..." Ага )))) Ей бы еще пополнение уровней, воркшоп прикрутить и вообще будет круто

author: {'steamid': '76561198003881107', 'num_games_owned': 822, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1510484757}
review:
Very relaxing puzzle game with some fairly unique, at least to me, mechanisms for piece manipulation. The type of puzzle and how you maneuver pieces was varied enough to present both a minute challenge and variety to gameplay. 

The only con is that the game was rather short; I was able to finish it in under an hour. I would like to see a puzzle creation mode for finishing the game.

review:
看似简单，但还是要动下脑筋。就是简单地用鼠标点，比较容易感觉无聊，偶尔玩玩还不错，就是配色对色弱来说有点不大友好，不过影响不大。

之前在手机里玩过这个游戏，通没通关不记得了，但是还是对前面一些关卡有印象所以过前面过得比较快，后面就不行了，要思考。

author: {'steamid': '76561198091544767', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1508255288}
review:
퍼즐을 맞췄을때 나오는 울리는 소리가 중독적인 게임입니다.
여러 종류의 퍼즐이 나오고, 후반에는 그 퍼즐들이 한 스테이지에 등장해서 여러가지로 조합하는게 즐거웠습니다. 초반에는 쉬운 스테이지를 통해 이 퍼즐이 어떤 퍼즐이라는걸 알려주지만 도움말도 함께 있었다면 더 좋지 않았을까 싶습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064139415', 'num_games_owned': 777, 'num_reviews': 411, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1509086508}
review:
Empfehlenswert: Nein (persönliche Wertung: 4/10)

Errungenschaften: Ja (Einfach zu bekommen)

Positiv:
- Einfaches Spielprinzip
- Für jede Sprache geeignet

Negativ:
- Keine Herausforderung (zu einfach)
- Zu kurz
- Nervige Musik

Fazit:
Klocki ist ein kurzes Puzzlespiel. Die Rätsel sind keine große Herausforderung. Tatsächlich sah es auf der Shopseite besser aus, als es eigentlich ist. Zugegeben: Es hat Potential, aber dieses Potential wird nicht richtig ausgeschöpft! Für 1,5 Stunden Spielzeit, ist es etwas zu kurz geraten. Es gibt keine Menüs, Texte oder Sprachausgaben, was dazu führt das dieses Spiel für jede Sprache geeignet ist. Das Spielprinzip ist leicht zu lernen und selbst wenn was neues hinzukommt, fuchst man sich schnell hinein. Nervig ist die Musik, welche ich nach ein paar Minuten abgestellt habe. Der Kostenpunkt lag bei unter einem Euro, was gar nicht mal so verkehrt ist. Es gibt 3 Sammelkarten, die man nicht in der Spielzeit bekommt (Man muss das Spiel etwas länger laufen lassen, wenn man die will) und es gibt 1 Errungenschaft, welche beim letzten Level freigeschalten wird. Es fällt mir schwer dieses Spiel positiv zu bewerten, da es wie schon gesagt Potential hat. Dennoch sage ich: Nicht Empfehlenswert!!!!

review: 个人感觉有点类似于纪念碑谷（当然实际上完全不同），配乐不错，难度也还可以（所以偶尔会卡关但是不至于经常卡）。游戏性上来说是不错的，就是玩着玩着就鸡皮疙瘩渐渐起来了……_(:з」∠)_我想这也算是这款游戏的魅力之一吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198348050599', 'num_games_owned': 336, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1615392046}
review: 益智类小游戏，网课伴侣。大概一节网课就全部结束了~里面包含了接水管和华容道等等小游戏，还是很值得试试看的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198023641448', 'num_games_owned': 161, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 72, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1508848227}
review:
游戏流程短，难度逐级提高，到后边结合了华容道和转盘，非常有新意，要是难度再高点，关卡再多点就好了。
不好的地方是没有关卡数显示，玩到第几关都不知道。

author: {'steamid': '76561198023666926', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1772, 'playtime_forever': 437, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1642217207}
review:
Wow, simple, minimalist yet beautiful and very relaxing game. 

Game challenge you more and more with every new level with more complex puzzles or introduce new one and then mix some of them in one melting pot. I must say this game is oddly satisfying to play.

You can finish this game in about hour and for1€ it is perfectly fine and I enjoyed playing it quite a bit :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198315341412', 'num_games_owned': 330, 'num_reviews': 98, 'playtime_forever': 213, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 208, 'last_played': 1527206430}
review:
[h1][b]8/10[/b][/h1] 

[h1][b]TLDR:[/b][/h1] 
Very well made, the puzzles get more difficult the farther you go. Great casual/relaxing game. 

[h1][b]Basically...[/b][/h1] 
A puzzle game with different "abilities" as you progress. You click to shift pieces on the puzzle and try to connect the lines  (pink line with pink, yellow with yellow, blue with blue, etc). Pretty simple

[h1][b]Graphics:[/b][/h1] 
Really creative and minimalistic look, which is what everyone is lovin' now. 

[h1][b]Controls:[/b][/h1] 
Click pieces to shift them/rotate them

[h1][b]Overall...[/b][/h1] 
It has great art and is worth buying, especially if it is on sale. 

[b]Pros:[/b] 
- Great art/graphics
- Creative and difficult (kinda) puzzles 
- Easy to 100% 

[b]Cons:[/b]
- None

author: {'steamid': '76561198180024629', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 99, 'last_played': 1506478945}
review:
If you are looking for a relaxing puzzle game with a nice soundtrack, then this is what you want.
If you are looking for something that is going to frustrate you with how hard it is, then this ISN'T what you want.
Engaging, but not particularly hard, it was a fun game to play when I needed something to chill out too after playing more challenging games.
Overall, its great, but it is what it says on the tin, no surprises here.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036328736', 'num_games_owned': 3959, 'num_reviews': 727, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1506726511}
review:
klocki vous donne la possibilité de résoudre de petits casse-têtes pendant moins de 1h30.
Il s'agit essentiellement de pièces à faire glisser ou à intervertir.

La difficulté est progressive et les mécanismes se diversifie au fil du jeu. L'ambiance est apaisante et les graphismes colorés.


A si petit prix, aucune raison d'hésiter.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089529864', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1506246664}

author: {'steamid': '76561198248174758', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1505545949}
review:
While this puzzle game is short enough to finish in one sitting, it was enjoyable and fun to play. There were some puzzles that confused me and got me fiddling with the puzzle, but once I figured it out, i felt a rush of relief and joy of overcoming it. The color schemes were pretty and easy on the eyes and the patterns that were formed were beautiful looking. 

They throw you straight into the game, no menu or settings other than going back to past puzzles and muting, but I think that is for the best as this is a minimalist game and a minimalist setting it best. However, there are some parts where a lack of words does confuse you for a few seconds.

Overall, this game is a beautiful minimalist puzzle game and relaxing to play with. While there is no replay value, it is a puzzle game that you can play again. A game to relax to and not ruin your day.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969749884', 'num_games_owned': 2459, 'num_reviews': 1422, 'playtime_forever': 1282, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 497, 'last_played': 1529224687}
review:
Klocki is one of the shortest yet also one of the most brilliant puzzle games I have ever laid eyes upon. It is entirely soothing while actually providing quite a challenge. The game features several different puzzle mechanics which also get woven into another and it is a joy to behold to solve smaller parts of the bigger puzzles and then watching them all come together.

Didn't expect anything and got this solely due to the overwhelming positive reviews and because it was just one buck.

Got completely blown away by the sheer amount of amazingness this little gem holds. If anyone had fun playing LYNE, you'll love this tenfold.

author: {'steamid': '76561198338295135', 'num_games_owned': 247, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1504472914}
review: 如果没有卡关的话，全部关卡通关花费的时间差不多在一个小时左右，作为一款解密类的休闲游戏挺不错的，简洁的画面，简单的bgm，还融合了华容道等众多元素，在一定程度上考校了玩家的观察能力和逻辑思维能力。在难度上也不至于让玩家卡关，即使卡关只要有耐心多尝试几次也是可以过关的。美中不足的是整个游戏的全部流程有点短，而且不能做到关卡预览，推荐玩，但是不推荐重复玩。

author: {'steamid': '76561198083736752', 'num_games_owned': 526, 'num_reviews': 148, 'playtime_forever': 163, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 163, 'last_played': 1504440907}
review:
klocki, On MetaCritic, it shows it was developed by Megabyte Bomb. Released on the PC platform on Jul 13, 2016 and is also available on Iphone,Ipad. There are no user reviews yet as of this writing. (http://www.metacritic.com/game/pc/klocki). 

On steam page, it shows klocki was developed by Maciej Targoni and Wojciech Wasiak. The same people who brought us Hook. klocki is also available on Linux.

To say klocki is just "a puzzle game" - it is a unjust description on this product. 
For me, I would describe klocki as creative, innotive puzzle game. Because it introduces mechanics/multiple combination of methods to solve a puzzle. This is what makes klocki interesting & fresh. It stand's out from the rest of the other puzzle genre games.

Controls, Audio and Visuals
It only uses Mouse control. No video/sound options. There's feedback sound on every block/click you make. The background music is light and relaxing - something very soothing.

Visually, its bright & colorful. 

Game Mechanics
klocki uses mix n match, rotating, reversi-like, number slide-like elementals to solve it range of puzzles. The difficulty gradually rises. So it does *not* shock the audience of the product. There's a little surprise at the last level puzzle. It shows this  is a labor of love.

My personal thoughts:
I don't really  play a lot of puzzle games because of my horrible past experience with them. The excruciating pain & frustration you put your mind through. The time and effort ..It feels as if my brain would [b]BURST[/b] if I continue further. 

Luckily, klocki does not put you through that sort of horrible gaming experience. There were some very tricky-crazy puzzles but it's still manageable. Overall, I was impressed with this simple, polished product. Good work with klocki, devs. Kudos. Keep up the good work.

I do have 2 points to share, hopefully the developers will take them into consideration for their future products.
[list]
[*]I would love to see a simple level design because there might be younger audience or people who are stuck in a particular level and unable to advance. It's a painful experience for them and at least with this design, they are given the option to skip a level and come back in the future to complete that particular level. This also serves as a replay-ability option and people would have an easier time making videos, showcasing klocki on youtube,etc.

I understand this request comes with revamping the whole level progression and unlocking achievement triggers. If you are unable to make all the changes for klocki, do it for future products. =)

[*]Video option: I would certainly love to play this in a window mode. It doesn't have to be full screen all the time.
[/list]


My Summary:
klocki was surprisingly relaxing and enjoyable - for me. That's not usually the case when I am playing puzzle genre games. lol. Creative mechanics, soothing audio, clean bright visual designs, I couldn't ask for anything more. It also has a fair pricing for this small scale of product. It's really worth it. I am pretty sure kloki has enough challenge for everyone; kids, teens & adults. On the scale of 0 - 10, my personal rating for klocki is a solid 8/10.

#Edit1: Had to to replace a word - else the sentence would be misinterpreted.

author: {'steamid': '76561197980538866', 'num_games_owned': 331, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1498424579}
review:
Los puzles me gustan.
No soy un obseso de ellos ni nada similar, pero me agradan.
Al igual que en "The Talos Principle" me resulta muy satisfactorio
cuando un puto videojuego reta a mi inteligencia. Una que, por otro
lado, tampoco se va a poner muy brava con estos temas, pues conoce
de sobra sus limitaciones y sabe que no es especialmente una lumbreras.

Aún con todo, la realización plena con la que se siente uno al pasarse
unos puzles tontos, no tienen parangón con nada.

Bueno, sí, con muchas cosas. Los parangones tienen esas cosas.
Que dices que no, pero al final es que sí. Es un límite ficticio.
Como pensar de adolescente que tu primera novia es la más guapa
del mundo y es la mejor. Y eso, técnicamente, no es así. Los putos
porcentajes, las probabilidades, el universo y esas mierdas. Así que
bueno, mejor vivir siempre en la ignorancia y vivir todo bien fuerte.

PD: La más guapa era la mía, no la tuya. Pringao.

author: {'steamid': '76561198406404900', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1504301340}
review: Klocki — реально интересная, спокойная логическая игра с занимательным геймплеем. Здесь нет тайминга, очков, ограничений по количеству ходов, рекордов. Основная задача перед игроками простая и понятная — необходимо соединять между собой различные типы линий, расположенные на плитках. Чтобы соединить линии в единую цепочку, необходимо правильно переместить квадратики в блоке, вращать предметы, выставляя непрерывные комбинации. Кто любит спокойные головоломки, советую.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991128699', 'num_games_owned': 255, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 221, 'last_played': 1527270547}
review:
Fun puzzle game with delightfully complicated levels. It's all about 'wholeness' or 'completion', using lines, shapes and unwritten rules that make it all more complex. Very enjoyable and original.

It would be nice to have some sort of menu, though, where I can see what level I'm on and how many are left and whatnot.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142688571', 'num_games_owned': 348, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 279, 'last_played': 1502719106}
review:
玩法独特，创意新颖的一款休闲益智小游戏7/10
+简明的玩法
+层层带入的关卡设计
+适中的游戏时长和难度（1~2小时）
-过于简单的操作界面（只能选择下一关和退出，没有其他设置，通关之后循环）
ps:虽然游戏值解密的玩法有很多（换位，旋转，移动等），但作者在设计它们之间相结合的关卡的时候并没有多么精妙的设计，难度基本和一种玩法的关卡一样，不会很烧脑
本是喜加一挂卡的，挂完之后心血来潮玩了一个半小时通的，觉得还算一款良心游戏

review:
Petit jeu d'énigme et de déplacement de tuiles comme il en existe beaucoup, mais il se différencie des autres selon moi par sa direction artistique, son ambiance générale. Dans l'ensemble des mécaniques assez faciles et répétitives, et malheureusement un jeu qui se termine assez vite (1h 30 pour ma part). 

Mais un très bon moment, et ce pour un tout petit prix. Je recommande !

author: {'steamid': '76561198164382571', 'num_games_owned': 1104, 'num_reviews': 422, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1502283251}
review:
Dans la lignée des [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198164382571/recommended/461840][i][b]Zenge[/b][/i][/url], [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198164382571/recommended/272040][i][b]Kami[/b][/i][/url], [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198164382571/recommended/266010][i][b]Lyne[/b][/i][/url] et autres [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198164382571/recommended/367580][i][b]Hook[/b][/i][/url] (du même concepteur, soit dit en passant), [i][b]klocki[/b][/i] est un puzzle-game sans grande prétention, mais au demeurant éminemment sympathique. Pour une somme tout à fait modique, il vous propose une séance de jeu dont la relative brièveté ne l'empêche pas d'être à la fois divertissant, relaxant et intéressant. Notamment grâce à des mécaniques qui, à défaut d'être révolutionnaires (il s'agit de déplacer des tuiles de diverses façons, afin que coïncident des formes et/ou des lignes), s'avèrent plutôt efficaces. 

[h1]Verdict : 4/5 - Très bon, une valeur sûre ![/h1]

[code]Vous avez aimé cette évaluation ?
Retrouvez-en d'autres en suivant notre curation : [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/9753228/][u]On les préfère froids[/u][/url].
Et pour ce qu’il vaut mieux éviter comme la peste, c’est par ici : [url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/18976233/][u]La Purge[/u][/url].[/code]

author: {'steamid': '76561198092313524', 'num_games_owned': 208, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1501483194}
review:
Klocki is a short minimalist puzzle game where you move tiles around until every tile connects into its own shape(s). There are 82 puzzles in this game, and it took me about an hour and 15 minutes to complete it. There is only one achievment for the game and it's for finishing it. The ambient music is calming and not distracting. The puzzles were interesting, but not terribly difficult (there was only one that I got stuck on for any decent amount of time - the rest of them I could move around and sort of figured it out as I went).

I think, overall, it was a decent puzzle game that is worth its price if you are just interested in a casual puzzle experience to keep your brain active. One thing I wish they had was some sort of level counter and/or a menu where it showed all the levels by number, because as it is now you don't know how much content is actually in the game until you finish it and even then if you wanted to know how many levels there actually were (like I did for this review) you would have to page all the way from the first puzzle to the last counting them yourself. Of course, this probably isn't a huge deal with those who just want to play a game and when it ends it ends, but for those wanting to know the quantity of puzzles they are paying for that little added bit would have polished the game up more.

author: {'steamid': '76561198404253604', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 133, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1510121017}
review: Good little inexpensive game with calming music and visuals. Fun to play on a touch screen, although I often played using the mouse as well. All the reviews say it'll take you an hour, but I did it at a really relaxed pace (often texting or doing other things, as I like to do with casual games...am I the only one? oh well I guess most people on Steam are like *~*Gamers~*~), and it took me an hour and a half. I don't understand the reviews complaining they got through it in 30 minutes while looking up the answers on YouTube...what did you expect? You could probably come back to this game after a while and have fun with it again, you'd just figure everything out faster the second time around.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126333506', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1500797004}
review:
Un buen juego de puzzles para pasar un rato entretenido.

Colorido y relajante; visualmente agradable, con música tranquila. No tiene cronómetro ni puntuación, puro antiestres.

Tienes que usar diferentes mecanismos que se entrelazan para resolver los  rompecabezas. Aunque la dificultad es realmente baja, te dara al menos una hora de tranquilidad.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996941383', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 160, 'last_played': 1500783755}
review: Very good puzzle game. Not at all short or easy for me. It took me more than two hours to complete it. I feel a little dumb but at least I completed it. I recommend it to everybody who wants a fun, minimalistic but hard game and wants to support such a great indie developer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198231817384', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 88, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1690367504}
review:
와 나 존나 천재겠지 하고 플탐봤는데 인간은 거기서 거기인데다가 
난 약간 느린편이였다니 씁슬하기도 하고 이제 20대 중반인데 늙었나 싶다 
가끔씩 웃음짓게하는 판이 있음 !

평가가 좋아서 처음으로 산 퍼즐게임인데
한국인들은 힐링게임따윈 닥치고 없는듯
플탐신경써서하다보면 욕나옴

머리가 좋으신 분들은 게임에서 한풀이하지마시고 REAL WORLD에서 한풀이 하시길 
애꿎은 퍼즐게임과 아이큐테스트에 열올리며 기록세우는 뭐랄까 혼자서 랭겜돌리는 것 같은 혼종들이여... 
그대는 학생이 아니라 게이머로써 평가를 남기는 건데... 여기가 학교로 보이냐? (엄마나 1등했쪄염 뿌뿌...) 
한국말에 없는 개념이라서 플밍 업계에서 쓰이는 CODING MONKEY같은 짓 하지말고 
게임의 의미가 뭔지 한번 생각해보는게 좋을듯

내가 IQ 완전 좋은 애들 여럿 봤지만 비유적 표현으로 눈앞의 마시멜로를 안먹는 애는 못봤음
인간이 인간으로써 사회를 이루기 위해서는 절제와 인내 그리고 관용을 개개인이 갖춰야한다는것을 알아두시길

author: {'steamid': '76561198174641061', 'num_games_owned': 315, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1500579099}

review: cjujсогласен со всем довольная приятная игра но не согласен с теми кто говорит что игра интуитивно понятная, некоторые фигуры которые требуется собрать не совсем стандартны и порой не очевидны и это вызывает легкое раздражение, а в целом все хорошо за свою-то цену!

author: {'steamid': '76561198077245678', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 75, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1527391940}
review:
It's one of the shortest puzzle games I've ever played (1.2 hours, that's a personal best on Steam ^^) and it starts very boring – as it's designed for the casual mobile market. I was about to quit out of lack of challenge, when the black tiles saved the day. Later on, a few other mechanics spiced it more...
Maybe a little bit too many mechanics, though, for a game that's supposedly so minimal. I wasn't fond of the sliding one (I must say I never liked sliding tile puzzles), could have done a few more fun levels and without this one mechanic.

Overall, it's still a very good, and surprisingly enough, little puzzle game.

review:
[h1]Офигенная головоломка на час.[/h1]

-Быстро проходится
-Одно достижение
-Выпадают карточки

author: {'steamid': '76561197979864325', 'num_games_owned': 2629, 'num_reviews': 501, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1500461057}
review:
На удивление интересная головоломка за приятную цену.


klocki - это тот самый момент, когда игровой процесс действительно увлекателен... когда дизайн не свербит в глазах... когда уровней не миллион и проходятся в сумме за час... когда не нужно делать однотипные движения получая за каждый "тык" по 10 ачивок... когда серое вещество в твоей голове начинает работать... 
Иногда мне казалось, что следующий уровень для меня будет непроходимым, но уровни не слишком замудренные, хотя и заставляют поковыряться и проявить своё внимание и мышление.

Одна единственная ачивка, которую вы получите сразу как доберетесь до финального уровня - отличнейшая награда. Эта одна ачивка как-то даже драгоценнее, чем 7 тысяч ачивок из кое-какой другой "игры", доступной в Steam.

Рекомендуется всем любителям головоломок. Проведите час игры с пользой)))

author: {'steamid': '76561198090593224', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1500401265}

review: 非常不错的一款解谜游戏，画面简单清新。创意十足，刚玩的时候可能不知道怎么样才能过关，但是靠自己摸索还是可以很快上手的。谜题类型多样，难一点的就是把好几种类型的谜题结合在一起。到后面越来越难。唯一美中不足的是游戏没有选择关卡的菜单，这样想重新玩一下前面的内容时必须得一个个往前跳，有点麻烦。

author: {'steamid': '76561198142428668', 'num_games_owned': 2729, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1500256864}
review: Short, beautiful, fun, and leaves you scratching your head several times. I loved the graphics and different mechanisms each level brought. While not the most difficult puzzle game in the world, it's a relaxing difficulty I enjoyed. The colorfulness and relaxing music made this a favorite wind down from the day game. This is the first game from the developer I have played, the second being Hook, and now I’m a fan. I look forward to future games by this developer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088076629', 'num_games_owned': 720, 'num_reviews': 145, 'playtime_forever': 546, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 546, 'last_played': 1498307258}
review:
Pretty original concepts for such a cheap game, can get quite confusing with the amount of different types of puzzles it features. Towards the end with the amount of tiles I did get really confused and temporarily stereoblind because you have to look at individual panels of the puzzles which messes with your head.

It's cheap, and it's not wasted money!
