author: {'steamid': '76561198244563482', 'num_games_owned': 870, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1485947516}
review:
Klocki is a cute little puzzle game. Its interface is minimalistic. There isn't even a menu! You open the game, it opens at the next unsolved puzzle. You can turn on/off sound and there is a 'back' button to go back a puzzle. That's it. There are no other UI elements, menus or buttons.

The puzzles are composed of puzzle pieces (like in jigsaw puzzles) that you can manipulate (move or rotate etc.) The goal of the puzzle is to arrange these pieces in a way to make the pattern on them 'closed'. I am not really sure how else to describe it. 

Solving them is fun and relaxing at the same time. The game is quite short and can be finished in about 2 hours.

author: {'steamid': '76561198178549103', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1581822611}

author: {'steamid': '76561198047713531', 'num_games_owned': 2085, 'num_reviews': 146, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1494660937}
review:
一个拼图型小游戏 算不上有趣 
难度极低 如同售价一样低
游戏时间也极短 没几下就通了
===========================
说说差评原因
画面简单干净可以叫简约 但是你不能连系统也这么“简约”吧
只能全屏 颜色还很亮 有些刺眼 尤其是通过的关卡再去挑战 底色瞎狗眼
没有标题 也没主菜单 上来就是第一关 
没任何操作提示 哪怕图示都没有 
设置只有静音
没有关卡选择菜单 只能上/下一关 
快速连连续上/下一关 还会卡住 必须过关或者重启才能再选关
通关后没任何提示 也没credits 直接循环到第一关
整个游戏里没有任何提示 也没有一个字 难怪写着27种语言支持 其实再写上支持精灵语 [strike]郭逼特[/strike]霍比特语 恶魔语 xi'an语 orokin语都可以 
最奇葩的是没有关闭按钮 只能按esc 直接关闭回桌面
拼图块和扳手的操作明显是触摸屏准备的 也没卡没成就 分明就是个不负责的手游移植 
方方面面综合在一起 就不是简约了 而是简陋 极其简陋

review: 这款小游戏给我的感觉和作者之前的作品“hook”类似，谜题很有趣。但不同的在于，不知为何这部作品给我带来了一些解谜成功的成就感，这是前作所没有的。另外，游戏过程中以为会花的时间比前作久很多，因为[spoiler]游戏后期出现的类似“华容道”的拼图[/spoiler]类型的谜题对我来说难度很大。。总的来说是很推荐的一款解密游戏，希望作者有更多作品~

author: {'steamid': '76561198007756933', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1494583884}
review:
[h1]Good, but way too short.[/h1]
Described as minimal puzzle game, "klocki" (literally "bricks" in Polish) is exactly that.
Game is so minimalist, that it doesn't even have menu, not even level selection menu - after you finish last level, game cycles back to first one and you can switch between completed levels by pressing next/previous level.
There is no text in game, rules are never explained, instead, progressively more complex levels are built in such a way that player will figure rules out on his own. First level has only two tiles that can be swapped, and from there, game carefully builds very complex puzzles, with myriad of possible combinations, but always solvable purely by logical analysis. Trial and error is never necessary. I very much enjoyed watching how game starts with very simple rules and then, builds something complex.

Graphic style is minimalist indeed. Simple  shapes, simple shades, and simple gradients give it clean and clear look. Music doesn't get in the way, instead works to build mood of serenity. I liked "artistic" side.

My only complaint, is that game is too short, it took me 40 minutes to complete all levels - unless you plan to replay some of them, don't expect to get more than 1 hour out of Klocki, whether it's enough to justify the price, is up to you.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999779875', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1489420235}
review:
Эта игра должна стоить дороже! 
Стремление её автора доставить нам максимальное эстетическое удовольствие чувствуется уже с первых секунд. В этой игре изумительно буквально всё: качественный звук, умиротворяющая музыка; дизайн элементов, фактуру которых так и хочется ощутить тактильно, а также искренняя детская радость после успешной сборки очередного пазла -- всё это позволяет по праву причислить данную игру к категории произведений цифрового исскуства.

11 из 10.

P.S. Уважаемые разработчики, пожалуйста, сделайте SDK для того, чтобы мы могли создавать свои уровни и делиться ими друг с другом через Steam Workshop! : )

author: {'steamid': '76561198358367235', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1484814528}
review:
Klocki jak nietrudno się domyślić skupiają się, cóż... na klockach. Zadaniem gracza jest ich ułożenie w taki sposób, aby połączyć w jeden ciąg przebiegającą przez nie linię. Początkowo wystarczy kilkukrotnie poprzesuwać elementy, ale w późniejszych etapach modyfikacje ułożenia bryły (bądź brył) potrafią zająć dobrych kilkanaście minut. Logiczna rozgrywka to jedno, ale klocki oferują również minimalistyczną, ale bardzo przyjemną dla oka grafikę oraz naprawdę niesamowitą oprawę dźwiękową.

http://www.gamezilla.pl/publicystyka/2016/09/8-najlepszych-gier-ze-steama-za-5-zlotych

review:
小清新的解密游戏。

谜题的难度不高，元素较少，前期的关卡有点重复，不能做到过几关就学到新元素，再把对新元素的破解方法应用到之后的关卡中去。导致我在前部分产生不玩的想法。

不想选推荐，也不想不推荐给差评，给个中评吧。
勾了推荐，假如有人觉得上了当，才几块钱，也不算有大损失。

review:
Идеальная игра-головоломка!
Сложная и интуитивно понятная. Множество элементов головоломки, которые нарастают постепенно и каждый предварительно дают отдельно в виде своих паззлов.
Можно спокойно и непринужденно провести время (паззлы в большей массе разгадываются быстро) или "проверить человека"
Очень жаль что нет ограничения по ходам или по таймеру ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198100820455', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 61, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1516001378}
review:
无论从一个程序员的角度，还是一个强迫症的角度，我认为这款极简风格的游戏流程轻松，UI和操作令人舒心，6块钱不贵。
我是在撸码间隙玩此游戏，该游戏能有效缓解各种烦躁心情。游戏流程小于1小时，由易到难，由单一变换到多种组合，过程流畅自然，全程无文字提示。
但是该游戏的缺点是关卡少，流程短，难度刚刚上来游戏就结束了，此时感觉前面的简单关卡占比过多，后面的复杂精彩关卡意犹未尽。
希望能多出几关，出dlc也行。

风格 10/10
交互 10/10
流程  7/10

review: Отличная головоломка с большим кол-вом пазлов. Лично я прошел все эти уровни за 80 минут. Впринципе, этой игры вам хватит на 2 часа максимум, если долго зависать на некоторых уровнях. author: {'steamid': '76561198025851638', 'num_games_owned': 264, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 65, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1483972784}
review:
It would seem that I finished this game in little over an hour, so if you're looking for something challenging to while away the hours then it's probably not for you. 

If, however, you're interested in visually elegant, experimental but fundamentally casual puzzle games, then it's a real steal.

The gameplay involves sliding, rotating and otherwise manipulating tiles into pleasant patterns. Different tiles can be manipulated in different ways, with more complicated levels requiring tiles of different types to be interlinked across orthogonal planes. The gameplay of some later levels can feel a little noisy, but I rather enjoyed the process of navigating a convoluted process in search of a visually simple solution.

Klocki's fundamental appeal is aesthetic; notable touches such as the lack of in game instruction, written interfaces or move counters help to create an isolated but pleasant world in which experimentation is rewarded and mistakes are without consequence.

author: {'steamid': '76561198048854247', 'num_games_owned': 579, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1483640725}
review: Kicsit több, mint 1 órás logikai játék, mindenféle sallang nélkül. Nincs sztori, nincs acsi, még stáblista, vagy menü sincs. Belépsz, elkezdődik a játék, amikor végigjátszod az utolsó pályát, elkezdődik elejétől. Egyedül az ami van az a játék és a zene. A játék lényege kb. annyi, h vannak kis négyzetek, mindegyiken különböző csíkok és úgy kell elhelyezni a négyzeteket, h a csíkok egy összefüggő vonalat alkossanak. Folyamatosan nehezednek a pályák, újabb és újabb módszerek kerülnek elő, hogyan mozgathatjuk a négyzeteket, egy idő után már 3D-ben kell gondolkodnunk. Nem frusztrálóan nehéz, de azért megmozgatja az agytekervényeket. A zene, a letisztult egyszerű grafika és a nem túl nehéz játékmenet miatt tökéletes kikapcsolódó játék.

author: {'steamid': '76561198133080658', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 39, 'last_played': 1499000153}

author: {'steamid': '76561198276020441', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1483803021}
review: Aesthetically pleasant and visually interesting, but ultimately uninspired -- less a puzzle game than the spacial reasoning portion of an IQ test given a graphics upgrade. The difficulty curve of klocki remains far too long at "insultingly easy" and barely passes into "mildly puzzling" at its peak. What challenge it does pose derives less from clever mechanics and intellectually stimulating puzzles and more from sometimes unclear rules and odd ambiguities caused by the game's own, admittedly nice, aesthetic getting in the way. Klocki's worst sin is that it is dull in a pretty, inoffensive way, but surely one can do better than dull but inoffensive? Take a shower. Eat some oatmeal. Look out the window for a while -- or perhaps regard a painting or particularly fascinating patch of  wall. The world is your oyster.

author: {'steamid': '76561198128698236', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1483368969}
review:
何をどうするの？ から始まるパズルゲームです
スタートすると、何の説明もなくいきなりパズルが出てくるので
とりあえずカチャカチャやってみてください
途中でいきなり新しいギミックが出てきたりしますが
とりあえずまたカチャカチャしましょう

それほど難しいパズルではないので
１時間ほどで全ステージクリアとなりますが
あっという間の１時間になると思います
ただ、最後の問題をクリアすると強制的に２周目に突入ですが
もう１時間カチャカチャする気にはなりませんでした
98円で１時間だけ暇つぶし、が気にならなければ
非常におすすめのタイトルです

実績、トレカはありません

author: {'steamid': '76561198096801104', 'num_games_owned': 158, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 176, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 73, 'last_played': 1669955979}
review: 70分钟通关，整体没有难度，属于特别休闲的游戏类型。这游戏简单到连个菜单没有！几种不同类型的解密方式都有循序渐进式的展开。这价格已经对得起这内容了。无聊打发时间很不错，但如果是追求解密体验的还是绕行吧。好想说没有集换卡牌也就算了，加个成就系统会死啊！这样一关关，好无成就感有木有！

author: {'steamid': '76561198052466155', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1469706232}
review:
Не преувеличивая можно сказать, что klocki - одна из лучших игр всей эпохи видеоигр. Она без слабых мест. Можно ругать, что мало, но, с другой стороны, ее очень много - часов 50 для первого прохождения. Просто в такой шедевр хочется играть и играть, чтобы он вообще не заканчивался.

klocki - глоток свежего воздуха. Это действительно "игра", а не, как принято выражаться, "кино". Не ждите здесь роликов или диалогов как в Mass Effect. Это олицетворение классической puzzle game, а не тем, во что превратились puzzle game в этом поколении. 

Самое поразительное в klocki - это ощущение "роста". И речь идет не столько о прокачке персонажа в цифрах, сколько об улучшении самого игрока. Это поразительная история проб и ошибок: сначала кажущаяся просто непроходимой, но потом - очень понятной. 

Говорят, что klocki - игра для мазохистов, что это чрезвычайно сложная игра, в которой хочется разбить контроллер. Но так говорят не игравшие или игравшие недостаточно. Здесь просто нужно забыть правила, которым вас обучили в других играх. Это медленная игра, в которой нужно оглядываться и совершать обдуманные действия. 

Научившись этому понимаешь, что ранее непроходимые места теперь не так страшно посещать. И пройти их очень даже реально, хотя первичные попытки доказывали обратное. А самое смешное, что осознаешь это не когда цифра уровня персонажа зашкаливает, а когда уверенность в собственных умениях доходит до определенного уровня. 

В этом и прелесть klocki. 
Это, безусловно, шедевр.

author: {'steamid': '76561198292388711', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 224, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1699016891}

author: {'steamid': '76561198027503451', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1483563282}
review:
I loved Hook and I am enjoying Klocki very much!

It's (just) level after level of fun little puzzle teasers. And then interesting combinations of rules & mechanics to discover. Pretty and lightly engaging, I love it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994768862', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 153, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1559167457}
review: Similar type of game as hook. Not super difficult but entertaining way of presenting the same concept getting increasingly more difficult. Fun puzzle game that I would totally recommend for the price it's sold at.

author: {'steamid': '76561198039840951', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1611424352}
review:
１時間かからず全クリア。
問題数はそこそこありますが、パズルとして頭を使うのはせいぜい数問程度。
しかもパズルを解くと言うよりは、ピースを調整していると言った感じ。
それ以外の問題はただの作業。
正直、おすすめするところは見あたらないです。

author: {'steamid': '76561198001250281', 'num_games_owned': 498, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1483309602}

author: {'steamid': '76561198089526831', 'num_games_owned': 1062, 'num_reviews': 221, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1590117149}
review: This game is really fun, and would be great to play on long car rides. Unfortunately it only has enough puzzles to last around an hour to finish all of them.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043926275', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1549828401}
review:
Loved Hook, love this one. Relaxing, really satisfying to learn the mechanics by yourself, really satisfying to start by looking at a convoluted mess and see how it turns to something beautiful and clean.

Absolutely love it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098920807', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1509118170}
review:
klocki is a cool, tiny puzzle game where you connect lines or areas of colour by moving blocks around. There's about an hour's worth of puzzles with a surprising amount of different parts. It doesn't get too difficult so ragequits are unlikely--YMMV!

It's not very interesting to replay, a speedrun timer or moves counter would help to add some longevity. Well worth the €1 for a single run though.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960643409', 'num_games_owned': 1358, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1483249417}
review:
I ended up getting this on the holiday sale for less than a dollar. What a great deal for that price, I enjoyed the puzzles and difficulty ramping up.  

Some opportunities that this game should improve upon?
 - When you beat the game you end up back at the start, i'd enjoy a stats screen
 - Puzzle select screen would be pretty amazing
 - Maybe an achievement would be cool

Overall, i'd buy it if I were you. :D

review: 50분만에 클리어 하고 리뷰 올립니다. 처음에는 이게임이 너무 쉽게 느껴질텐데 후반부가 되면 조금씩 머리를 써줘야 하기때문에  머리아프다고 생각이 드실수 있습니다. 그래도 한시간 안밖으로는 클리어 되니 걱정 마세요. 새벽에 클리어 하고 아침에 일어나서 리뷰쓰는데  새벽이라 그런지는 모르겠는데 어렵더군요... 천원으로 즐길수 있는 가성비 최강 게임입니다 이게임은!

author: {'steamid': '76561198068096048', 'num_games_owned': 827, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1483197650}
review:

It's just barely worth the low price though.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990604326', 'num_games_owned': 503, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 54, 'last_played': 1483195443}
review:
If you've played Hook (same creator), you know pretty much what to expect: some relaxing puzzles, nothing too difficult. I completed all puzzles in just under an hour at a relatively casual pace.

I enjoyed Hook [i]slightly[/i] more because the mechanics were less familiar to me (plus there's no strange perspectives that mess with your depth perception), but both are good.

author: {'steamid': '76561198110609632', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1483334055}
review: 这几块钱不亏，算是我玩过最极简的游戏，比其他垃圾小游戏好多了。有没有人像我一样，刚开始的时候以为会有公司标志动画加载...结果啥都没有，我在第一关傻等两分钟我才意识到没有开头动画，可以直接玩。【捂脸】

author: {'steamid': '76561198170136269', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1472567088}
review:
Je to celkem zábavná hra, ale nic netrvá věčně. Hra dokáže zabavit tak na 2-3 hodiny. Já jsem u hry vydržel hodinu a půl a  řeknu, že to bylo hodně lehké. Další den jsem nahrál asi 15 minut a už jsem na to chuť neměl takže je to opravdu kup si to a rychle to vrať. Mozek si tímto rozhodně procvičíte a klidně si i odpočinete.

Shrnutí: 
Pokud máte rádi logické hry, tak mi nezbývá nic jiného než tuto hru doporučit!

author: {'steamid': '76561198324360852', 'num_games_owned': 198, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1527229318}
review:
嗯，很不错的小游戏喔！
慢慢掌握每一种谜题的解决办法，然后对其应用。

author: {'steamid': '76561198074774057', 'num_games_owned': 232, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1487230373}
review: Really good simple puzzle game for the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198067996911', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 99, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1495193924}
review:
The only negatives I really have for this game are that it's too bloody short, and when you complete the last puzzle you get unceremoniously dumped back onto the first puzzle. My exact reaction: "Wait. Is that it? Did I win? Yeah, I guess I did."

Very minimalistic design, which is great if you're into that sort of thing, some cool mechanics, and really nice background music. I would gladly play three more hours' worth of these puzzles if they existed.

So, do you like puzzles? Is a dollar for an hour of fun in a neat little game a good value proposition for you? Did you get more Christmas money than you know what to do with? If you answered yes to one or more of these questions, you should buy this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969447988', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1483046141}
review: Pleasant little game and very good value for just a dollar. The UI is the most minimalistic I've ever seen in my life. There's only 1 option, which is to mute the game and you do it through the circle in the top left. There isn't even an on screen way to close the game. I had to check the forums and do a Google search just to figure out how. Hit escape a couple times to close. Seems like a little X or something in the corner would have been a good idea.

author: {'steamid': '76561198083099925', 'num_games_owned': 638, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 35, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1482877099}
review:
Klocki is probably one of the best puzzle games I think I have ever played. The perfect balance between self-discovery and challenge, and it has a minimalist UI that you don't even notice is there.

You reach a puzzle that you haven't seen before, and once you solve it, you feel like you have accomplished something with no direction, just good game design. The game progresses very smoothly, and at no point have I found myself looking for solutions to solve the puzzles. At the price? 10/10 I literally can't fault this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198271052459', 'num_games_owned': 188, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1632662105}

author: {'steamid': '76561198070450795', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1482861025}
review:
[h1] Simples, bonito e interessante! [/h1]

[b] Pensa nuuum jogãoooo [/b]

O jogo tem um gráfico simples e muito "limpo", o que torna o jogo fácil de ser compreendido e também deixa ele esteticamente atraente.
Ele não tem menus, conquistas, indicações de nível, créditos finais, nada. Ele tem somente o que importa: O jogo. =D

[i] Claro, no futuro os desenvolvedores poderiam ir adicionando mais coisas, mas o jogo atualmente é bem interessante para se divertir por algumas horas. [/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198002975859', 'num_games_owned': 763, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 50, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1482806685}
review:
From the same developer behind Hook, which I also really liked. This is just a minimalistic tile-matching puzzle game, no words, no achievements, just ambient music and lightly challenging puzzles. I didn't find it as challenging as Hook because there's really no way to fail in klocki, or even make any invalid moves... I guess the worst fate that can befall you is aimlessly clicking around. But for the price, it's ultra-minimalist puzzle fun.

The only thing I might add would be some sort of par for each level; a few times I wondered how far off I was from an optimal sequence of moves.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059995557', 'num_games_owned': 134, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 15, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1482679404}
review:
I was Honestly expecting more levels...

Shame...

Played the one on Kongregate it was amazing...

PLayed this one and was amazed and slightly pissed off due too the sliding puzzle...

Worst part is if you play it in one sitting you can get 73 minutes into the game and complete it. Maybe even less if you have the wit too do it.

I reccomend this game to people who like minimalistic puzzles and have an extra $0.99 to spare.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016869388', 'num_games_owned': 734, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1482582335}
review:
After a disappointingly small number of levels, most of which are depressingly trivial to solve, it abruptly restarts from the first level, just when it was starting to look like it might possibly eventually get challenging and interesting.

It has some nice ideas, but it's very poorly executed, and ends up being much more frustrating (for entirely the wrong reasons: not  due to difficulty, but to lack of it and the extremely small number of levels, and the even smaller number of even slightly challenging ones) than enjoyable.

If you enjoy puzzles you'll end up wishing you hadn't played it, because it's essentially a very short and limited demo or tutorial for a game that you would actually enjoy, but that won't ever be released.

I'm almost convinced the real intention of the developer was to troll the players. :(

author: {'steamid': '76561197993186068', 'num_games_owned': 853, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1482547628}
review: Excellent little puzzle game for the asking price.  Minimalist interface (esc to exit, arrows on esc screen to switch between already beaten puzzles, button to disable audio).  Only took me 44 minutes to play through all of the puzzles, but had a few head scratcher moments.  The game does a good job of teaching you via simple puzzles the basics for each function before combining them.

author: {'steamid': '76561198227798788', 'num_games_owned': 86, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1483771989}
review:
一款小清新的，解谜游戏吧、
关卡少了一点，但能想出这么多花样，也是很不错的。
价格公道，少买一包零食的价钱就能入手这样一款不错的游戏。
音乐也很舒服，在思考的同时不会感到过于寂寞（焦躁）。
总之，很推荐各位入手这一款游戏（有点打广告的感觉）。
“建议反复通关，时间越快越好呢”

author: {'steamid': '76561197973842243', 'num_games_owned': 158, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 510, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1611478735}
review:
Ein tolles Spiel welches Logik und räumliches Denken mit einfachen Mitteln fordert ohne dabei ein Zeit/Zuglimit zu fordern.
Spielmechaniken werden in einfachen Rätseln vermittelt und dann immer komplexer ausgebaut.
EInmal drinn fällt es schwer aufzuhören. Enspannend und fordernd zugleich. 
Kaufen!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198141571866', 'num_games_owned': 298, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 119, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1558944933}
review:
极简主义（[spoiler]性冷淡[/spoiler]）的一款解密类独立游戏，游戏画面正如商店截图所示。通过点击、拖动和旋转对一个或不同平面内的物品块进行移动使之圆满统一。操作简单，具有科技抽象感的音乐，整个游戏给人一种放松的感觉。玩到后面关卡倒是越来越难。大约64分钟通关。对于喜欢这类的解密向的爱好者建议可以试试。

[strike]其实我本来懒的写的但又觉得有必要推荐一下这游戏，毕竟游戏素质还是很不错的[/strike] _(:3」∠)_

[spoiler]不得不说这简直就是你国当代最适合喜加一的一类游戏。怎么港？好玩，便宜，音乐舒适，画面不粗糙，流程不会太冗长,买 :)[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198068284909', 'num_games_owned': 449, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1482454310}
review: This game reminds me of The Witness with how it introduces concepts to you one at a time and then combines them.  At the end of the game there are some pretty tough puzzles that require you to combine all of the mechanics you’ve learned. The game doesn’t overstay its welcome, which I appreciate.  The last puzzle came right as I was getting the itch to play something else.  For a buck, you could do a heck of a lot worse than this. If you like puzzle games, definitely give this a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970880431', 'num_games_owned': 146, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1482457642}
review:
Cooles Rätselspiel! Auch für Leute, welche sonst keine Rätselspiele spielen, da es nicht überfordert.
Alles überflüssige wie Hauptmenü usw. wurde weggelassen.
Nach 80 Minuten bin ich bei dem (aktuell) letzten Level angekommen. Da aber weiterhin neue Levels per Update hinzugefügt werden, könnte sich die Spielzeit dadurch noch verlängern.
Ist die 0.99 € auf alle Fälle wert! Es gibt auch eine [url=http://www.kongregate.com/games/targaciej/klocki]Test-Version für den Browser[/url], um sich selber ein Bild zu machen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198157125866', 'num_games_owned': 319, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1503381825}
review:
[h1]7.0 / 10.0[/h1] （2018/12/20补上分数

给个大概的流程概念吧：游戏体积很小，就只有10M左右，整个游戏82关，没有开始菜单，没有窗口化，直接就是第一关，弄完一关原地点鼠标，就下一关。左上角有个小圆点，点开之后，就是关声音跟上一关的按钮，很简洁，也感觉很迷茫，不知道总共多少关。
内容是跟……怎么说呢，看看商店页面的动画就差不多了，只是实际比动画要难一点这样子。背景颜色每关都换，就……很有一种令人放松的感觉吧[spoiler] （如果不追求什么通关速度）[/spoiler]
感受：总的来说，我是5块钱买的，挺值得的。玩的时候觉得，怎么还有啊，又看不到有多少关、还剩多少关的提示，就只能一直玩下去。挺考脑子的，[spoiler] 玩到第79关左右，我就忍不住去度娘看看这他妈到底有多少关了，	[/spoiler]虽然不知道度娘出来的攻略行不行，但是感觉尽量别找攻略，慢慢的试，成功了之后的成就感很强烈。
PS：打个分，因为价格并不贵，而且内容值得这个价钱，给个8分吧。[spoiler]（跟大游戏打多少分不是同一个问题，不可比较）[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198097608180', 'num_games_owned': 77, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1511905688}
review:
Gün içerisinde çok stresli veya kafanızı takacağınız bir şey mi yaşadınız? Arkada müziğinizi açın ve bu oyunu oynayın.Benim gibi geceleri müzik dinlerken oyun oynayıp rahatlamayı seviyorsanız tam size göre.

+Chill tarzı oyun seviyorsanız size göre.
+Renk ambiyansı muhteşem.
+Tat verici bölümler(Geçtiğinizde "vay be ben zekiymisim" hissi veriyor)
+Çok ucuz olması.

-Bölümleri çok az ve bölüm eklemiyorlar. (80-90 civarı.Sayıyla çok gibi görünüyor ama oynayınca su gibi geçecek emin olun)

KISACASI;
Bir puzzle oyununun verebileceği her şeyi veriyor :))

author: {'steamid': '76561198076791996', 'num_games_owned': 43, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 96, 'last_played': 1519150897}
review: Sprzedałem skiny w CS:GO, kupiłem tę grę i nie żałuje. Niestety gra jest bardzo krótka, bo przeszedłem ją w 96 min i kilka razy zatrzymałem się na niektórych poziomach, gdyż były dosyć trudne oraz gra często potrafi przyprawić o ból głowy, ale nie samym poziomem trudności zagadek, a bardziej tym w jaki sposób możemy układać klocki. Mam nadzieje, że autor zrobi niedługo jakąś aktualizacje i doda poziomy, bo chętnie bym sobie w to jeszcze pograł w święta. Tak czy siak, gra warta swojej ceny. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198126592129', 'num_games_owned': 900, 'num_reviews': 143, 'playtime_forever': 37, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1494623435}
review:
It's pretty good, but it'd be nice to have a DLC with more content because the game is really short and easy. Most puzzles take less than 30 seconds to complete. It only took my about 35 minutes to complete all the levels.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991465987', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 278, 'playtime_forever': 161, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1657215465}
review:
Similarly to Hook, klocki follows a very strange experience curve. It starts out with nice but very, very simple puzzles. The mechanics are creative and enjoyable, but after 10-15 minutes, when you've swept through like 35-40 levels, you start to wonder if there's any more to the game than solving the puzzles in 2 seconds and clicking through them in 10. Just when you start to feel grumpy, it turns out that you've been through a very long tutorial, and the game hits you with a puzzle that suddenly features like all the mechanics you've seen before. Difficulty is still not extreme, but the game becomes a lot of fun - and in case of klocki, it also looks very funny with everything rammed into one plate / box / whatever.

Total playtime was a bit under 1 hour, so it's a short game - still good value for 1 EUR. Recommended.

author: {'steamid': '76561198108183039', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 256, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1558933623}
review:
It's a line game. Which line game? All of the god damn line games!

klocki is a simple puzzle game where you basically have to complete shapes by moving around tiles that contain parts of the shapes. It's a simple concept but there are 3 different ways of moving blocks and atleast 3 different end goals to achieve and the later levels really test you by putting them together. At first, I was really bored because a simple mapping of shapes was required but it ramped up nice. I never felt stuck and overall had fun with it. I wish there were more levels, but for a dollar, I had an hour of gameplay and I'm not complaining.

The music, visuals, and animations are super nice too.

author: {'steamid': '76561198098799317', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1646508160}
review: One of the best geometric puzzle games I've ever played. I like games that throw you into gameplay with no explanation, but allow you to figure out the "rules" by trial and error. Klocki is a very pleasant game to play, with beautiful smooth graphics in soothing colours. There are a variety of mechanisms that get introduced as you progress through the levels: rotation, swapping, etc. and it's fun to figure them out. After a new mechanism is introduced, it starts you off easy, and then begins to combine them into quite complex puzzles that are challenging but not frustrating. It's not entirely clear whether there is only one solution for each puzzle, or if you simply have to find a solution that meets the criteria, but it's fun to think about different ways you could solve it. I could play this game for hours, and was just thinking "I hope this game never ends" when it brought me back to the beginning. Aww. This game is similar to Zenge, which was equally calming and entirely too short for my liking. As with that game, I would love to see some Achievements to make the game even more replayable. For example, complete a puzzle in under X number of moves, or complete a puzzle without triggering the error buzzer, etc. Overall, this is an absolute bargain, and either a good way to kill a few hours, or a nice way to infuse your day with a few rounds of brain teasers. More! More! More!

author: {'steamid': '76561198071746166', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 89, 'last_played': 1494804625}
review:
So relaxing i melted into a puddle of abstract shapes.

A charming little puzzle game for a super cheap price.
Klocki is about as simple as they come, with lovely minimalist aesthetics and a nice bit of ambiance in the background for you too. But don't be fooled - there's a decent amount of levels to keep you entertained, and the game boasts a well-implemented system of progression that'll keep you interested with new mechanics every other stage to constantly test what you've learned so far.
The only issue i really had was that it touched on the potential to be a lot more challenging but never quite got there, and the lack of any menus whatsoever meant the you were constantly in the dark about how many puzzles you've done/how many you still had to complete. But i'm nit-picking here, it's still very enjoyable, and i guess a bunch of unnecessary menus would have spoiled their smooth, super-clean look.

What's that? You haven't bought it yet? C'mon pal it's not even a quid

author: {'steamid': '76561198023154119', 'num_games_owned': 5242, 'num_reviews': 316, 'playtime_forever': 138, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1494806753}
review:
Kupiłem, bo bardzo spodobał mi się Hook tego samego twórcy. Widać podobieństwo - zagadki są inne, ale schemat podobny. Gra logiczna, w której jak już myślisz, że wszystko rozumiesz, coś się zmienia. Ani przez chwilę nie jest nudno. Szkoda, że gra jest taka krótka.

Poza małą ilością poziomów jedynym minusem jest brak numeracji poziomów lub innego oznaczenia - po przejściu całości gra się zapętla i przez chwilę masz nadzieję, że trwa dalej, a tak naprawdę rozwiązujesz te same zagadki od początku.

Za dolara/euro szkoda nie spróbować.

author: {'steamid': '76561198081868025', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 255, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1629368777}
review:
좀 놀랐다.
게임을 시작하자마자 가운데에 판때기 2개가 놓여있고 주변에는 배경밖에 없으며 쓰는 버튼이라곤 게임 나갈 때 쓸 ESC하나 뿐.
그리고 그 2개의 판때기를 마우스로 위치를 뒤바꿔 본격적인 게임 시작.
그 박력넘치는 시작덕에 몰입도가 급상승했고, 그 영향인지 새로운 풀이법과 형태의 퍼즐이 나올 때마다 놀라움과 신비로움이라는, 마치 콜럼버스가 아메리카 대륙을 발견했을 때 느꼈을법한 감정을 느꼈다.
난이도 자체도 크게 어려운 부분이 없어 어딘가에서 너무 오랫동안 막힌 나머지 게임에 대한 몰입도가 떨어지는 일 또한 없었다.
그래픽또한 난잡하지 않고 깔끔하게 만들어져있어 퍼즐 몰입도를 높이는 데 한 몫 하였다.

중간중간 퍼즐 만들기가 귀찮았던건지 비슷한 생김새 혹은 쉬어가는 정도의 난이도의 퍼즐들이 섞여 있는데, 마치 퍼즐 갯수를 억지로 늘린 듯한 느낌이 들어 그부분은 아쉬웠다.
그리고 회전이 빠르다. 새로운 퍼즐 요소가 나오니 이전에 나왔던 퍼즐 요소 몇개가 좀 있다가 사라져버리는 것이다. 중간에 나온 6방향 회전 동그라미가 특히 그랬다. 거의 나오지도 않았다. 돌릴 때 소리하고 효과가 굉장히 박력넘치는데 안타깝다.

몰입도를 해치지 않는 단순한 그래픽과 적당한 난이도. 퍼즐의 여러가지 개성넘치는 형태와 풀이법. …박력넘치는 게임 시작?!?!
이 세상에 단점없는 것은 없다. 이 게임은 충분히 추천할 가치가 있다.

review:
Nices Knobelspiel!
+Ansteigender Schwierigkeitsgrad
+tolles System
+alle paar Level neue Elemente

-ziemlich kurz *hatte es in 78min. durch
-kein Menu/Levelauswahl

Wer ein Knobelspiel für Zwischendurch sucht, ist hier auf jeden Fall richtig! Es wird immer komplizierter! Also meiner Meinung nach haben sich die 99 Cent gelohnt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032116605', 'num_games_owned': 235, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1481300021}
review:
Ein paar schöne Puzzles für Zwischendurch. Alle Levels zusammen habe ich ohne zu hetzen in genau 1 Stunde lösen können. Ich würde mich freuen, wenn es noch einen Challenge-Modus gäbe in denen die Minimalanzahl an Zügen für das jeweilige Level sichtbar wäre, um ein wirkliches Puzzle-Erlebnis zu haben. Die Rätsel sind vom Prinzip her ähnlich und können nämlich auch durch ausprobieren gelöst werden.

Insgesamt ein schönes (kurzes) Spiel, das mich bei angenehmer und entspannender Darstellung und sehr niedrigem Preis super unterhalten hat.

author: {'steamid': '76561198072970122', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1495882211}
review:
Great puzzle game! With nice concepts and much 3Dimensional thinking involved!
You can't make anything wrong since it's just 1€! Also check out the other puzzle games from the same developer!

The only negative thing about it is it is so short(about 1 to 2 hours max) to finish all puzzles.
Please more levels or a level editor! Great stuff!

author: {'steamid': '76561198003481008', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1480434633}
review:
퍼즐 게임입니다. 
하지만 정말 난이도가 극악으로 어려워서 힘든건 아닙니다. 조금만 머리 쓰면 금방 깰 수 있고 다 깨고 나서 기쁜 마음이 스쳐 지나갑니다.
확실히 아직 스테이지가 적다고 느껴지는데 오히려 더 많아지면 지루해 할 거 같은 느낌도 들고
사실 이런 게임은 어려워지기 시작하면 끝도 없이 어려워지는데 난이도 벨런스를 잘 잡은거 같습니다,
다른 분들도 거의 1시간? 내외로 엔딩 보시는거 같네요.
 한번쯤 플레이 해보시는걸 추천드립니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023835341', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1480377024}
review:
클리어까지 많은 시간이 필요치 않습니다. 의외로 두뇌를 많이 쓸 필요도 없는 게임입니다.
상당히 미니멀리즘에 입각한 디자인에, 튜토리얼 하나 없이 게임 진행하는 방법을 이것저것 해보면서 쉽게 익힐 수 있습니다.
UX 디자인만큼은 정말 잘 되었습니다. 게임도 꽤 재미있는 편이며, 가격도 저렴합니다.

다양한 퍼즐의 변주가 나오며, 개인적으로 더 많은 레벨 업데이트가 있었음 좋겠습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100770256', 'num_games_owned': 250, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1480703289}
review:
Really great little puzzle game.

I totally recommend this game!
Definitely worth the 1€!

As you can see from the screenshots on the shop-pahe, there are different types of mechanics in this game.
It gets pretty fun, once the different riddle types start to mix.

Thoughts for improvement:
A place to pick a specific level, or at least a counter in what level you are, would be very nice.
Also maybe add an end achievment, like it is done in Hook.

author: {'steamid': '76561198089639059', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 78, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1480268630}
review:
The game concept is nice, but it's like playing just a very long tutorial.
I went through the whole game, hoping levels would have grown harder. Unfortunately, out of 82 of them, only 3-4 are decently challenging. All the others are basically a "let's tidy up a bit and put this very tile where it's obvious it belongs", but there's nothing to actually solve.
I'm sorry to give a negative review, but this game is so easy it turns boring after a couple of minutes.

author: {'steamid': '76561198255054745', 'num_games_owned': 305, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 95, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1624046829}
review:
Pros:
- Challenging enough puzzles, yet easy enough for casuals.
- It introduces new mechanics often enough to prevent monotony.
- The price is very low.
- Roughly an hour of fun or less, depending on how clever you are.

Cons:
- The last puzzle is disappointingly easy compared to the puzzle that preceded it.
- There is no congratulatory message after solving the last puzzle, just an abrupt return to the first puzzle.
- No Steam cards nor achievements. (no big deal for me, but some folks might want to know)
- The only way to exit the game is to press ESC, but it doesn't tell you that. (again, no big deal for me. But still...)

Overall: It's an impulse buy, and a good one.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125393862', 'num_games_owned': 249, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1480195612}

author: {'steamid': '76561198094896490', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 93, 'last_played': 1616900582}
review:
Wonderful puzzle sliding/switching game with a multitude of ways how a player interacts with the board. Its great when the stages mix up different puzzle types to make the player think.

The only down side is when your done, your done. There is no random element to keep you coming back like in falling block games, but for less than a dollar its well worth the time. You can also get it for mobile devices, which I think is where this game works best. The short, bite-size stages are just thing to pass time on the train and pick up on a later time. It you enjoy Infection type games and "stage" puzzle games, chances are you'll like klocki.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051898442', 'num_games_owned': 1137, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 43, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1558839742}
review:
入れ替えたり回転させたり、スライドさせたり離して置いたりしながら、線分や面図形を切れ目なく再配置したらクリアのちまちま系ちまちまパズルゲーム。
起動したらおもむろにステージ1が開始、ステージ1をクリアしたらステージ2が開始。次々と新しいギミックが出てきて飽きさせないつくり。
全82問を攻略すると、何の感慨も余韻もなしにまたステージ1が始まるゾ！もちろんステージ1をクリアするとステージ2が始まるゾ！無限ループってこわくね？

ほんの1時間足らずで終わる点もかえって潔しと感じる。廉価設定もうれしいので、時間や手数の制限に急かされないパズルゲームを求めている人に超おすすめ。

author: {'steamid': '76561197998116681', 'num_games_owned': 3146, 'num_reviews': 600, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1588377335}
review:
[b]Warning: this game is below 30mins.[/b]

This is extremely good sliding puzzler with a lot of great mechanics. Mostly amazing graphics (the type of things from the last level should be smoother when combined). This great rewarding inception sound. And great level-design based tutorialization, without obnoxious explicit arrows, animations and texts.

The main problem is — small levels, which are very easy, and there are not much of them. You can blitz the game in less than half of an hour. Well it costs slightly more than one loaf of bread (in our local pricing), and 30% of that money goes to the valve's pocket. By itself these several minutes of gameplay were worth the price. But if we consider the current meta, where you can buy for the same amount of money old full AAA release (or two) [like, for example, two great Commandos games], then this seems extremely expensive.
Also it doesn't have an ending, just like in old arcades — if you won it instantly starts over without warning.

So, before purchase, you should estimate how much you like tile sliding\switching\rotating puzzlers and just how cheap are you.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960450994', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1480042948}
review:
1 dollar for 59 minutes of fun. Pretty good deal.

Most of the puzzles are fairly simple, and most are somewhat easily brute forced if you don't feel like using your brain. And honestly, this is a pretty good game to play if you just want to chill out, because the ambient music is very soothing.

There were 7 or 8 different mechanics that the developers toyed with for varying amounts of time, eventually using most of them in combination. The "15-puzzle" sections I found a little tedious, but it did add something to a couple puzzles.

I tend to prefer more difficult puzzle games (HexCells, The Witness, etc) but this is easily worth the small investment for any fan of the genre.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055279802', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 259, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 201, 'last_played': 1558963311}

review:
Very nice, although short, puzzle game.
Expect about an hour of play time (written on 11/25/2016).
Very nice difficulty progression, with new mechanics progressively added as you go through the levels.
No issue with the controls, although the sliding mechanic could be a little better.
Nice relaxing music.
Ridiculously cheap.
Buy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561197976255107', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1585520364}
review:
In a market where games are often expected to highly dynamic, Klocki is simple. Its a wonderful puzzle game that is highly engaging. It takes the player back to a basic fundamental aspect of life, that being curiosity. All levels build upon past mechanics that are presented in a simple and elegant manner. The best part is how these mechanics are first introduced to players. No rules, no prompts, no timers, just you and a puzzle. Touch an element and it immediately reacts to that stimuli.

I use Klocki as an example at the studio I work at to illustrate how simple a mechanic can be, yet be used so carefully that it becomes something amazing.

author: {'steamid': '76561198172482310', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1494553596}

author: {'steamid': '76561197964306170', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 56, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1479506731}
review:
In short: Loved it. Clever and elegant. Doesn't overstay it's welcome, great prize also.

Elegantly designed. It kept surprising me me in how it evolved the mechanics. Also I enjoyed that it felt like the game had no filler, it was short and nice.

Only minus for me is that there was tile-sliding puzzles at one point. Luckily for me they werent very hard, they gave you decent room to manuver, but I really hate tile-sliding puzzles in general. But it didn't impact my overall enjoyment really.

review:
A cute little game with relaxing aesthetics and an amazing learning curve. It introduces new elements and mechanics at a reasonable pace and it costs 1$.

If you like Hook (which is made by the same dev btw) or casual puzzle games in general you're going to at least appreciate this one, if not love it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198101376334', 'num_games_owned': 943, 'num_reviews': 57, 'playtime_forever': 54, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42, 'last_played': 1503929096}
review:
可能对大多数人来说我的赞美有点过高了，不过对我来说，这个游戏称得上这个赞美：
[b]这游戏达到了简易解密游戏的巅峰。[\b]
这款游戏的主题就是“简”。整个游戏没有任何的说明，全部的解密方式得靠自己摸索。但所有的解密元素又合情合理，毫不突兀。极简的背景音乐、极简的画风，能让抛开一切，专心解密。
当你以为只要简易的连边的时候，游戏又蹦出来了新的解密元素；当你以为只在一维上面耍花招的时候，游戏又以各种多面体的形态展现在你面前。
强烈推荐！

author: {'steamid': '76561198297219902', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 174, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 92, 'last_played': 1644418400}

author: {'steamid': '76561198020964396', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1479137664}
review: Ein schönes Rätselspiel für zwischendurch. Sehr entspannend aufgrund der ambienten Musik und die gute Lösbarkeit der Rätsel, wodurch frustierende Momente ausbleiben. Die Grafik ist minimalistisch und passt perfekt zum Gesamtpaket. Einzig "negativ" ist, dass die Spielzeit unter einer Stunde liegt. Bei dem Preis darf man aber auch kein längeres Spiel erwarten. Insgesamt also top!

author: {'steamid': '76561198061412357', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1481172026}
review:
Die "Lernkurve" in diesem Spiel ist sehr flach angesetzt. So kommen einem gerade am Anfang mehrere Rätsel eher wie eine "Beschäftigungsmaßnahme" vor. Doch Richtung Ende nimmt das Spieel an Fahrt auf, es wird etwas schwerer und fängt an richtig Spaß zu machen. 
Für 99c kann man als Puzzlefan mit diesem Spiel wenig falsch machen. Atmosphäre ist großartig und das Design ist griffig.

review:
I beat it!

Many of the puzzles seem overwhelming at first but once you start playing with them, your brain will race into finding the solution and it is, oh so gratifying. It's a life lesson, if you can picture your desired result, then your brain goes into gear to figure out how to get you there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131393913', 'num_games_owned': 73, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 94, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1478510129}
review:
So i have finished this game and i must say it was really challenging.This is a puzzle game with around 30+ unique levels and there are lots of challenging levels.In order to make this simplier i'll make a pros and cons table
[Pros]
-Challenging Levels
-Relaxing music
-Good looking
[Cons]
-Very short and few maps
Overall, i will say that it is worth the $1, i hope the developers will add more levels.
P.S: i refunded this after completing all the levels

author: {'steamid': '76561197999339665', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 81, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1483277824}
review:
Hay algo mágico en esa satisfacción, en ese momento eureka que nos hace clic en la cabeza cada vez que resolvemos algún puzzle, ya sea en una aventura gráfica, ya sea en un juego a la sazón puro y duro, cual [i]The Witness[/i]. Es ese momento en el que trascendemos un poco de lo que tenemos delante y lo apreciamos por fin en su esencia, y como cuando Neo aprende kung-fú después de haber recibido más hostias que panes, nos sabemos mejores que antes con la lección aprendida y empezamos a resolver incógnitas visuales una detrás de otra, pim pam, hasta que una variación de la mecánica, o quizás una totalmente distinta, nos vuelve a llevar al punto de partida de La Ignorancia. Y vuelta a la búsqueda de ese pequeño orgasmito mental.

[i]Klocki[/i] es un juego de puzzles que da todo eso en un asequible formato light de aproximadamente hora y media y por apenas un euro.

Si eso no es calidad/precio en su máximo esplendor, yo ya no sé qué puede serlo.

review:
很打发时间的益智类小游戏，全通大概在1小时左右。
都不是特别难，很有想法让我想起纪念碑谷。

review:
디자인이 깔끔하고 예쁩니다. UI또한 최대한 간소화 시켜서 거의 없는 정도네요.

정말 밀리말리즘의 극을 보여준다고 생각하는 게임입니다.

게임 플레이 타임은 계속 하다보면 1시간정도 나오는것 같습니다.

또한 튜토리얼 없이 퍼즐 모양 자체만으로 직관적으로 이해되는 게임이네요.

퍼즐게임 좋아하시는 분들은 간단히 즐길 수 있는 게임으로 추천합니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198004545664', 'num_games_owned': 286, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1477223170}
review:
Wow. I played the online version on Kongregate and I had to buy the full game here. What a gem this is.

If you've played HOOK, by the same dev, then know that this one manages to be even better (and longer! although still just over an hour to complete it).

Wonderfully crafted puzzles, looks beautiful, and GOOD HEAVENS the sound design. Absolutely gorgeous, it makes solving each level even more rewarding.
The learning curve is again very smooth, new puzzle elements are added with clarity and then mixed with previous elements in very elegant ways. It never gets too hard, it's really a relaxing game.

I'm keeping tabs on Maciej Targoni, he's off to a wonderful start with these two games. Highly recommended, best buck I spent all week.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992908411', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1500401912}
review:
Grasz w coś i nie możesz przejść planszy/bossa? Odpal na chwilę Klocki, przejdź z 2-3 palnsze i wróć do poprzedniej gry :)
Dziewczyna/żona/konkubina miauczy Ci nad głową, że od 4 miesięcy siedzisz i nie potrafisz sobie znaleźć pracy i nic nie potrafisz dobrze zrobić? Odpal na chwilę Klocki, przejdź z 2-3 palnsze i powiedz jej, że się myli, bo właśnie rozwaliłeś kilka zagadek :)
Minimalistyczna gierka idealna na kilkuminutowe oderwanie się od aktualnie wykonywanej pracy. Nie czuć przy niej wielkiego syndromu "jeszcze jednej planszy", więc powinna wystarczyć na długo, a przy tym każda kolejna  "zagadka" daje satysfakcę.

Za tę cenę? Starczy na dłużej niż jedno piwko, a poziom szczęśliwości podnosi prawie na taki sam poziom. Z tym, że piwka na Steam nie kupisz, prawda?

author: {'steamid': '76561198041108401', 'num_games_owned': 1219, 'num_reviews': 496, 'playtime_forever': 97, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 97, 'last_played': 1645908614}
review:
I've never seen so many and so good ideas in one puzzle game!
Well executed gamedesign: 
- athmospheric and chilling sound
- fitting sound effects
- nice visual effects
- minimalistic and yet artistic graphic design

Gameplay is really good:
- At first simple but satisfying levels
- and then more challenging levels
- game mechanics are introduced very fast. The moment you think you know how a mechanic works, the next one is already there.
- Logic level needed to succeed is still average but there are some brain twisters here and there

one hour of pure puzzle happiness <3

MUST HAVE for puzzlers!

author: {'steamid': '76561197996899722', 'num_games_owned': 1440, 'num_reviews': 266, 'playtime_forever': 87, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1475957832}
review:
What a pleasant little puzzler!    

The aim of the game is to complete lines or loops, where they can be wiggly across one surface, or wrap over corners to cover the faces of a cube.  It's all presented in isometric, with no need to rotate the whole play-space to get use of the three dimensions. It's really nicely done.   It doesn't use the isometric playfulness of "Monument Valley", for instance.  It just uses the flatter perspective to keep the game clean and puzzle-like.

The puzzles start out really simple, and stay very simple for the first dozen levels.   Every so often a new play device is thrown in, but usually it's pretty obvious what to do with it... There's one thing "the hourglasses", which occur, and it can be a little bit of a headscratcher, but after a bit of experimenting, that turns out to be one of the funner devices in the game.

I had a lovely time playing it on a plane, and then just in the evening once everyone had gone to bed to while away the last hour of the day. Each 'level' can take between 4 seconds and several minutes.  The sliding-block puzzles can take a couple of goes at them to get the right sequence, but none of them are particularly difficult.

Very short, very easy, and very satisfying.    I can only imagine there'll be a Klocki 2 with far more interesting devices at some point, because this feels like a perfectly-formed well-made demonstration of the genre that's a wonderful game in itself.  Well recommended for a quid!

author: {'steamid': '76561198290169723', 'num_games_owned': 47, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1473902313}

review:
Pros: No lugar de ficar fica parando a cada dois minutos para dar um tutorial, pra cada tipo de conexão o jogo te dá um ou dois puzzles simples antes de começar a misturar com o resto; o que fica bem interessante. E me custou quase nada.

Contras: É meio curto, algo pra pegar e se distrair ao invés de algo pra ficar jogando toda hora.

author: {'steamid': '76561198060597598', 'num_games_owned': 3293, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 47, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1476558021}
review:
I didn't have the best initial impression of Klocki - I tried a couple of levels quickly when I bought it and didn't have time to get into the relaxed vibe - and on returning to it this evening to play a little more discovering that there was no level selection screen (a victory of form over function of its minimalist aesthetic). However, the puzzle design is good, if not challenging - everything is fairly intuitive and well-presented - and the sound design is fitting, and as new mechanics were introduced an interested little "ooh!" escaped me a couple of times. I would like to see some sort of interface for level selection or way of telling how far through you are - hell, I'm a junkie for Steam achievements so a little positive feedback would be good for me - but I think that my latter preferences are at odds with what the game actually offers - an almost aimless wander through a few relaxing puzzles, instead of rushing through to hit targets or complete the game or whatever other things I do which stop me from switching off and smelling the roses.

I'm not saying it will permanently change the way I play games, of course, but it is a nice experience.

Also, it's hella cheap.

author: {'steamid': '76561198142270415', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1475834013}
review:
これが仮に200円なら買わないほうがいい。無料のパズルゲームはいっぱいあるので。98円なら買ってもいいんじゃないかな？それくらいの暇つぶしにはなる。

author: {'steamid': '76561198025448088', 'num_games_owned': 1206, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 172, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1475819629}
review:
Not perfect but couldn't ask for more from a $1 game, so I'd still recommend this. You can probably finish it within 2 or 3 hours.

Graphics are neat and nice. Terrible UI (probably ported from mobile) that never expected the need of a level selection screen. You can't change window size so you have to play in fullscreen all the time.

Gameplay is quite relaxing. If you want to solve a puzzle without burning your brain, this would be your thing. Almost every puzzle can be solved easily by looking for the "key" piece. Some levels are surprisingly good, overall just fine due to the lack of "ah-ha" moments and diversity of problem solving methods. Again this is still acceptable for a $1 game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198144062508', 'num_games_owned': 578, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1510321282}
review:
1h多几分钟通的关

首先不得不承认一点确实这款游戏更适合在移动端上玩。
画面清新简约，但是能让你实实在在动脑子的地方并不多。
我比较欣赏的是他能够不用文字提示来引导你，然后你能在移动中找到游戏的乐趣。
至于BGM，比较普通，啊不，应该是很普通。音效还可以但是这是基础并不能加分。

我是一个游戏新人2333还是比较喜欢这游戏风格的w
所以还是推荐的_(:3_


哦对了，最后一关还是挺有爱的~

author: {'steamid': '76561198027515855', 'num_games_owned': 1362, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 60, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1475659267}
review:
Für nicht ganz einen Euro wurde ich mit klocki nicht ganz eine Stunde gut unterhalten. Die minimalistischen Grafiken sind schick. Die Rätsel logisch und die wechselnden Rätselelemente halten das Spiel interessant. Wenn man das Spiel unterbrickt wird automatisch gespeichert. Nachdem das letzte Rästel gelöst ist beginnt das Spiel dann automatisch von vorn.

Leider gibt es für die zweite Runde weder einen Shuffle-Modus (alle Rätsel wild durcheinander) noch neue Herrausforderungen. Alles in allem ist klocki ein nettes kleines Spiel, dass durch die Ambient-Musik angenehm entspannt während die Rätsel komplexter aber nie unlösbar oder unfair werden.

Der Wiederspielwert ist eher gering, falls nicht - wie schon einmal geschehen - neue Rätsel nachgereicht werden.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046490380', 'num_games_owned': 930, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 102, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 72, 'last_played': 1495218940}
review:
The game is interesting. It has very simple controls. Mouse1 (Left Click) and Esc. Esc you use to close the game, everything else is done with the mouse. 

The game starts with simple mechanics, but it gets more complicated along the way. At the same time it gets more interesting. 

Personally, I beat the game in it's [b]current state[/b] (4.10.2016) in 71 minutes. 
It could have gone faster, but I took my time. The game is very soothing, yet challenging. 
The game has around 30-ish puzzles, I'm not really sure. I hope there's more to come!

I'd rate this game a nice 9/10, since it could have been longer. The game is very well priced, and I'm pleased with my purchase.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960684605', 'num_games_owned': 793, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1475553339}

review: after playing through the whole game and beating it within an hour i can say that 3/4ths of the game had tasks that required little thought, like a really small jigsaw puzzle, and then near the end there were slidey challenges that actually required hard thought, and then the game is over, all i can say is add more levels really, maybe someone a little younger of age would really enjoy this, i appreciate the experiance i had and getting a refund after completion was great

author: {'steamid': '76561198161664759', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1575028457}
review: At first I was worried that the puzzles were too far too easy, but I did appreciate the elegant design and atmospheric sound. It wasn't long before the puzzles ramped their difficulty right up. A lovely little game, well worth the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198287766799', 'num_games_owned': 3353, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 313, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1561656781}
review:
没有成就，没有卡牌，没有语音，没有文本，很单纯的就是这么一款游戏。简简单单的规则，以及简单的关卡。每关耗时也很短，属于名副其实的休闲游戏。

//2017.05.13更新了卡牌和成就，因为没有云存档，45分钟速通拿成就。

这款游戏最大的优点是每一关都可以直接推理出解法，不用枚举去试，非常便利。

在Google Play我也找到了这款游戏的安卓版。相对于作为一款PC端的游戏。游戏内容其实更适合于手机。PC端使用触摸屏进行操作时，体验比起鼠标要好，尤其是旋转板块和移动方块的操作。游戏后期我基本是用Remote Desktop在手机上和在电脑上用触屏打完的，体验不错，也完全没有用到鼠标。

游戏后期关卡略有重复。

[b]总评6/10。[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198131457326', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 138, 'last_played': 1590126213}
review:
很不错的小游戏，大概1.5小时的流程吧。做的实在够简洁，但是极简不等于毫无特色，比如这几个细节：
1.不停的转转盘拉杆的话会有泡泡的声音；
2.选中一个方块的话画面会越来越暗，吓得本宝宝以为这游戏还有时间限制；
（只有两个，不然怎么叫简洁！）
关卡到了后面实在是越来越复杂，所以机智的我在拼图滑块出现前都是让妹妹在玩233
总结：
+后期全程思考
+关卡繁多
-内容单调
-音乐单一 差评

author: {'steamid': '76561198023400574', 'num_games_owned': 2967, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1516963853}
review:
Bought this to to have it in my steam library (I have a game buying additiction). :)

I have a lot of games in my library that I never played or had time to get into, but I always at least launch them to see if anything about it "grabs" me right away. klocki was one of those games. 

I don't write many reviews, but I felt that I should take the time to write about how this game is simply an absolutely amazing value at a dollar. I love puzzles as I am a software analyst for a living and debug stuff all the time, so I have an a predisposition to liking puzzle games. Most of them are all just bland though. I felt the urge to keep playing through klocki until I could no more. The puzzles get processively more difficult (as you would expect), and I enjoyed moving onto each "step" as it came. I wish there could be a ton more levels to play through, but at a dollar, there really isn't much room to complain about length. 

The simplicity is one of it's best traits. It's a simple, clean, and calm game. Definately worth the price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084836039', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1527279175}
review:
This game was a nice and fun short puzzle game. With no instructions on different stages it tests your mind to see if you can figure things out by observation. The music was nice and relaxing but too loud lack of in game volume controls isn't too big of a problem since I just went to my volume mixer and turned it down. The cost to amount of gameplay is fairly good I beat the whole game in just under an hour, short but good for the price. 

8/10 

The only bad thing about this game is personally I find 0 value in replaying it once it has been beaten, as the puzzles just repeat themselves.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024922481', 'num_games_owned': 528, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 49, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1475250739}
review: At first I didn't see much room for this relatively simple mechanic to grow and thought with unlimited "moves" the game was too easy. And then the game mechanics became very complicated very quickly and I immediately regretted my earlier thoughts. This game gets challenging! The game introduces a new mechanic every five levels or so and then you have to balance all these new mechanics at once. The last few puzzles took me a few minutes. All and all still a very short game, but for an $0.89 purchase, I got nearly an hour out of it. Pretty great!

author: {'steamid': '76561198040884867', 'num_games_owned': 2434, 'num_reviews': 901, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1475176363}
review:
Look, it's a fairly well-done puzzle game, and it's a buck. I don't think its the best puzzle game out there, but it is a far cry from the worst.

[b][i]klocki[/i] brings several puzzle mechanisms to the table, which can at times make it feel like the B-Side outtakes of a larger, more successful, think tank project.[/b] The one thing I'll really fault it for is that it really doesn't take too much forethought or thinking ahead to solve the puzzles. You just play around with a loose plan in your head, and you will almost always get there.

I value puzzle games that require no guessing, and reward (enforce, actually) a pure logic think-it-through approach (ie. [i]Hexcells[/i]). While there are much worse offenders out there, this is probably where I'd say [i]klocki[/i] loses out from being really brilliant.

Like many modern puzzlers, [i]klocki[/i] has a minimalistic interface and design approach, which is nice. It is on mobile too.

[b]Honestly, I wouldn't pay full price for this - there is about 1.5 hours of content and it is bound to drop in price at some point - OR get it on mobile since it is probably better with touch controls anyway.[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561197977112148', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 30, 'playtime_forever': 48, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1475146897}
review:
das spiel, bei dem man durch verschieben, verdrehen, vertauschen und versetzen von quadratischen teilen ein zusammenhängendes muster erzielen muss, spielt sich sehr schön und ruhig und ist somit für eine entspannte atmosphäre genau richtig. und für 45 minuten spielspaß kann man sich auch bei 90 cent wirklich nicht beschweren, zumal sich der/die entwickler bei der spielmechanik sehr viel mühe gegeben haben.
:)

author: {'steamid': '76561198300130427', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1498977713}
review: I like this game

author: {'steamid': '76561198012424039', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1709840148}
review:
I was about to pass up this game, but I’m glad I didn’t!

The idea is simple, the concept is novel in it’s execution, and the casual game play is quite relaxing.

My favorite part though is not even the puzzles!  It is that wonderful sound that plays upon completion of each one!  Real life would be so much cooler if it came with that sound effect. 

The game is short, with only about an hour of play, but with full price being only $0.99 it costs less than a candy bar, and will last you much longer.  And, who knows there may be more levels in the future.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047032125', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 88, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1475121144}
review:
One of the more complex puzzle games I've picked up. Love the three dimensional element they decided to apply. Gives a unique perspective and allows the difficulty to ramp up. The gridlock style of puzzle was a cool addition as well.

Would be nice to have the puzzles numbered or a UI to select specific puzzles. 

Completion time: 1.5hr

Good buy for $0.99

author: {'steamid': '76561198043295880', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 79, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1537997072}
review:
Can not recommend this enough. The first game where I was genuinely disappointed when there was nothing more to do. The puzzles are clever and mind-bending at times, it runs very well, you just boot it and you're off to the races.

Protip: Hold Shift right after you hit "Play" and an options menu will pop up allowing you to set it to windowed. It's fullscreen by default.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120159787', 'num_games_owned': 755, 'num_reviews': 78, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 132, 'last_played': 1645214285}
review:
It's been a long time since I dont rate a game but this game made me change my mind.

Klocki: puzzle game that has no tutorials and starts out like a pretty basic game then things start getting more complicated as the levels go.
Theres no numbers, no options , no timer, no pressures, is just you and your game.

Game has autosave so if you complete something you dont have to worry you can continue from there.

This game is worth more than a buck and its art and calm style is pretty amazing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985497697', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 52, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1474918043}
review:
This is simply the best game I have played since Monument Valley made me cry these oh so wonderful tears of joy. It's like its abstract mini game brother, cocooning you in into a wonderful world of splendidly assembled color and surface area puzzles. Oh I wish I could simply express how dear this experience has been to my heart, but even the very first second of that expression would fail to capture the essence and make it even worse towards the end.

It is wonderful. Buy it. [i]Twice.[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198314094666', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 112, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1491289756}
review:
起動すると文字や音声によるゲーム説明はなくプレイヤーは試行錯誤によりパズルを解くことになる。
最初は線をつなげるだけのシンプルなパズルだが、レベルを進めるに連れて様々な特徴を持ったパズルが登場し、そしてそれらが組み合わされた複合的なレベルも登場する。一見難解に見えるパズルも試行錯誤を重ねれば必ず答えに到達できる。このようなゲームでは攻略を一切見ずに最初から最後まで遊ぶことで一番おもしろくなる。

気になった点を上げるとすればシンプルすぎるデザインである。シンプルなUIは直感的でわかりやすいのだが、レベル選択できるメニュー画面くらいは搭載してもいいのではないだろうか。

author: {'steamid': '76561197974877784', 'num_games_owned': 1767, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1559008470}
review:
23 actual puzzles with 58 tutorials. I don't mean easy puzzles. I mean can't-miss exercises in trial & error. I'm pretty mediocre at puzzle games, and for me this all worked out to roughly one puzzle per minute, despite the fact that I'm easily confused by the sort of sliding-block stuff that appears later in the game.

The problem here is not that klocki isn't full of good ideas, or even that the puzzles are dumb. The problem is that this game spends nearly all its time introducing its elements, a little time combining some of them, and almost no time using all or even many of them at once.

For a comparison let's look at Blockwick 2, where the completion time for many reviewers looks like about 6 minutes per puzzle. Given my experience with Keifer Bros games I'd say this is about right. An unfair comparison, since Blockwick 2 is the work of a veteran three-man studio, but here's the thing. Klocki is more interesting, more original, and sometimes more clever. What went wrong here is that the sum of the parts never adds up to more than the sum of the parts.

Just when I felt like I was finally getting to the good stuff, the game ended.

Easily worth a dollar, but probably not worth the hour you'll spend nodding at the screen and waiting for a challenge.

author: {'steamid': '76561198024318503', 'num_games_owned': 5677, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 21, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1527269451}
review:
In dem Spiel geht es darum, durch Verschieben, Drehen oder Tauschen von quadratischen Platten, eine durchgezogene Linie zu erzeugen oder sicherzustellen, dass nicht zwei gleiche Felder nebeneinander liegen.

Das Spielprinzip ist simpel, aber das Spiel macht dennoch sehr viel Spaß, wenn man zwischendurch mal seine grauen Zellen etwas anstrengen möchte.

Und für den kleinen Preis lohnt es sich auf alle Fälle.

Fazit:

Klare Kaufempfehlung!

author: {'steamid': '76561198026663061', 'num_games_owned': 122, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 165, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1526251628}
review:
Игра класс! Проходится за час с чуть-чуть не особо напрягаясь, при этом теряется ход времени и прохождение кажется не таким быстрым. Очень порадовало сочетание: комбинации головоломок и подача их в разных плоскостях. Так же игровой процесс сопровождает приятная фоновая музыка. ЭТО ШЕДЕЕЕЕЕВР! На некоторых уровнях можно просидеть по двадцать минут не видеть выхода из ситуации, но посидев и перебрав возможные варианты у вас все получится.
Внимание! Картинка в игре сильно выжигает глаза! Очень яркая и многоцветная. Запаситесь Визином!

9 окулистов из 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198120333113', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 44, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1680446716}
review:
[h1]Klocki
6/10[/h1]
[b]Przyjemna, prosta gra logiczna.[/b]
Gra zajmuje godzinkę, lub dwie. Nie wiem ile zawiera plansz, nie ma żadnego menu poziomów, po ukończeniu ostatniego gra po prostu zapętla się i wyskakuje pierwszy poziom, co trochę słabo wg. mnie wygląda. Gra ma prostą przyjemną grafikę, jak i dźwięk, choć po jakimś czasie i tak włączyłem swoją muzykę. 
Trudność gry jest niewielka, plansze mają poziom od kompletnie banalnego, do średniego, w tych najtrudniejszych musiałem parę minut pomyśleć. Rozgrywka sprowadza się do zmieniania położenia i obracania elementów planszy tak, by utworzyły wymagany wzór. W tych trudniejszych planszach chodzi o nadanie priorytetów konkretnym ustawieniom. Najpierw wykluczamy pewne ustawienia danych klocków, a potem inne ustawiamy tak, by pasowały do wcześniej podjętych kroków. Moim zdaniem autor nie wykorzystał odpowiednio potencjału takiej mechaniki rozgrywki i nie stworzył trudnych, rozbudowanych poziomów.
Zapiona bez obniżki za 1 euro - uczciwa cena za taki produkt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198092967864', 'num_games_owned': 537, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1495231003}

review:
难易度始终保持在比较低的水准，难度还没提起来就循环了，我一脸懵逼……
如果真是想将脑活动维持在较低水平放松一下，又不希望虚度时间的话可以尝试，想来预防老年痴呆大概也有效，但真的作为智力活动来说就可能令一些喜爱解谜游戏的朋友失望。考虑到这一点所以点了不推荐，实际上本人觉得这款游戏还是可以的……

author: {'steamid': '76561197975319070', 'num_games_owned': 1118, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 159, 'last_played': 1705780537}
review:
Bardzo wciągająca, relaksująca gra logiczna.
Grafika jest bardzo ładna, minimalistyczna. Świetne, ambientowe udźwiękowienie pomaga w skupieniu się i "wczuciu" w grę.
Niestety jest stosunkowo krótka. I prosta - słabo gram w tego typu produkcje, a przeszedłem ją w dwa wieczory. Z drugiej strony nie chodzi tu o wielogodzinne główkowanie, ale o klimat i relaks. W dodatku wiele różnych mechanik (na dobrą sprawę każdą można by zamknąć w osobnej grze) nie pozwala się nudzić. Nieco rozczarowuje również zakończenie - przechodzimy po prostu ponownie do pierwszego poziomu. Problemem jest również nierozdzielenie "sejwów" między lokalnymi kontami.
Grę bardzo mocno polecam. Doświadczenie jest wspaniałe, niemal oniryczne :P Cena jak najbardziej rozsądna, a w dodatku jest to polska produkcja. Czekam na więcej, na pewno kupię, coby autor miał za co kupić piwko

review: Very enjoyable puzzles! There are several different types of puzzles, which is nice, because then you can keep going for longer without it getting teduous. The difficulty is at a good level, though I confess that I did need to use a guide one time and was close to giving in a couple of other times, where I instead decided to persevere. But I think that's a good sign, because that means that it's not too hard and not too easy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198131238455', 'num_games_owned': 73, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 47, 'last_played': 1494592645}
review:
Klocki jako gra logiczna jest jedną z najlepszych tego typu na rynku, przyjemny soundtrack (chyba w niej jest tylko jedna piosenka nawet ale współgra idealnie z "klimatem" gry). Owa produkcja jest strasznie zróżnicowana pod wzgledem poziomów (na pierwszych się nudziłem, ale z czasem nad jedną planszą myśli się nawet 10-15 minut) co pozwala na grę dla młodszych jak i starszych odbiorców. Ogólnie: Gra jest w przyjemnej oprawie muzycznej i graficznej, jej prostota może szybko znużyć, ale jeśli któś gra co 1-2 dni po kilka poziomów to gra wystarczy na długo i nie ma szansy się ją znudzić. Osobiście polecam wszystkim za tę cenę! Moja ocena: 9/10
P.S. W dodatku jest stworzona przez polskiego producenta więc patrioci będą mieli jeszcze większą satysfakcje ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198168824694', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 89, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1474128198}
review: When I initially bought it I doubted all the reviews, but "Overwhelmingly Positive" perfectly describes how great this game is. Best 99 cents I ever spent. This game takes puzzles and mind benders to a new level. The game is easy to follow, and allows you to figure everything out on your own. It's simplicity makes it calm and relaxing rather than pressuring, and it's actually relaxing and works your brain. In addition it has so much variety. I spent an hour playing and felt satisfied for my money. To know there is more has me excited. Great game, keep it up!
