author: {'steamid': '76561198127331436', 'num_games_owned': 1244, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 82, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1468514652}
review:
[url=https://cowlevel.net/game/klocki/review/1895970][b]转载自奶牛关的个人评测[/b][/url]

这是一款适合6-12岁的益智游戏。（换言之就是适合小学生的游戏）

难度不高，通过j几种基本的拼图移动方式，如交换，平移，旋转等方式，将直线或同色快图连接在一起。从一开始最简单的平面，到三视图的立体面，到多面。基本上增加难度的方式无法是增加拼图的基本块数和增加更多的面。

通关流程基本在一个半小时左右（上下误差在30分钟）。没卡！没成就！亮点大概就在配色，越到后面加入越来越多的颜色，但依旧不会感到不适。

噢，对了，音乐没听，主要是这类音乐个人不是很感兴趣...

author: {'steamid': '76561198046555322', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 93, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1527448523}
review: This is a great puzzle game. I do not know if you will decide that about an hours worth of game time is worth a dollar. Saying that, this is one of my favorite puzzle games I have played in recent times. The controls are super intuitive. There is no tutorial or way to show the controls. It's not needed. There were only a few parts that I could not grasp immediately, however, with a little fiddling around, you should be able to easily figure out how to play each level (although figuring out how to beat each level is a different story). All in all, I recommend this game and would rate it 4/5. The only thing lacking is the amount of levels. I would love to see a continuation/more levels added.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031225726', 'num_games_owned': 341, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1503933311}
review:
[h1]The Miracle of klocki[/h1]
([strike]blocks[/strike])

When you were a child (or if you are) you are not played with your toys (here: blocks) for some achievements; for a high score; under the pressure of time (or Steam "Trading" Cards)-
 [b]you just had fun[/b] .

In [i]klocki[/i] you solve puzzles- listening to relaxing music.
There is nothing more to tell here, because there are no defeats.

The game is relaxing like "Journey" (PS3) - a good calming of everyday life.

[h1]This Game Is Just Right[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198094326273', 'num_games_owned': 305, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1578196488}
review: Klocki is a minimalistic modern puzzle game that is somewhat addicting the first time you start it up. The levels will obviously get harder, but as they get harder, the ways you move the pieces of the puzzle will change. Clicking to sliding to rotating, you name it. Klocki is something to play when you have a little time to burn before going out or if you're waiting for something to render or export. It's very lightweight and easy for everyone to play. You can be the game in no time at all, so I hope in the near future the devs will create perhaps a workshop for the game so that the players themselves can create levels and have more diversity and challenge added to the game. For only a mere $1, this game is something to drop your last dollar in your Steam wallet on!

review:
便宜休闲喜加一
断断续续玩了几天通关了，偶尔有几关复杂一点，但是都算不上难，都是稍微多试试就能出来的……
音乐和音效很有气质
有些关卡的颜色实在是瞎眼
一开始的节奏还让我有种在玩the witness的错觉，遗憾的是玩到后面感觉难度并没有逐渐增加，仅只是单纯的堆积复杂度

author: {'steamid': '76561198246780548', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 45, 'playtime_forever': 901, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 662, 'last_played': 1497012532}
review:
[h1]Prós[/h1]
Ótimo jogo.
Bom, simples e barato.

[h1]Contras[/h1]
Faltou a numeração das fases. A gente joga, mas não sabe em que estágio está, se falta muito para acabar.
Não há, pelo menos eu não achei, uma opção para interromper o jogo e reiniciá-lo lá da primeira fase.

author: {'steamid': '76561198161423472', 'num_games_owned': 262, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 77, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 52, 'last_played': 1474702668}
review:
Bu oyunu nasıl anlatacağım bilemiyorum. Steam'de gezinirken birden karşıma çıktı ve nedense 2 Lira oluşu ilgimi çekmişti ve içimden bi ses "OYUNU AL" diye bağırdı. Hesabımda kalan 4.67 kadar bir miktarla oyunu aldım ve hemen indirdim. Aman tanrım neye bulaştığımı anlayamadım bile. Başında oturup beynimi yaktım ve sizinde yakmanız gerektiğini düşünüyorum. İlk başta kolay olan fakat gittikçe zorlaşan harika bir bulmaca oyunu oynadığınız diğer oyunları bırakıp biraz sakin bir ortam oluşturmak için ideal.

Artılar:

-2 TL'lik ucuz ve paranıza değecek bir oyun.
-87 Mb Boyut.
-Rahatlatıcı Müzikler.
-Beyin egzersizi ve Stres emme özelliği.

Eksiler:

-Epilepsi Hastaları için zararlı diyebilirim 10 dakika oynama sonucu gözlerim hafiften ağrıdı.


Kesinlikle Almaya Değer...

author: {'steamid': '76561198035655574', 'num_games_owned': 1323, 'num_reviews': 204, 'playtime_forever': 80, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 80, 'last_played': 1495214885}
review:
I really enjoy unique little puzzle games and this one is a nice addition to the library. It’s quite short, as it took me just over an hour to complete, but it was still quite enjoyable in my opinion. 

It plays with various mechanics to mix the game up a little and make it a little more challenging. It also does a good job of introducing each new mechanic gently before incorporating it into all the others and giving you harder puzzles to solve. 

Difficulty wise, I would say that it’s not at the “mind-boggling” level, so you won’t have to think too hard about it. But with that said it’s not too easy either. It’s kind of a middle ground that I would say still left me satisfied enough to have liked the game. 

The graphics are simple and nice on the eyes, which gives the game a chill kind of feeling despite the fact that some puzzles towards the end look a little visually chaotic.

This game came after the developer’s previous puzzle game “Hook” which is another unique short little puzzle game that I quite enjoyed. If you have played and enjoyed that I think you would enjoy this one too, and vice versa to people that have played this and might enjoy that.

I look forward to any other little puzzle games that this developer comes out with and would say it’s definitely worth spending an hour on for under £1. 

EDIT: The dev added in an achievement after I had finished it for completing the game, I re-installed the game ready to go through it again and was pleasantly surprised to know that despite it saying that it’s not on the cloud, it had saved that I had already completed it. As you can scroll left and right through the levels and it was where I left it last time, I automatically got the achievement. So an easy 100% if you haven’t played the game, but an even easier 100% if you have.


TL;DR : It’s an interesting and unique little puzzle game that is quite short but enjoyable over all.

author: {'steamid': '76561198163210600', 'num_games_owned': 509, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 164, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 164, 'last_played': 1494658606}
review:
The only reason I brought this game was because it was cheap and I was bored. I never thought I would enjoy it as much as I did.

Klocki involves multi-coloured lines and shapes that fit together in a pattern that you must solve. The game introduces many new types of puzzles as you go along, and intergrates them in such a way where the only work your mind can think of is 'wow'. When you complete a puzzle, it just comes together so nicely and it's so satisfying to see you have solved. If you've played The Witness, imagine this game as a smaller, more simple and non-first person kinda game. It's almost like a mobile app.

Although it only took me just over an hour to complete, for just 79p, it's a steal. I highly reccomend this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970571209', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1527354773}
review: A minimalist tile-based puzzle game that's more than worth the price. The animation, sound, and color scheme are all really quite good, and even though the mechanics are a bit cold the game itself feels like a joyful affair. The puzzles that include sliding blocks (booo) are the least-frustrating sliding block puzzles I've ever done in a video game (yaaay?). No brain-busters here, but an easy recommendation if you enjoy a relaxing puzzle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126405404', 'num_games_owned': 1185, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 57, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 57, 'last_played': 1472464465}
review:
Great game! It takes about an hour to solve all puzzles, which is a good amount of content for this price. The puzzles are not extremely hard (actually most are pretty simple) and I was only stuck on one level near the end. Throughout the game new tile types are introduced, which keeps the game interesting. There is not a single piece of text in the entire game, yet the game explains itself really well.

Overall it's a good game to burn away some time if you are bored or have to wait a couple of minutes for something. I'd say go ahead and buy it, since it's only € 0,99 and you will get about an hour of fun out of it (more if you want to go trough more then once).

author: {'steamid': '76561198069801407', 'num_games_owned': 303, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 198, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1495849810}
review:

author: {'steamid': '76561198042669538', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 190, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1472466704}
review:
I'm a rabid Linux user and it takes a lot of enticement to drag me kicking and screaming into Windows, but I love puzzle games and klocki's incredible review scores were too tempting to resist.

[h1]Difficulty[/h1]

I was expecting harder puzzles - maybe not hardcore but the screenshots looked like they had some challenge in them at least - but I was surprised to find such easy gameplay. A few levels put up a couple of extra minutes' resistance but most I just sped straight through non-stop.

[h1]Pro[/h1]

It's a pretty, casual puzzler to spend a couple of hours with. I did enjoy the time.

[h1]Cons[/h1]

No level overview, no names/numbers for the levels. You can't tell how far you've progressed in the game. It turns out there are 82 levels but you have no idea during gameplay, you just carry on and then suddenly find yourself on level 1 again. Game over.

Windows only. I know I'm harping on about this, but how hard would it be to port such a simple game over to Linux, really?

[h1]Value[/h1]

Being a $1 game doesn't automatically make it brilliant value. You have to consider the amount of gameplay and compare it with other games. I'd say $1 is correct for this game but not outstanding. You have to bear in mind there are a bazillion other $1 2-hour games, most of which have trading cards so you can get half your money back.

[h1]Steam[/h1]

No achievements. No cards.

[h1]Verdict[/h1]

I confess I had pre-conceived high expectations for this game but it didn't live up to the hype. It's a perfectly nice short puzzler and deserves a recommendation but it's forgettable and I've had better. Examples? OK then:

Zenge is the same price/length/difficulty but it's prettier, has better music, trading cards, an achievement and Linux; Meld costs more but has 50 times the gameplay (time-wise) with difficulty from easy to hardcore++, making it far better value.

Go on then, downvote me. You needed a reality check amongst all the enthusiasm though. You know it.

[quote]This review is part of the Steamified Community Review program. For similar reviews and fantastic giveaways please visit http://steamified.com.[/quote]

author: {'steamid': '76561198000175657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1468986114}
review:
Decent puzzler; not hugely hard, mostly involves just looking for ways to wire things up within the constraints.

My only real complaint about the game is that I finished it in under an hour, at which point it just loops back to the first levesl; that said, it costs a buck, so you can't really view that as a negative.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117954255', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 156, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 124, 'last_played': 1590626846}
review:
klocki is just soo relaxing. The music, the sound effects, the colors, the designs, everything in it seems to work together to put you in the best setting for an aesthetically satisfying past-time.

This isn't a game for people who like hardcore puzzle action: it's short, it's easy, and there aren't any levels in which you'll find yourself stuck. That being said, I think it's much more of an experience than a puzzle game per se (for those who read "puzzle" and instantly think of brain-bugging, thought intensive, difficult games). I once rage quit on another game, so I opened up klocki and it was the best thing I could have done. It doesn't really present you challenges, but I took my sweet time with it (I played it for only a few minutes per day and it took me exactly 2 hours total to go once through all the levels) and oh, did I enjoy it.

I also think the price is just fine, and would even argue it's cheap for everything you get, especially if there were more levels (which I find to be the only downside). You're not paying for a challenge here, you pay for the beautiful design and atmosphere enveloping the rotating, swapping, sliding tranquility of it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090566114', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 159, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1469786649}
review:
总的来说还算有意思的游戏了。

难度适中，循序渐进，流程也不长，像我这种笨一点的玩得比较久。

小问题：打开游戏经常卡死不得不强关，原因不明，到了后面麻烦的关卡明明快成功了，却因为卡死重头开始很不开心。估计是bug吧。

打折入手吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561197984993665', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1496584974}
review:
Klocki ist ein nettes Puzzlespiel, das für nich ganz einen Euro vom Preis her durchaus angemessen ist.
Die Rätsel sind allerdings durchweg eher einfach. Das größere Manko ist meiner Meinung nach, das es in 'klocki' weder Abschnitte gibt, noch Achievements.
So wird klocki mit der Zeit eintönig. Wahrscheinlich werde ich, wenn ich das allerletzte Puzzle gelöst habe, überrascht sein, das das Spiel zuende ist.

author: {'steamid': '76561198138969388', 'num_games_owned': 133, 'num_reviews': 53, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1472075649}
review:
Much like Hook, this minimal puzzle is very clever. Despite it how short it is, klocki supplies smooth gameplay, increasingly hard puzzles, fun mechanics, and interesting sounds for each action. There is no tutorial; you're just throw right into the game, and must figure out new puzzle mechanics yourself. Which I love.
[b] 9/10 [/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198060731577', 'num_games_owned': 2394, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 53, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1472036826}
review:
Wspaniała gra, którą, niestety, nie nacieszymy się zbyt długo. Mechaniki są wykorzystane w dobry sposób, tak, że uczymy się ich powoli, gdyż pojawiają się z nimi po prostu coraz trudniejsze zagadki, by w końcu połączyć je z innymi. Gra ma tylko 80 poziomów, a po skończeniu ich wszystkich nie dostajemy nawet zakończenia, poziomy po prostu lecą od nowa. Poza tym, gra ma naprawdę wspaniały soundtrack. Zdecydowanie polecam.

DOOOBRE, POMARAŃCZoweeeeee

review: 只花了一小时左右就通关了，总体画面非常干净，颜色很漂亮，难度不是很高。谜一般的27种支持语言界面却看不到一个字。（虽然看不到一个字但是通过简单的关卡直截了当的告诉了玩家如何去玩）不同于其他的解密游戏，但我认为解密游戏就应该把重点放在解密上。

author: {'steamid': '76561198325651728', 'num_games_owned': 98, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 96, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1607146565}
review:
非常简约，难度也不高，适合手痒打发时间。
背景色比较亮，对习惯暗色背景的我来说略为刺眼（不过暗色不适合这个游戏），不能太长时间盯着看。要是可以窗口化缩小一下四周背景会舒服一些。
耗时比我想象中短很多，1.2小时居然完全通关了，完全没感觉自己过了82关这么多，心理感觉才30关左右，真该给个关数提示的。不过6块钱的游戏就别指望内容有多厚啦。

author: {'steamid': '76561197991548373', 'num_games_owned': 495, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 103, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 49, 'last_played': 1586107272}
review:
十分休闲的益智游戏。前面部分都是随便试，后面逐渐增加的难度，到最后并没有太过困难，画面风格也十分简洁。
综合价格来讲，是性价比可观的游戏。

author: {'steamid': '76561198314087779', 'num_games_owned': 271, 'num_reviews': 126, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1508934474}
review:
强力推荐！
之前在手机上搜索解谜类游戏的时候，免费玩了个爽。刚才在steam上再次看到它，没有任何折扣，但是我毫不犹豫地买了下来。
因为这款游戏实在是太有趣了！六块钱物超所值！请务必喜加一！
简洁可爱的画面，有趣多变的谜题，轻松舒心的BGM。没有冗杂的文字解说，清新无比，好单纯好不做作，和外面那群妖艳贝戈货一点都不一样。
这是我第一次在steam平台上撰写评测，因为我刚刚购入了个人电脑。希望我的库存数量不会影响我语言的可信度。
我想说这个游戏非常值得去买，在手机上我花费了70分钟左右通关，体感五分。

review: Bel rompicapo, sulla scia del famoso Monument Valley. Ho già completato il gioco su iOS ma avevo desiderio di giocarvi anche sul MAC. La difficoltà non è mai frustrante, ma è interessante vedere come introduca bene le varie modalità e come stimoli in maniera varia il cervello. Mi sento di consigliarlo, lo finirete e probabilmente tornerete a giocarvi, come passatempo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044861097', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 85, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 85, 'last_played': 1471761798}
review:
Clean, minimalistic and elegant design. At first it appears too simple and hackneyed, but I'm glad as I stayed with it, as it quickly introduced puzzle variations that kept it interesting and engaging till the end -- to the point I was disappointed it was over and went looking for more levels. 

The puzzle designs feel a bit amateurish -- in that there isn't a consistency to the difficulty ramp (it can jump from easy to hard to easy), and some of the innovative puzzle mechanisms aren't employed to their potential (e.g. the brilliant dominoes mechanism isn't used beyond a couple of puzzles). And I say that not as much as criticism, but rather as feedback to encourage the devs to focus there for future games, as they've done a remarkable job in most other aspects. 

It is a short game, but very appropriately priced for 99c. I'm a cheapskate and yet I felt it was absolutely worth buying, not just for the game experiece, but also to encourage the developers to continue down this path -- you guys hold much promise. Good luck!

author: {'steamid': '76561198028108955', 'num_games_owned': 155, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1471738968}
review:
I'll be honest here - I bought this game expecting that I wouldn't enjoy it. And well, here we are. I understand that nobody likes a party pooper who buys overwhelmingly positive rated games just to leave a negative review on them, but I have a few important points to make.

Before anyone starts to think otherwise: In no way do I hate puzzle games. In fact, I would say puzzle games are my favorite genre. The feeling of satisfaction when one solves a difficult puzzle, the 'aha!' moment, is one of the best experiences one can have playing video games. But, for me at least, klocki fails to deliver on this experience.

The goal of each level in the game is to rearrange the pieces in it so that there are no "loose ends" remaining. It's a very simple concept and the game communicates it to the player without using any words, which is one thing I'll give it credit for. Unfortunately, the depth that this system is supposed to allow for is sorely lacking.

When I say that, part of what I mean is that the puzzles are easy in this game. Quite easy, in fact. There weren't many puzzles that took me more than a couple of minutes to solve. Now, I don't demand that every puzzle game be Snakebird levels of hard (even if I prefer it that way), but there's no satisfaction to be had in solving an easy puzzle. Puzzles are supposed to challenge your mind in a way that makes you feel smart when you solve them. If there's no challenge, there's no smart feeling when you solve them. There are a few challenging puzzles in the game, but even those don't really give the game much depth.

Most of the game's difficulty comes through complexity - you make the levels harder by making them larger. This is poor puzzle design. A puzzle game's difficulty should come from exploring the strategies that the ruleset allows for. But in this game, there really isn't much strategy in solving the puzzles at all. When you discount the possibilities that obviously won't lead to a valid solution, each puzzle can be solved through pure trial and error. If a particular piece has some loose ends, you move it around to a different place, and if that messes up the connections of a different piece, you adjust that piece also, and soon enough with this process you'll end up with the solution. The game frequently adds new methods of moving pieces such as rotating handles and sliding tiles, and also new types of connections such as abstract shapes, but these fail to change the basic strategy of trial and error. In the end, they feel like a cover-up for the inherent shallowness of the core game mechanic.

So, if you're looking for a puzzle game that requires clever thinking and intimate knowledge of the game mechanics, you're probably convinced by now that this is not the puzzle game you're looking for. But I suspect that most people here don't really care about difficulty and depth of mechanics - they just want  something that can pass the time while also being simple and relaxing. That's perfectly fine; life can be exhausting at times, and you might not want to play super-demanding games after you've had a long day. But even considering that, this game is poor value for your money.

Some people are going to look at me weird for calling a 99 cent game "poor value". But yes, this game is poor value for your money. It took me 45 minutes to complete this game, so that's 0.75 hours of gameplay per dollar. Which doesn't look too bad at first, but let's compare it against my favorite puzzle game, Stephen's Sausage Roll. (I'm sorry, I just can't help but be a zealot for that game. It's soooooo good.) Stephen's Sausage Roll is $30, and it took me 32.5 hours to beat, giving over an hour of gameplay per dollar. Just think about it: a game thirty times the price of this one [i]beat[/i] it in value! And Stephen's Sausage Roll's puzzles are much more involved, so you could even say that each hour is more "densely packed" than an hour of klocki. Even worse, you could play free online logic puzzle games such as nonograms or slitherlink, which I would consider to be around the same complexity as this game, giving a hours per dollar ratio of *gasp* [b]infinity![/b].

Now, I don't think hours per dollar is the best measure of a game's value, as the previous (ridiculous) example shows, but if you're playing games solely to pass the time, then most puzzle games are pretty much interchangeable for that purpose. And in any case, the "good value" angle seems to be what developers try for whenever they release an absurdly low priced game like this, so I wanted to get that out of the way. If you want to spend money on a relaxing logic puzzle game on Steam, I might suggest Everyday Genius: SquareLogic, which provides thousands of procedurally generated Sudoku-like puzzles that actually have quite a bit of depth to them. Or maybe you could try the Hexcells series, which has over 100 handcrafted Minesweeper-like puzzles over three games, plus a random puzzle generator in the third game. Both cost significantly more than the 99 cents klocki costs ($5 and $9 for the entire series, respectively), but hopefully this will reinforce a point that too often goes ignored in this era of cheap indie games and Steam sales: you get what you pay for.

(I think I spent over three times as long writing this review than actually playing the game. What the heck is wrong with me?...)

author: {'steamid': '76561198119985051', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 25, 'playtime_forever': 51, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1471779108}
review:
[h1]超シンプルで超スッキリするカチャカチャ系パズル[/h1]

ハマる人はかなりハマりそうな内容のパズルでした
進めていくと新たなギミックがどんどん出てきますが
マウスで数秒いじくり回すとすぐ理解できます
パズルが完成したときの型にハマった感じがとても気持ちイイ
98円なのでおさいふにもやさしい

必須なもの
・マウス
・1円玉98枚

状況によって必要なもの
・高度な柔軟性
・臨機応変な対応力

ようするに　いきあたりばったりって　やつなのじゃ

author: {'steamid': '76561197971138420', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1495329031}
review:
オープニング、ありません。
チュートリアル、ありません。
エンディング、ありません。
設定画面、ありません。
ゲーム終了、ありません。
ともかく、シンプル。

はじめはパネルを交換するだけ。
そのうち隣接禁止パネルやスライドパズル、回転要素などが加わってきますが
感覚でなんとかなります。

author: {'steamid': '76561198171081586', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 129, 'last_played': 1471470292}
review:
Klocki is a game with very simple concepts, but as the game goes on, it becomes more immersive and complex until you may spend several minutes trying to figure out a puzzle composed of multiple concepts.

I highly recommend this game to anyone with 99 cents to spare and an empty evening. My only complaint is that the game is quite short, but with its price tag, that's to be expected.

一小时通关无压力~~~
画面异常的简约，没有菜单，打开游戏直接开玩，仅有的设置为音乐音效开关和关卡切换，退出游戏就靠esc
不要看到这破游戏支持中文就xing♂奋不已，也不要看到这破游戏支持27种语言就瞬间觉得很高大上
因为这破游戏真的简约到没有字，没！有！字！
没有字的游戏需要支持什么语言23333333
难度适中，类似于接电路的解谜向游戏，没有教程但容易上手，全部打完会回到第一关
然而感觉关卡是不是少了点，82关一下就没了orz
不过这游戏卖6块钱的确很值

review: マーケットで儲けた100円でウォレット購入。暇つぶしになる安いゲームを探しこのゲームに辿り着きました。デザインよりのゲーム画面と色使いで楽しくプレイできました。気軽に遊べて気軽に辞められるので気軽に購入してみてはどうでしょうか？100円としては優秀だと思いますよ！<3　デモ版もあるみたいだけど100円なら買ってあげて欲しい

author: {'steamid': '76561198040699408', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 79, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 173, 'last_played': 1495177408}
review:
Головоломка в минималистическом стиле, на пространственное воображение. Можно порекомендовать вместо начертательной геометрии... Сначала уровни простые и проходятся за полминуты-минуту, потом задачки становятся сложнее. Перекладывай, двигай, как в пятнашках, меняй местами, крути-верти элементы, и получи нужный порядок, вернее, необходимый рисунок.
Не все задания интересны, но покопаться в них интересно.
Все же игре чего-то не хватает. надо подумать. Быть может, Мастерской Стима?? Создания своих заданий?

author: {'steamid': '76561198248218824', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1468902958}
review:
一款类似于∞Loop（一款手机游戏，我不知道这里有没有，中文叫∞再环）的小游戏~~、

二者都是把电路接好（呃我是理科生）

凭难度和游玩多样性来说是klocki比较优秀

但是klocki关卡略少（你信不信我一小时就玩了一次半完整的了？）

不过目前∞Loop我也只玩到316关……

话虽如此，整体的图形内容非常丰富，

卡关率比较低，是个优点哦（其实还是会卡关不过卡完之后你就会发现后面的关卡会简单一点这不是错觉因为我也这么觉得）

值得游玩一番~可惜玩了一遍就不想玩了~

（如果能够更新更多的关卡……也许六块钱会物超所值？）

author: {'steamid': '76561198037266539', 'num_games_owned': 415, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1471348054}

review:
klocki's a fun, simplistic puzzle game that doesn't last long and is for a pretty reasonable price.
You get quite a bit of levels that take a bit to figure out with a pretty clean and cool artstyle and the ambient music that plays is pretty calming.
If you got some spare cash, love puzzle games, and want to waste around an hour of time, this game's for you.

author: {'steamid': '76561197969808017', 'num_games_owned': 1620, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 349, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1618570434}
review: Combines puzzle idea from games like the sliding puzzle, Peg Solitaire, Tsuro, Loops of Zen and others into a whole new kind of challenge. Some of the solutions blew my mind when I uncovered them. More importantly, the game keeps throwing new ideas and challenges at you, and combines the different puzzle types into fiendishly complex little tasks that are rewarding to complete. This experience is worth far more than the asking price of $1.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077636973', 'num_games_owned': 163, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1509355518}
review:
Following the author's last puzzle game, "Hook", Klocki is another great relaxing and minimalistic puzzle game.

The concept this time twirls around swapping and rotating tiles to complete one or more paths inside geometrical figures, the difficulty curve is perfect, sometimes challenging but never frustrating, and it's one of those games that (being only around 1 hour long) makes you finish it in a single breath; not to mention the AMAZING background music and sound effects, relax is granted.

Being priced at 0.99€ you simply have no reasons not to buy it, the only cons I can find are that  there's no end-game screen, you are just warped back to the first level (but you get the achievement for completing all levels) and the game itself being a bit short, some extra levels would be good.

[h1] 7.5/10 [/h1]
Maciej Targoni doesn't disappoint and confirms to be able of creating amazing and relaxing puzzle games, indeed they are short but being priced so low there's no reason not to buy it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198071924054', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 167, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1496412345}

review:
I liked this game. Its kinda minimalistic GUI is quite fitting for the game. The new concepts and mechanics of the game are intoruced at a good pace, and keeps you engaged and entertained. This game really makes you think and is pretty fun. The only current problem with it (also the biggest) is the lack of content, as I beat it in a mere 46 minutes. 

Currently I would give it a 7/10, but I would definitely rate it higher if / when more content/levels are added. A slightly improved level selection system would also be pretty convenient.

author: {'steamid': '76561198066627159', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 98, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1500720252}
review: klocki ist ein wirklich tolles Rätselspiel und kann es nur weiterempfehlen. Das Ziel ist bei jedem Level zwar das gleiche, aber wie man dazu kommt ist eine andere Frage. Je nach Rätsel hat man verschiedene Mechaniken das Ziel zu erreichen. Die Rätsel beginnen ganz einfach, steigern sich von Level zu Level in der Schwierigkeit und dann wird eine neue Mechnik eingeführt. Im Laufe des Spiels werden dann diese verschiedenen Mechaniken kombiniert und so bietet dieses Spiel eine Fülle an verschiedenen Rätsel, die aber trotzdem nicht langweilig werden. Ich hoffe, dass der/die Entwickler bald einige Rätsel hinzufügen werden, denn es könnten gerne noch ein paar mehr sein ;)

author: {'steamid': '76561198139839169', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 55, 'last_played': 1494083015}
review:
This is a cool puzzle game. I'd really recomend to try it out. It's only 0.99€ and it makes you think quite a lot and you might need to have some 3d vision for this one. :) 

Sadly it's a bit too short. You might say 1h of gameplay is ok, not for a puzzle game. Because this game is minimalistic, I would say it need more puzzles :) 

I really hope this game won't be forgotten by the dev and he will add more puzzles to it! :) 

P.S. Please add ending screen, I thought that game continues, just it will seem simple but it will be trickier :D :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198160846714', 'num_games_owned': 1568, 'num_reviews': 181, 'playtime_forever': 472, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 87, 'last_played': 1495164185}
review:
Довольно красивая головоломка. Прошел наверное половину игры и застрял на одном уровне, не могу решить его уже 4 вечера подряд.

Плюсы
1. Красивый дизайн.
2. Прикольные звуки.
3. Цена радует.

Минусы
1. В игре абсолютно не понятно, что от нас хотят.
2. Некоторые уровни замудрены слишком уж.

Выводы.
Если вам нравятся необычные игры-головоломки,смело покупайте!

author: {'steamid': '76561198009823153', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 64, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1470569558}

author: {'steamid': '76561198281746138', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 92, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5, 'last_played': 1612921345}
review:
Simples, Leve e Barato.
Bom para exercitar o cérebro com puzzles que te fazem pensar durante uns 10min.
Tem uma trilha sonora bem suave, e é um jogo bem bonito visualmente falando.
Não espere algo complexo, pois nem Menu há no jogo, apertando Esc o jogo fecha, e só é usado o botão esquerdo do mouse.
Quando eu comprei ele estava 2 reais, e vale a pena, se você estiver lendo isso em outra data e ele estiver mais barato, compre sem medo :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198097821792', 'num_games_owned': 835, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1470403502}
review:
這是一個非常優美的遊戲 簡單樸實且又不失遊戲性
我是滿建議可以增設成就系統的 這能讓遊戲更加的進化
從一開始的線條互換到中階的方向旋轉 其實都是很多益智遊戲著重的點
這款遊戲則是在更進一步地跳脫思維的限制 30NT的平價小遊戲 
值得讓我們去支持

author: {'steamid': '76561198067488116', 'num_games_owned': 326, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 194, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1569825255}
review:
~9/10~
Really soothing, and addicting if you think you are good at puzzles. The early stages prepare you for the later stages. every few levels it introduces a new mechanic so it doesnt get boring fast.

I personally am more of a fan of spacial puzzles rather than number puzzles. I also enjoy solving "rubik's" cubes, 4x4's and the megaminx. This is a great "app" type game and works well with a mouse. 

The music is great too. Totally worth 99 cents if you want something to waste an hour on in your down time. I give this a 9/10, because there was no level counter, which could have been left out for asthetic purposes, but is still a feature i value in a level based game. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198016251988', 'num_games_owned': 3171, 'num_reviews': 35, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 188, 'last_played': 1495122733}
review:
Отличная головоломка на вечерок. 

   Игра от создателей hook и oO. Нам предстоит решать разные головоломки с сменой деталей, разворотом, перекручиванием, перемещением и прочими действиями. В игре пока 84 уровня, некоторые из них очень простые, могут занять пару секунд, некоторые более сложные. По ходу прохождения мы открываем все новые и новые типы головоломок. А к концу игры так вообще увидим все что только можно в одном. 

   Достижений и карточек в игре пока нет.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=729802800

   Также, тем кому игра понравится, советую также посмотреть игру Zenge

author: {'steamid': '76561198020839656', 'num_games_owned': 263, 'num_reviews': 170, 'playtime_forever': 299, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1527457060}
review:
If you enjoyed Hook, you'll enjoy klocki as well. An interesting take on angles and patterns on an isometric perspective. Either have to switch tiles, rotate tiles, rotate platform, or slide tiles to solve each puzzle.

Difficulty gradually gets higher.

Good for $1, and takes nearly an hour to beat.

author: {'steamid': '76561198280061902', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 86, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 86, 'last_played': 1470699555}
review:
Okay, to be honest, this is just a minimal puzzle game. So why the 98% positive reviews?. Simple, because of the variation. The game has about 80 diferent puzzles with like 5 mechanics and they arent explained in any way, however, you will figure it out eventually. It took me an hour and a half to finish it but it was for a buck, so the content/price relationship is fine. However, it aint really replayable. You will be done with it after the first run. Good music, beautifull artstyle and clever puzzles. I enjoy it, and I recommend it.

7/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198043784203', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 564, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 280, 'last_played': 1578484297}
review: Игра интересная, но вот уровней мало T_T

author: {'steamid': '76561198173074690', 'num_games_owned': 128, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1468867706}
review:
Первый раз пишу обзор на такую дешевую и простую игрушку, но к счастью, он будет положительным. Klocki - замечательная, дешевая, но качественно сделанная головоломка с приятной минималистичной графикой, неплохим звуковым сопровождением.

  Игра проходится довольно быстро, но от этого проще не становится (материла все и вся, когда начались пятнашки). Также есть разные механики, что тоже делает головоломки наиболее интересными. + периодически добавляются уровни. Короче, эта штука стоит ваших 30 рублей.

[i]Личная оценка - 10/10.[/i]

author: {'steamid': '76561198174346133', 'num_games_owned': 189, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 229, 'last_played': 1469279512}

review:
One hour (milage may vary) of pure puzzly fun. It's creative and it changes things up before they get too stale (maybe a bit too quick). Keeps you on your toes, but I never got frustrated. I did take small breaks after completing the more difficult puzzles towards the end. It sadly ends too soon, but for 1$, holy shit, support the dev. 

TL;DR: Any puzzle fan will enjoy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198219545689', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 115, 'last_played': 1495939226}
review:
把游戏分了好几段玩完了，很简单的小解谜。
有好几种解谜花样，难度不高，费脑子的解谜也就几个。玩到有点难的时候心想噢噢正片准备开始了！！！！然而它就结束了。。。结束了。。。_(:_   然后开始循环回第一个。
快速的小休闲游戏，画风简洁清新，花几块钱玩玩挺不错的:)

说是支持27种语言，但是游戏里根本就没有任何文本23333333

author: {'steamid': '76561198205943147', 'num_games_owned': 330, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 64, 'last_played': 1504150682}
review: 一开始进入游戏，没有任何发行商等任何的累赘，上来直接两个方块，让你接触到游戏最原始的操作方式——移动方块，之前还以为这是什么创新的logo。我十分喜欢这种简洁的画面，游戏总体难度也不算太难（可能我还没玩到有挑战性的？），到手后不知不觉就会投入在里面忘了时间。好了我继续解密去了。

A fun little puzzler which i enjoyed zoning out to play. It is faily short but i beleive the price reflects that.
The challenge is fair and I never felt fustrated at all.

author: {'steamid': '76561198065732948', 'num_games_owned': 166, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 84, 'last_played': 1563994844}
review:
Zaskakująco dobra.

Minimalistyczna w każdym znaczeniu - prosta, czysta, ładna grafika. 
Menu pozwala na wyciszenie dźwięków. I tyle.

Puzzle zaczynają się prosto i robią z czasem trudniejsze, ale nigdy zbyt frustrujące.
Co jakiś czas są wprowadzane nowe pomysły, których się szybko sami uczymy.

Za 99 centów? Polecam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198062312184', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 406, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 406, 'last_played': 1470487555}
review:
由簡單的問題中先找出解題的規則
然後在複雜的問題中應用
簡單而有趣的小遊戲
滿適合給小朋友玩, 練習找規則與空間的概念

然而好像無法存檔, 
且無法調整是否全螢幕
